El socio es el Sr. Angeles; el tiene 46 aos de edad y es casado y tiene 3 hijos; El socio alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de dibujo, el realiza trabajos de pinturas, afiches y cuadros, el socio hace diferentes dibujos y pinturas y luego los vende al pblico en general y tambin en algunas oportunidades hace trabajos de pinturas para ongs,por medio de este trabajo saca adelante a sus hijos, el socio quiere ampliar el negocio de venta de pinturas y dibujos, el socio quiere ampliar y mejorar el negocio de dibujos y pinturas. El socio solicita el prstamo para comprar materiales como pinturas, pinceles, lpices y papeles.
El socio est feliz por el prstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Sr. Angeles belongs to the SEOR DE WIMPILLAY CHOCCO Community Bank located in the district of Cusco, and in the province and department of the same name. He is 46 years old, married, and has three children. He has a design business and makes paintings, posters, and pictures which he sells to the public. Angeles also paints pictures for NGOs. Through his work he has managed to help his children get ahead. He now wishes to expand and improve his business so he is seeking a loan to buy materials such as paints, brushes, pencils, and paper.
Angeles is happy to have this loan and promises to make the repayments.

loan.use: to buy paints, brushes, pencils, and paper

loan.name: Cesar

texts.es: El seor Cesar, nacido en la poblacin de el torno hace 20 aos, es soltero, el destino del crdito es para la siembra de yuca y lo que implica el preparado de la tierra, actualmente vive en casa de su padre en el torno, pero con el crdito se ira a su parcela ubicado en la comunidad de Alto Villa Barrientos, a 20 km. De Santa Rita para trabajar la tierra y poder subsistir de la venta de sus productos que lo comercializa directamente del productor al consumidor, con el fruto de sus ganancias desea comprarse una moto para poder movilizarse de un lugar a otro, despus de cumplir con sus obligaciones. En sus tiempos libres juega al futbol y es fantico de blooming un equipo de la ciudad de Santa Cruz.
texts.en:
Seor Cesar was born in the village of El Torno twenty years ago. He is single. He plans to use the loan money to buy yucca seed and agricultural supplies.
Cesar lives in his father's house in El Torno, but once he has the loan he will move to his land in the community of Alto Villa Barrientos, 20 km away from Santa Rita so that he can work the land. He will be able to live on the money he earns from the sale of the produce. He will sell the yucca directly to the consumer.
After he has paid off the loan, Cesar wishes to buy a motorbike with the profits so he can move easily from one location to another. In his free time he plays football and is a fan of Blooming, a team from the town of Santa Cruz.

loan.use: to buy yucca seed and agricultural supplies

loan.name: Mishelle

texts.en:
Mishelle is 26 years old and lives in the Philippines. She is married with two children.
Mishelle has a shop that sells canned goods, snacks & beverages. She has had this business for 5 years. She requested a loan of PHP 7,000 to buy canned goods, snacks & beverages.
Mishelle has been a member of HSPFI since 2011. In the future, Mishelle hopes to improve her business.

loan.use: to buy canned goods, snacks & beverages.

loan.name: Bintihamisi

texts.en:
Bintihamisi is a married woman with five children, all of whom attend school. She owns a house that has neither electricity nor piped water. Her greatest monthly expenses are food and school fees.
For the past two years, she has operated a vegetable stall business, selling from her home to her neighbors and passers-by. She faces a major challenge of competition from other vegetable sellers in the area. Bintihamisi dreams of establishing another business in the future.
With the Kshs 20,000 loan, she wants to purchase sacks of green vegetables, potatoes and onions. She decided to join Yehu to access loans to boost her business.

loan.use: to purchase sacks of green vegetables, potatoes and onions

loan.name: Joaquin

texts.es: El Sr. Joaqun se dedica al servicio de transporte y mecnica hace 2 aos, el es una persona joven tiene 25 aos, Vive en zona del Plan 3000, no tiene hijos. Ya que mantiene a sus padres por la edad avanzada que tienen, su Padre tenia un taller de reparaciones , ahora el joven Joaqun paso a ser dueo del negocio de su padre que es un taller de Estructura metlicas por eso que se apersono a nuestras oficinas para solicitar el crdito para poder comprar una maquina de soldar y algunas herramientas que le faltan en su taller y as tener mas ingresos para poder sustentar a sus padres, ya que su vehculo que es su herramienta principal de sus ingresos lo trabaja desde las 6 a.m. hasta las 21 pm. de la noche pero ahora quiere alternar para poner en pie su taller que le paso su padre.
texts.en:
Sr. Joaqun earns his living as a taxi driver and mechanic. He is 25 years old and lives in the area of Plan 3000. He doesn't have any children, but he does support his elderly parents. His father has a car repair garage which Joaqun has recently taken over. He has now approached our institution to ask for a loan to buy a soldering iron and other tools which the workshop lacks. With these purchases he hopes to earn more money to support his parents.
At the moment Joaqun runs his taxi service, his principal source of income, from 6am to 9pm, but he plans to alternate between this job and his father's workshop so he can put it on a sound footing.

loan.use: to buy a soldering iron for his workshop

loan.name: Jesusa

texts.es: La seora Jesusa, se encuentra casada, y tiene 4 hijo de los cuales solo 3 viven con ella. Su esposo y su hijo viven en el departamento de Santa Cruz. La seora Jesusa solo mantiene a sus 3 hijos. Ellos viven por la zona de la Maica Sud,una zona periferica de la ciudad de Cochabamba donde se dedica a la venta de leche cruda y ademas se encarga de cuidar el tanque de enfriamiento que hay en zona, por lo que los vecinos le pagan de forma mensual. Jesusa cuenta con 4 cabezas de ganado lechero, y esta leche ella lo vende a su vecina para que pueda entregar a la Planta Industrializadora de leche Pil Cochabamba. La Sra Jesusa requiere el credito para poder pagar un anticretico para un terreno donde siembra alfa, el cual le servira de alimento para sus vacas. Asi sus animales podran producir mas leche, y mejorar sus ingresos y poderles dar a sus hijos mejores condiciones de vida.
texts.en:
Jesusa is married and has 4 children. Only 3 of them live with her. Her husband and son live in the department of Santa Cruz. Jesusa only supports her 3 children.
They live in the area of Maica Sud, an area on the outskirts of the city of Cochabamba. She sells raw milk there, and she also is the caretaker of a cooling tank in the area, which her neighbors pay her for every month.
Jesusa has 4 heads of dairy cattle and she sells the milk to her neighbor who delivers it to the Pil Cochabamba Milk Industrialization Plant. Jesusa needs the loan to be able to pay for a plot of land where she grows alfalfa to feed her cows. This makes her animals produce more and will improve her income so she can giver her children a better quality of life.

loan.use: to make payments on a plot of agricultural land

loan.name: Maria Guadalupe

texts.es: Maria Guadalupe tiene 24 aos su actividad es la venta de mercadera en general. Tiene ms de 2 aos en este negocio, ella tiene 1 hijo menor de edad a su cargo por lo que siempre busca la manera de sacar adelante a su familia. Ella siempre ha sido una mujer muy responsable la mayora de sus clientes saben que siempre busca la forma de complacerlos. Ella sale todo los das a ofrecer sus productos, es por eso que solicita este crdito para la compra de perfumes, tratamientos, ropa interior, cremas, ropa en general.
texts.en: Maria Guadalupe is 24 years old. Her activity is selling general merchandise. She has been in the business for more than 2 years. She is raising one child and is always looking for a way to get her family ahead. She has always been a very responsible woman and most of her customers know that she always tries to make them happy. She goes out every day to sell her products and that is why she is asking for this loan to buy perfume, treatment, underwear, creams, and general clothing.

loan.use: to buy perfume, treatments, underwear, creams, and general clothing.

loan.name: Leonarda

texts.es: Leonarda tiene 33 aos de edad, es una persona trabajadora. Ella vive en la zona de Esquilan Chico de la provincia de Quillacollo, se gana el pan de cada dia vendiendo la leche que obtiene de sus vacas. Leonarda vive con su familia, necesita el prstamo para acceder junto a compaeros de su zona a la compra de un tanque de enfriamiento para la leche y de esta manera puedan conservar mayor tiempo el producto y no entren en perdida lo que afectara gravemente a la economa de sus familias debido a que dependen casi exclusivamente de la venta de leche cruda de buena calidad. Ella est muy agradecida con la gente que por medio de Kiva le pudo dar la oportunidad de hacer realidad su sueo. Leonarda entre sus planes futuros planea sacar un nuevo prstamo para mejorar su granja
texts.en:
Leonarda, a hard worker, is 33 years old. She lives in the Esquilan Chico area in the province of Quillacollo. She earns her daily bread by selling milk from dairy cows. Leonarda lives with her family.
She is asking for a loan, along with her nearby partners, in order to buy a cooling tank for the milk in order to keep the milk from spoiling. It is a serious loss of income to their families when they lose milk to spoilage because they rely almost entirely on the sale of fresh raw milk.
She is very grateful to the people who help her through Kiva for the opportunity of making her dream come true. Her future plans include asking for a new loan in order to improve their farm.

loan.use: to purchase with partners a cooling tank for milk

loan.name: Felix

texts.es: El sr. Flix naci en Santa Cruz, convive con la Sra. Simona ella es ama de casa, el se dedica a la agricultura y tambin a la fabricacin de escobas hace 4 aos que ellos viven y trabajan en paso al chivo distante a 25 km de la localidad de el Torno, el siembra yuca para vender, y el sorgo que el siembra es para la fabricacin de escobas de paja, para luego comercializarlo en l a ciudad de Santa Cruz, con el dinero del crdito comprara semillas para la siembra de yuca y lo que implica el preparado de la tierra hace 5 secuencias que trabaja con Emprender y se siente muy agradecido por el apoyo que se le brindo.
texts.en:
Felix was born in Santa Cruz. He lives with his partner Simona. She is a housekeeper.
He has worked in agriculture and also has made brooms for 4 years. They live and work in Paso al Chivo some 25 kilometers from the town of Torno. He grows cassava to sell and he plants sorghum to use in the making of straw brooms, which they later sell in Santa Cruz.
He will use the money from this loan to buy cassava seeds, and the necessary items needed to prepare the land for farming. This is his 5th cycle with Emprender and he is very grateful for the support it offers.

loan.use: to buy seeds to plant cassava and to make brooms

loan.name: Fahima

texts.en:
Fahima is a married woman with two children, all of whom attend school. She lives at a rental house that has neither electricity nor piped water. Her greatest monthly expense is food for the family.
For the past two years, she has operated a clothes selling business, selling from door to door to her neighbors and passers-by. She faces a major challenge of competition from other clothes sellers in the area. She dreams of establishing a clothes selling shop in the future.
With the Kshs 20,000 loan, she wants to purchase bundles of clothes for resale. She decided to join Yehu to access loans to boost her business.

loan.use: to purchase bundles of clothes for resale

loan.name: Turwanyubukene Group

texts.fr:
Aboubakar fait partie du groupe Turwanyubukene. Le nom du groupe signifie Lutter contre la pauvret . Il a 28 ans et il est mari avec 2 enfants de 4 7 ans, dont 2 scolariss.
Aboubakar est cultivateur de riz. Cest son premier cycle de prt avec ACB. Il va utiliser son crdit pour acheter des engrais chimiques pour son agriculture de riz.
Sa stratgie pour la croissance de son business est dagrandir la surface de champs cultiver afin de rcolter beaucoup plus. Dans les prochaines annes, Aboubakar voudrait tre parmi les meilleurs cultivateurs de riz dans sa rgion. Avec les profits, il prvoit dduquer ses enfants.
texts.en:
Aboubakar is a member of Turwanyubukene Group, whose name means "Fight agains poverty". He's 28 years old, married, and has two children, age 4 and 7. Both attend school.
Aboubakar is a rice cultivator. He's seeking his first loan from Kiva's partner, ACB, in order to buy chemical fertilizers for his rice farming business.
His strategy for growth is to expand his cultivated area, in order to harvest much more. In the forthcoming years, he would like to be among the best rice cultivators in his region. With his profits, he intends to provide education to his children.

loan.use: to buy chemical fertilizers for his rice farming business

loan.name: Jose Santiago

texts.es: El sr. Jos nacido el 25 de mayo en la localidad de Valle grande, convive con la Sra. Aid ella es ama de casa , tienen dos hijos mayores de edad ellos tambin se dedican a la agricultura y la ganadera, tienen una parcela de 35 hectreas apta para la agricultura y la ganadera , en la cual siembran yuca , papa , y maz, todo el maz que ellos siembran son para la alimentacin de sus vacas ya que cuentan con 40 cabezas de ganado. Y lo dems que siembran es para la venta en el mercado de la localidad directamente del productor al consumidor, el dinero del crdito lo utilizaran en la siembra de maz hace 5 secuencias que vienen trabajando con la institucin, se siente muy agradecido por el apoyo que emprender le ha brindado.
texts.en:
Jose was born on May 25th in the town of Valle Grande. He lives with Aid, who is a housewife. They have 2 adult children and they also work in agriculture and cattle breeding.
They have a 35 hectares plot of land, suitable for agriculture and livestock in which they grow cassava, potatoes, and corn. All the corn they grow is to feed the cows because they have 40 head of cattle, and the other things they grow they sell in the local market directly from grower to consumer.
They will use the money from this loan to plant corn. They have had 5 cycles with the communal bank and they are grateful for the support it has offered.

loan.use: to plant corn

loan.name: Biasha

texts.en:
Biasha is a married woman with one child who is still too young for school. She lives at a rental house that has neither electricity nor piped water. Her greatest monthly expense is food for the family.
For the past one year, she has operated a fish selling business, selling from home to her neighbours and passersby. She faces a major challenge of seasonality in her business. She dreams of establishing a fish selling shop in the future.
With the Kshs 20,000 she wants to purchase cooking fat oil and bundles of fish for resale. She decided to join Yehu to access loans to boost her business.

loan.use: to purchase cooking fat oil and bundles of fish for resale.

loan.name: Giovanna Elvira

texts.es:
La cliente tiene 29 aos vive en el departamento de La Paz en la Zona de Pampahasi , comenz a trabajar con esta actividad a la edad de 20 aos en el servicio de transporte de pasajeros urbano, pero tambin comercializa productos de venta por catlogo Esika para poder obtener ms ingresos.
Giovanna se independizo a los 20 aos, vive actualmente en una casa en anticretico pero ella genera ingresos para pagar sus gastos junto con su esposo, de esta manera pudo ahorrar para comprar la movilidad que en este momento tiene con sacrificio y perseverancia llego a sus objetivos.
El crdito que solicita es para la reparacin del vehculo y para compra de mercadera (Cosmticos) , para as poder salir adelante y lograr muchos ms sueos que ella tiene.
texts.en: This client is 29 years old and lives in La Paz department, in Pampahasi. She started working at the age of 20, providing an urban passenger transport service, but she also sells Esika-brand cosmetics from a catalog in order to make more income. Giovanna became independent at the age of 20. She currently lives in a house 'en anticrtico' (a special kind of rental system in Bolivia) but she is making income to cover her expenses together with her husband. In this way, she was able to save up to buy the vehicle that she now has. She achieved her goal with sacrifice and perseverance. The loan that Giovanna is requesting will be used to repair the vehicle and to buy merchandise (cosmetics) so that she can get ahead and fulfil many more of the dreams that she has.

loan.use: to have working capital for her cosmetics business, and to pay to have a public transport vehicle repaired

loan.name: Mwanamisi

texts.en:
Mwanamisi is a single woman who lives at a house that has neither electricity nor piped water. Her greatest monthly expense is food for the family.
For the past one year, she has operated a food stall business, selling from home to her neighbours and passersby. She faces a major challenge of competition from other food stall operators in the area. She dreams of establishing a restaurant business in the future.
With the Kshs 15,000 she wants to purchase beans, cooking fat oil and rice for her food stall business. She decided to join Yehu to access loans to boost her business.

loan.use: to purchase beans, cooking fat oil and rice for her food stall business.

loan.name: Toribio Marcial

texts.es: Toribio Marcial se dedica a la venta de frutas y verduras. Hace ms de 7 aos que tiene este medio de vida, uno de sus mayores desafos es de vender sus productos pues si no lo hace las frutas se pudren y son perdidas para l. La responsabilidad que tiene todos los das de generar con su familia los ingresos necesarios, hacen que cada da se esfuerce mas para lograr sus metas. El motivo del crdito es para la compra de bananos, naranjas, melones, sandias, cebollas, chiltomas y tomates.
texts.en: Toribio Marcial sells fruit and vegetables. He has been in this business for more than seven years. One of his greatest challenges is selling his produce because if he doesn't manage to do this the fruit rots and he loses it. He has a responsibility every day to make the income that he and his family need. This means that he works harder and harder every day to achieve his goals. He will use his loan to buy bananas, oranges, melons, watermelons, onions, bell peppers and tomatoes.

loan.use: to buy bananas, oranges, melons, watermelons, onions, bell peppers and tomatoes

loan.name: Luz Marina

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal TRES DE MAYO; el banco se encuentra ubicado en el Distrito de Huanchac en la Provincia de Cusco y Departamento de Cusco. La socia es la Sr. Luz Marina, la socia tiene 32 aos de edad, la socia es conviviente y tiene 2 hijos de 8 y 7 aos de edad, la socia trabaja en el comercio de compra y venta de animales menores, la socia compra y vende cuyes, la socia tiene 20 cuyes ahora en casa y desea invertir el prstamo en la compra de 50 cuyes machos y hembras tiernos para criarlos y luego venderlos a los diferentes restaurantes de la ciudad, ella trabaja para cubrir los estudios primarios de sus menores hijos y la alimentacin de ambos. La socia invertir el crdito en la compra de 50 cuyes entre hembras y machos.
La socia agradece el apoyo que se le otorgara y asi mismo se compromete a cumplir de manera disciplinada con los pagos de las cuotas.
texts.en:
Luz Marina is a member of the "Tres de Mayo" community bank which is located in Huanchac district, in Cusco province and department.
Luz Marina is 32 years old, lives with her partner, and has two children aged 8 and 7. She works in commerce, buying and selling animals. She buys and sells guinea pigs. Luz Marina has 20 guinea pigs at home right now and would like to invest her loan in buying 50 young male and female guinea pigs to raise and then sell to the different restaurants in the city. She works to cover the cost of her young children's primary education and to feed them both. She will invest her loan in buying 50 male and female guinea pigs.
Luz Marina is grateful for the support that she is being given and therefore pledges to make her loan repayments in a disciplined manner.

loan.use: to buy 50 male and female guinea pigs

loan.name: Rosalba

texts.es: Rosalba tiene 45 aos de edad tiene 2 hijos los cuales estudian la secundaria y por los cuales ella le hecha muchas ganas al trabajo, doa Rosa como de cario le dicen se dedica a la venta de frutas y verduras, en su casa tiene aguacates, chiles manzanos, nopales, duraznos, guayaba, etc. los cuales su esposo y ella cultivan para despus venderlos en el mercado de su poblacin y tambien de casa en casa. Tiene aproximadamente con su negocio 4 aos y ella espera que con el crdito que esta pidiendo a la fundacin pueda hacer crecer su negocio y comprar ms variedad de frutas y legumbres de temporada. La meta que tiene Rosa es poner un puesto estable en el mercado de su poblacin para ya no andar cargando sus cubetas llenas de frutas y legumbres.
texts.en: Rosalba is 45 years old and she has 2 children attending middle school and who are her reason for working hard. She is affectionately nicknamed Rosa, and she engages in selling fruits and vegetables. She stocks avocados, Manzano peppers, prickly pears, peach tree and guava in her house, among other products she and her husband grow to then sell them in the local market and also going door to door. She has been running her activity for approximately 4 years, and she hopes that the loan she is requesting to the institution can help make her activity grow by buying a wider variety of fruits and seasonal legumes. Rosas dream is to set a fixed stall in the market of her village, in order to no longer carry around her cartons full of fruits and legumes.

loan.use: To buy more fruits and legumes.

loan.name: Mayemi

texts.es: Mayemi tiene 21 aos, esta casada con Donato de 25 aos, con quien tiene 1 hijo. Juntos habitan en su casa propia, ubicada en la comunidad de Nueva Fortaleza, Pichari. Ella se destaca por ser una gran mujer emprendedora, que se dedica al trabajo en la agricultura cultivando cacao y caf que son productos que estn teniendo una buena demanda en el mercado nacional e internacional. Esto es debido a la dedicacin y la constante aplicacion de fertilizantes, que han hecho que su producto sea de calidad. Siendo al final llevados a los centros acopiadores del distrito de Pichari, obteniendo ganancias considerables. En esta labor es su esposo quien ms la apoya, y en ocasiones sus peones, sin embargo le falta capital para contratar personal que lo apoyen en la cosecha, por lo que al final sus frutos se quedan sin ser cosechados. Este ser su primer crdito con MFP, por el que ella se compromete en cancelar puntualmente el pago de sus cuotas. Con los 1,000 soles que solicita, contratar personal para que extraiga la maleza de entre sus plantas.
texts.en:
Mayemi is 21 years old and married to Donato who is 25. They have one child. The family live together in their own home which is located in Nueva Fortaleza community, in Pichari. Mayemi stands out as being a great, entrepreneurial woman who works in agriculture, growing cacao and coffee, which are products that are in good demand on both the national and international market. This is due to her dedication and the constant application of fertilizers which have made her products good-quality ones. When she finally takes them to the storage warehouses in Pichari district, she makes considerable profits. Her husband is the one who supports her the most in this work and she has occasional support from her laborers. However, she lacks capital with which to hire workers to support her in her harvesting which means that her fruit do not get harvested.
This will be Mayemi's first loan from MFP and she pledges to make her repayments on time. She will use the 1,000 soles that she has requested to hire workers to get rid of the weeds that grow between her plants.

loan.use: to hire laborers

loan.name: Catalina

texts.es: La cliente,CATALINA, tiene un hijo, es casada, provienen D. familia humilD., la cliente se dedica a la produccin D. la leche cruda, actualmente cuenta con 7 cabezas D. ganado lechero en produccin, y 3 cabezas D. ganado lechero preadas. El destino del crdito es para comprar un tanque D. enfriamiento, donD. un grupo D. personas estn haciendo ese esfuerzo D. comprar un tanque D. enfriamiento, ya que la produccin que sacan les queda muy lejos para ir a entregar, en ese sentido, ser D. mayor beneficio para la clienta y sus dems compaeras. Actualmente la clienta vive en la localidad D. Esquilan Chico que se encuentra en la Provincia D. Quillacollo del Departamento D. Cochabamba.
texts.en: Catalina has a son and is married. She comes from a humble family and her business is producing raw milk. She currently has 7 head of dairy cattle which are producing milk and 3 head of dairy cattle which are pregnant. The purpose of her loan is to buy a cooling tank. There is a group of people who are making this joint effort to buy a cooling tank because the milk they produce must travel a long way to be delivered. The cooling tank would be of great benefit to our client and her friends. Our client currently lives in the village of Esquilan Chico which is located in Quillacollo province, in Cochabamba department.

loan.use: to (jointly) buy a milk cooling tank

loan.name: Mame Penda

texts.fr: Madame Mame Penda est une femme marie de 56ans qui vit au Sngal. Elle exerce la profession denseignante depuis plus de 25 ans. Elle a choisi cette profession a cause de lducation de qualit quelle a reue et quelle voulait transmettre aux enfants qui sont en ge dapprendre. Pour elle lducation est le seul gage de la russite. Cest une ancienne socitaire de lun des guichets de lU-IMCEC depuis mai 2003. Elle a dj rembours 7 prts antrieurs. Elle sollicite un crdit de 350 000 frs prvu pour lachat de provisions qui aideront a assurer lalimentation du foyer durant son absence. Ce crdit contribuera lquilibre social de sa famille.
texts.en:
Ms. Mame Penda is a 56-year-old married woman who lives in Senegal. She has been working in the profession of teaching for over 25 years. She chose this profession due to the quality of education she received and because she wanted to pass down knowledge to children who are school-aged. To her, education is the only guarantee for success.
She has been a long-time associate of a U-IMCEC branch since May 2003. She has already paid back seven previous loans. She is requesting a loan of 350,000 francs for buying provisions that will help to ensure a supply of food at home during her absence. This loan will help with stabilizing her family in life.

loan.use: to buy grocery items for the house

loan.name: Miguel Angel

texts.es: El seor Miguel, de 65 aos de edad, habita en la ciudad de Estel, esta casado , es padre de 4 hijos, el es comerciante , se dedica a elaborar botas de cuero, su nivel acadmico es bsico solo estudio hasta sexto grado de primaria. Cuando empez con esta actividad a la edad de 15 aos aprendi a elabora zapatos de nios, luego de adultos y despus se especializo en botas vaqueras, es una actividad que disfruta mucho ,lleva ya 30 aos en este negocio el cual lo ejerce de manera artesanal y con mucho carisma y esfuerzo. El solicita el crdito para comprar materia prima tales como cuero, vaquetas, suelas, para elaborar botas vaquera y tambin quiere hacerle algunas mejoras a su hogar. Con esta inversin podr comprar parte del material que necesita para trabajar, podr elaborar diferentes estilos de botas y ofrecer una mejor calidad. Por lo pronto desea ampliar su negocio , quiere poner una tienda mas amplia de diferentes estilos de botas vaqueras.
texts.en:
Seor Miguel is 65 years old and lives in the city of Esteli. He is married and the father of 4 children. He is a businessman. He makes leather boots. He has a basic education having finished 6th grade in primary school. When he started learning the trade aged 15, he learned how to make girls' shoes, then adult shoes and later specialized in cowboy boots. It is a job he finds very enjoyable. He has been in this business for 30 years and employs traditional methods as well as a lot of style and effort.
He is asking for the credit to buy raw materials such as leather, cowhide soles, soles to make his cowboy boots. He also wants to make some improvements to his house. With this investment he will be able to buy some of the materials he needs to work. He will be able to create different styles of boots and provide a better quality product. For now, he wants to expand his business. He wants to open a bigger shop that offers cowboy boots of different styles.

loan.use: to buy raw materials such as leather, cowhide soles, soles to make cowboy boots and to make a few improvements to his house.

loan.name: Maria

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal TRES DE MAYO; el banco se encuentra ubicado en el Distrito de Huanchac en la Provincia de Cusco y Departamento de Cusco. La socia es la Sra. Maria; la socia tiene 42 aos d edad y es conviviente, la socia tiene 4 hijos de 22, 13, 12, 5 aos de edad, la socia se dedica al comercio minorista de frutas, ella compra al por mayor frutas de los terminales que llegan con sus cargamentos del norte del pas y compra las diferentes frutas luego ella en sus domicilio ya los distribuye y en una carretilla acomoda la fruta y con sus bolsas y sus pequea balanza de mano se va por todas las calles de mucho movimiento y se instala unos minutos en las esquinas mientras las personas que pasan se detienen a comprarle por kilos y unidades, la socia trabaja diario y espera poder dar una buena educacin a sus hijos, la socia desea el prstamo para invertir en la compra de fruta al por mayor .
La socia agradece el apoyo que se le otorgara y asi mismo se compromete a cumplir de manera disciplinada con los pagos de las cuotas.
texts.en:
The member belongs to the communal bank TRES DE MAYO. The bank is located in the district of Huanchac in the province of Cusco and the department of Cusco.
The member is Sra. Maria. She is 42 years old and lives with a partner. The member has 4 children of 22, 13, 12 and 5 years of age. The member works in the retail sale of fruit. She buys fruit wholesale at the terminals where the trucks arrive with their cargoes of fruit from the north. She buys different fruit and then from her house she sets off with her wheelbarrow full of fruit, bags and a small hand scale. She makes her way along busy streets and sets up business for a few minutes at the corners whilst the passersby stop to buy her produce by the kilo and by the unit. The member works every day and hopes to give her children a good education. The member wants the loan to invest in the purchase of fruit wholesale.
The member is grateful for the support given her and agrees to make her repayments in a disciplined manner.

loan.use: to buy fruit wholesale.

loan.name: Anselma

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal TRES DE MAYO; el banco se encuentra ubicado en el Distrito de Huanchac en la Provincia de Cusco y Departamento de Cusco. La socia Anselma tiene 52 aos de edad; la socia es casada y tiene 4 hijos de 26, 24, 20, 16 aos de edad; la socia se dedica al comercio minorista, la socia vende productos secos como maz, habas, y otras menestras como porotos, lentejas, pallares; la socia trabaja arduamente para seguir apoyando a sus hijos con sus estudios y la alimentacin diaria, ella en esta oportunidad desea invertir el prstamo en la compra de productos secos al por mayor para implementar su negocio ubicado en uno de los mercados en la ciudad. La socia solicita el prstamo para invertir en la compra de productos secos.
La socia agradece el apoyo que se le otorgara y asi mismo se compromete a cumplir de manera disciplinada con los pagos de las cuotas.
texts.en:
The member belongs to the communal bank TRES DE MAYO. The bank is located in the district of Huanchac in the province of Cusco in the department of Cusco.
The member Anselma is 52 years old. She is married and has 4 children of 26, 24, 20 and 16 years of age. The member works in the retail business, selling dry goods such as corn, broad beans and other vegetables such as green beans, lentils and lima beans. The member works hard to continue supporting her children with their education and their daily food. This time she wants to invest in purchasing dry goods wholesale.
The member is grateful for the support given her and as such agrees to make her repayments in a disciplined manner.

loan.use: to buy dry goods.

loan.name: Cornelia

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal TRES DE MAYO; el banco se encuentra ubicado en el Distrito de Huanchac en la Provincia de Cusco y Departamento de Cusco. La socia Cornelia tiene 62 aos de edad, y es soltera la socia tiene 5 hijos los cuales ya son todos ellos independientes, la socia trabaja en el mercado vendiendo verduras, menestras y papa, la socia suele comprar al por mayor por ejemplo choclo fresco y lo lleva a vender junto a sus otros productos como verduras y menestras, la socia tambin vende en ocasiones papa, ella desea invertir el prstamo en la compra de choclo al por mayor, papa, habas y otros productos.
La socia agradece el apoyo que se le otorgara y asi mismo se compromete a cumplir de manera disciplinada con los pagos de las cuotas.
texts.en:
The member belongs to the communal bank TRES DE MAYO. The bank is located in the district of Huanchac in the province of Cusco and in the department of Cusco.
The member Cornelia is 62 years old. She is single and has 5 children, all of whom are adults and independent. The member works in the market selling vegetables, beans and potatoes. The member tends to buy a product in bulk for example fresh corn and sells it alongside her other products such as vegetables and beans. The member also sells potatoes sometimes. She wants to invest the loan to purchase fresh corn in bulk, potatoes, beans and other products.
The member is grateful for the support given her and as such agrees to make the repayments in a disciplined manner.

loan.use: to buy fresh corn in bulk, potatoes, beans and other products.

loan.name: Juana Yesica

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal TRES DE MAYO; el banco se encuentra ubicado en el Distrito de Huanchac en la Provincia de Cusco y Departamento de Cusco. La socia Juana Yesica; la socia tiene 20 aos de edad y es conviviente, la socia se dedica a la atencin de sus tienda de abarrotes, la socia aun no tiene hijos y est aprovechando todo su tiempo para trabajar junto a sus conyugue y ahorrar para comprar sus muebles y empezar a comprar un terreno para construir su casa, la socia tiene esta tienda en alquiler ella paga un monto mensual para conservar la tienda en esta oportunidad ella desea invertir el crdito en la compra de productos de primera necesidad como arroz, azcar, fideos, leche y todos los productos al por mayor, la socia solicita el prstamo para invertir en la compra de productos de abarrotes para la implementacin de sus tienda, como azcar, arroz, leche y otros.
La socia agradece el apoyo que se le otorgara y asi mismo se compromete a cumplir de manera disciplinada con los pagos de las cuotas.
texts.en:
The member belongs to the communal bank "TRES DE MAYO". The bank is located in the district of Huanchac in the province of Cusco and the department of Cusco.
The member Juana Yesica is 20 years old and lives with a partner. The member works taking care of her grocery store. The member has no children as yet and is making good use of her time to work with her partner to save to buy furniture and start buying land on which to build a house. The member rents the store and pays a monthly fee to keep it. This time she wants to invest the loan in the purchase of staples such as rice, sugar, noodles, milk wholesale. The member is asking for the loan to invest in the purchase of groceries to stock her store such as sugar, rice, milk and the like.
The member is grateful for the support given and agrees to make the repayments in a disciplined manner.

loan.use: to buy groceries such as sugar, milk, rice to stock her store

loan.name: Martha Esperanza

texts.es: Martha Esperanza tiene su negocio que es brindar el servicio de costura. Hace ms de 10 aos que posee este medio de vida. Ella dio inicio porque no tena un trabajo estable que le proporcionara ingresos a su hogar, tiene 3 hijos de los cuales solamente 1 est bajo su cargo. El financiamiento es para la compra de hilos, tijeras, telas, bordados, cintas, entre otros. Suea con pagar en tiempo y forma su crdito pues ha sido beneficioso para ella contribuir para el desarrollo de su negocio.
texts.en:
Martha Esperanza has a seamstress business, which she has had for over ten years. She started the business because she did not have stable work that would give her income for her household. She has three children; only one is under her care.
The loan is to buy thread, scissors, fabric, embroideries, and ribbons, among other things. She plans on making her payments on time. The loan has been beneficial to her in the development of her business.

loan.use: to buy thread, scissors, fabric, embroideries, and ribbons, among other things.

loan.name: Ana Maria

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal TRES DE MAYO; el banco se encuentra ubicado en el Distrito de Huanchac en la Provincia de Cusco y Departamento de Cusco. La socia es la Sra. Ana Maria; la socia tiene 40 conviviente la socia tiene 5 hijos, de 21, 19, 10, 9, 8 aos de edad; la socia es nutricionista, ella trabaja dando charlas de nutricin en colegios, en puestos de salud, la socia desea en esta ocasin el crdito para invertir en la compra de materiales para la construccin de vivienda, la socia solicita el prstamo para invertir en la compra de materiales para la construccin de sus vivienda.
La socia agradece el apoyo que se le otorgara y asi mismo se compromete a cumplir de manera disciplinada con los pagos de las cuotas.
texts.en:
Ana Maria belongs to the "Tres de Mayo" community bank which is located in Huanchac district, in Cusco province and department.
Ana Maria is 40 years old, lives with her partner, and has five children aged 21, 19, 10, 9 and 8. Ana Maria is a nutritionist. She gives nutrition talks in high schools and small local clinics. On this occasion, she would like a loan to invest in construction supplies for building her home.
Ana Maria is grateful for the support that she is being given and therefore pledges to make her repayments in a disciplined manner.

loan.use: to invest in buying building materials

loan.name: Merida

texts.es: Mrida de 27 aos de edad, casado con Aquilino de 34 aos, con quien tiene 2 hijos, ellos viven en su casa propia ubicado en la comunidad de Nueva Fortaleza distrito de Pichari. La agricultura ha sido la actividad que se ha dedicado durante toda su vida, pues no logr culminar los estudios por faltas de medio econmicos. Con el pasar del tiempo se compr su propio terreno agrcola, desde entonces se ha esforzado mucho para que sus frutos sean de calidad, pues su mtodo de fertilizacin es rganica, lo cual lo hace mucho ms saludable. Adems que contribuye al cuidado del medio ambiente, utilizando solo estircol de animales. Para ella ste trabajo es importante y desea que sus hijos tambin apliquen esta tcnica cuando tengan sus propias tierras. Hoy sus frutos tiene mucha demanda por parte de los mayoristas, quienes realizan buena paga por cada kilo que compran, por tanto desea ampliar la siembra para aumentar la produccin de caf y cacaco. Este ser su primer crdito con MFP, por lo que ella se compromete en pagar puntualmente el pago de sus cuotas. Con los 1000 soles que solicita, Comprar abono orgnico.
texts.en:
Mrida is 27, and married to Aquilino, 34. They have two children, and live in their own house in the community of Nueva Fortaleza, in Pichari district. She has farmed all her life, as she didn't manage to complete her schooling due to lack of financial means.
In the course of time, she bought her own land. Since then, she has tried very hard to grow quality crops, as she fertilizes using organic methods, which are much better for your health. In addition, this contributes to caring for the environment, as only animal manure is used. This work is important to her, and she wants her children to also apply this technique when they have their own land.
Today there is a lot of demand for her crops from the wholesalers, who pay well for every kilo they buy. Therefore she wants to expand her plantings in order to increase her production of coffee and cacao.
This will be her first loan from MFP, so she is committed to making her payments on time. With the 1000 soles she is applying for, she will buy organic fertilizer.

loan.use: To buy organic fertilizer.

loan.name: Teresa

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal TRES DE MAYO; el banco se encuentra ubicado en el Distrito de Huanchac en la Provincia de Cusco y Departamento de Cusco. La socia es la Sra. Teresa y tiene 38 aos de edad; la socia tiene 3 hijos de 17, 11, 7 aos de edad; la socia trabaja atendiendo comidas en uno de los centros comerciales y ella desea invertir el crdito en la compra de insumos para la elaboracin de su comidas, la socia comprara arroz, azcar, aceite, y comprara al por mayor para poder ganar ms. La socia solicita el prstamo para invertir en la compra de ingredientes como arroz, azcar, leche.
La socia agradece el apoyo que se le otorgara y asi mismo se compromete a cumplir de manera disciplinada con los pagos de las cuotas.
texts.en:
Teresa belongs to the Tres de Mayo communal bank located in the Huanchac District within the Province and Department of Cusco.
Teresa is 38 years old with 3 children aged 17, 11, and 7. She works serving food in one of the commercial centers. She wants to invest the credit in the purchase of inputs for the preparation of her dishes. She will buy rice, sugar, and oil at wholesale prices to earn more money.
Teresa has requested this loan to purchase ingredients like rice, sugar, and milk. She is thankful for the support given to her and has pledged to make her payments in a disciplined manner.

loan.use: to buy ingredients like rice, sugar, and milk.

loan.name: Anonymous
loan.use: to buy pigs.

loan.name: Juan Carlos

texts.es:
El socio pertenece al banco comunal TRES DE MAYO; el banco se encuentra ubicado en el Distrito de Huanchac en la Provincia de Cusco y Departamento de Cusco. El socio es el Sr. Juan Carlos; el socio tiene 19 aos de edad, el socio es soltero y el es estudiante en la preparatoria para la carrera de contabilidad, el socio trabaja eventualmente apoyando a su padre en diferentes obras y est preparndose para postular a la carrera de contabilidad, el socio desea invertir el crdito en sus estudios. El socio Solicita el prstamo para invertir en sus estudios.
El socio agradece el apoyo que se le otorgara y asi mismo se compromete a cumplir de manera disciplinada con los pagos de las cuotas.
texts.en:
This member belongs to the communal bank "TRES DE MAYO" which is located in the district of Huanchac in the province and department of Cusco.
Juan Carlos is 19, single and a college preparatory student studying accounting. He works part-time on different jobs to help his parents. Since he is preparing to begin his accounting degree he is in need of a loan to pay for his studies.
He is grateful for any support he receives and committed to paying back the loan on time.

loan.use: To pay for his education.

loan.name: Adali

texts.es: Adalid, habita en la ciudad de Estel, tiene 35 aos de edad, es mas madre soltera, tiene dos hijos de 13 y 7 aos de edad respectivamente, ella es estilista, tiene su propio saln de belleza, llevar 7 aos con este negocio. Inicio con capital propio, a la edad de 17 aos le empez a gustar trabajar en el rea de belleza, se inscribi en una academia para aprender a ser estilista con la fe y la esperanza de algn da tener su propio negocio y as lo hizo, de este negocio sobrevive y adems cuenta con el apoyo de sus hermanos que la ayudan atravez de remesas cuando pueden. Ella tiene expectativa de agrandar su negocio. Es por ello que solicita el crdito para comprar cosmticos, tintes, secadora, planchas. Con esta inversin podr comprar parte de las herramientas que necesita para trabajar, surtir su inventario de cosmticos y sobre todo brindar un mejor servicio a sus clientes. En sus planes futuros quiere remodelar su saln de belleza, acondicionarlo mejor y convertirlo en una academia de belleza.
texts.en:
Adali lives in the city of Estel. She is 35, and a single mother of two children, ages 13 and 7. She is a hairdresser and has her own beauty salon where she has been in business for seven years. She started her business with her own money at the age of 17. Since she enjoyed working in cosmetology she enrolled in an academy to become a beautician with the faith and hope that one day she would have her own business, and in fact she did.
Her source of income is from the business and from the help she receives from her brothers who send her money whenever they can. She hopes to expand her shop and is requesting a loan to buy cosmetics, hair color, a hair dryer and hair straighteners. With this investment she will be ble to buy part of the tools she needs for her work. It will increase the stock of cosmetics so she can provide better service to her customers. Her future plans include remodeling the salon to set it up as a beauty academy.

loan.use: To pay for , hair color, a hair dryer and .

loan.name: Arminda

texts.es: La clienta, ARMINDA, vive con sus 2 hijos, la clienta se dedica a la produccin de la leche cruda, actualmente cuenta con 5 cabezas de ganado lechero en produccin, y 3 cabezas de ganado lechero preadas. El destino del crdito es para comprar un tanque de enfriamiento, donde un grupo de personas estn haciendo ese esfuerzo de comprar un tanque de enfriamiento, ya que la produccin que sacan les queda muy lejos para ir a entregar, en ese sentido, ser de mayor beneficio para la clienta y sus dems compaeras. Actualmente la clienta vive en la localidad de Esquilan Chico que se encuentra en la Provincia de Quillacollo del Departamento de Cochabamba.
texts.en: The member, Arminda, who lives with her two children, is a dairy producer and currently has five dairy cows in production, and three pregnant dairy cows. The loan is to buy a cooling tank that will be used jointly by a group of people who are in the same business and who deliver their milk to customers far away. The tank will benefit the member and others. The member currently lives in Esquilan Chico in the province of Quillacollo which is in the department of Cochabamba.

loan.use: To buy a milk cooling tank.

loan.name: Clara

texts.es:
La seora Clara tiene 45 aos de edad y vive en una casa de su propiedad su domicilio esta ubicado en el barrio de villa Fatima de la ciudad de Tarija. Clara es madre soltera pero tiene dos hijos aquienes apoya en sus estudios. Clara se dedica al comercio de lubricantes actividad que viene realizando desde hace mas de 10 aos esta actividad la realiza en su mismo domicilio donde vive.
Clara quiere tener mejores ingresos para brindarles una mejor vida a sus hijos pero ella nos dice que quiere comprar mas mercaderia es por eso que el credito sera destinado para la compra de mercaderia para de ese modo poder incrementar sus ingresos. Clara nos cuenta que quiere darle a sus hijos toda la comodidad posible para que puedan desempear sus obligaciones, por eso nos dice que el proximo credito que solicite sera para mejorar las condiciones de su casa.
texts.en:
Clara, 45, lives in her own house which is located in the Villa Fatima neighborhood in the city of Tarija. Clara is a single mother and helps her children with their education. She sells lubricants for a living and has been in business for ten years. She sells her products out of her home.
Clara wants to increase her income so she can provide a better lifestyle for her children. She wans to buy more merchandise and plans to use the loan to do so, which will increase her sales.
She tells us that her goal is to make life for her children as comfortable as possible so they can meet their obligations. Her next loan will be for home improvements.

loan.use: To invest in her lubricants business.

loan.name: Anonymous
loan.use: To buy talcum powder, creams, , shampoo, lipstick, face powder, and facial masks, among other items.

loan.name: Rosa

texts.es: La socia pertenece al banco comunal SEOR DE WIMPILLAY CHOCO; el banco se encuentra ubicado en el Distrito de Huanchac en la Provincia de Cusco y Departamento de Cusco. La socia es la Sra. Rosa; la socia tiene 64 aos de edad. La socia es casada y tiene 8 hijos los cuales son ya todos ellos independientes, la socia se dedica al comercio minorista, la socia trabaja comprando y vendiendo frutas, la socia va los das jueves al terminal de frutas ella compra al por mayor y luego lleva a su casa, la socia vende en el mercado la fruta en forma unitaria o por kilos, la socia desea invertir el prstamo en la compra de frutas del terminal. La socia solicita el prstamo para invertir en la compra de frutas. La socia agradece el apoyo que se le otorgara y as mismo se compromete a cumplir de manera disciplinada con los pagos de las cuotas.
texts.en: The member belongs to the SEOR DE WIMPILLAY CHOCO Communal Bank, located in the Huanchac district in the province and department of Cusco. This is Mrs. Rosa; she is 64. She is married and has eight children who are all independent. She works in retail, buying and selling fruit. On Thursdays she goes to the fruit market and buys fruit wholesale. She then brings it home. She sells the fruit in the market individually or by the kilo, and wants to invest this loan in the purchase of fruits from the market. She is requesting this loan to invest in the purchase of fruits. She thanks everyone for their support and promises to pay her quotas in a disciplined manner.

loan.use: to invest in the purchase of fruits.

loan.name: Paulino

texts.es: Paulino tiene 40 aos, convive con lucia de 35 aos, con quien tiene 2 hijos. Juntos habitan en su casa propia, ubicada, en la comunidad de Nueva Fortaleza, Pichari. l proviene de una familia cuya tradcin se han dedicado a la agricultura, es as que con el transcurrir del tiempo contino con esta actividad, pero ahora tiene ms experiencia. Desde entonces le va muy bien con el trabajo que realiza, sin embargo hay etapas en las que necesita de jornaleros para que lo ayuden a sembrar y a cosechar. Al final sus productos son llevados a los centros de acopio de su ciudad, recibiendo a cambio considerables ganancias. Este ser su primer crdito con MFP, por el que se compromete en ser puntual con el pago de sus cuotas. Con los 1.000 soles que solicita, podr contratar personal para que realicen la poda de sus cafetales.
texts.en: Paulino is 40. He lives with Lucia, age 35, with whom he has two children. They live together in their own home in the Nueva Fortaleza community, Pichari. Paulino comes from a family of farmers, and he is continuing this work; he now has more experience. His work is going very well for him, but there are stages during which he needs day labourers to help him to sow and harvest. In the end, his products are brought to the city's distribution centers; in exchange, he makes a considerable income. This will be his first loan with MFP, and he promises to be punctual in the repayment of his quotas. With the 1,000 requested soles, he will be able to hire labourers to prune his coffee plants.

loan.use: to hire day labourers.

loan.name: Rosa

texts.es: La socia pertenece al banco comunal SEOR DE WIMPILLAY CHOCO; el banco se encuentra ubicado en el Distrito de Huanchac en la Provincia de Cusco y Departamento de Cusco. La socia es la Sra. Rosa; la socia tiene 35 aos de edad. La socia es conviviente y tiene 2 hijos de 7 y 3 aos de edad; la socia se dedica a la administracin de sus tienda de abarrotes, la socia tiene en su propia casa una tienda de abarrotes en la cual vende todo lo referente a productos de primera necesidad como arroz, azcar, leche, aceite, fideos, atn, galletas, gaseosas entre otras cosas ms por unidad y kilos. La socia desea invertir el crdito en la compra de productos de abarrotes como los mencionados. La socia solicita el prstamo para invertir en la compra de leche, arroz, azcar, fideos y otros productos. La socia agradece el apoyo que se le otorgara y as mismo se compromete a cumplir de manera disciplinada con los pagos de las cuotas.
texts.en:
Rosa is a member of the 'Seor de Wimpillay Choco' community bank which is located in Huanchac district, in Cusco province and department.
Rosa is 35 years old, lives with her partner, and has two children aged 7 and 3. She runs a grocery store which is located in her own home. She sells all kinds of essential household products such as rice, sugar, milk, oil, noodles, tuna, cookies, soda and other products which are sold by the unit or by the kilo. Rosa would like to invest her loan in buying groceries such as those we have mentioned. She is requesting her loan to invest in buying milk, rice, sugar, noodles, etc.
Rosa is grateful for the support that she is being given and pledges to make her loan repayments in a disciplined manner.

loan.use: to invest in buying milk, rice, sugar, noodles and other products

loan.name: Anonymous
loan.use: to buy clothing and mobile phones to resell

loan.name: Ana Patricia

texts.es: Ana Patricia tiene su negocio que es la venta de celulares y accesorios. Tiene ms de 10 aos en esta actividad. Inicio con su ex esposo quien le enseo todo acerca de este negocio, pues ella con ciertos ahorros decidi emprender esta actividad Ana deposita diariamente mucho entusiasmo y alegra en lo que realiza es por medio de este trabajo que les ha brindado a sus 3 hijos de 4, 8 y 10 aos respectivamente las comodidades necesarias. Ella solicita este crdito con el fin de comprar repuestos de teclados, protectores, auriculares, fundas de silicn, cargadores, memorias entre otras cosas.
texts.en:
Ana Patricia has a business selling cell phones and accessories. She has been in this line of work for more than ten years. She started with her ex-husband who taught her everything about the business. She decided to start the business with some savings that she had.
Every day, Ana puts a lot of enthusiasm and cheerfulness into what she does. Through this work, she has been able to provide her three children aged 4, 8 and 10 with the comforts they need. She is requesting this loan to buy keyboards, protectors, headphones, silicon cases, chargers, memory cards, etc.

loan.use: to buy parts such as keyboards, protectors, headphones, silicon cases, chargers, memory cards, etc.

loan.name: Zapatito Veloz Group

texts.es:
La A.C. ZAPATITO VELOZ iniciar su noveno ciclo en Pro Mujer, como parte del Centro Collpani, est compuesta por ocho integrantes y est dirigida por una mesa directiva encabezada por la seora Marisol. Los negocios que las integrantes de la asociacin comunal llevan adelante son variados entre ellos tenemos: venta de cocinas, venta de chicharrones, costuras, plsticos en general, venta de chompas, costura de chamarras.
La seora Marisol, indica que hace dos aos que integra Pro Mujer y que ingreso por invitacin de sus familiares. En la actualidad ella tiene un negocio de costura de buzos deportivos que viene trabajando hace tres aos.
El crdito que ahora sacar es para aumentar capital (compra de tela, hilos, etc.) que adquirir de la feria y posteriormente a la elaboracin lo vender en su comercio. Esta forma de trabajo le permitir generar recursos para apoyar en lo posible a su familia, pues ella es casada y un hijo.
Cuando se le consulta qu le gusta de Pro Mujer, ella responde que le gusta compartir con las compaeras y el ahorro.
texts.en:
The Zapatito Veloz (Swift Little Shoe) community bank is about to start its ninth loan cycle with Pro Mujer, as part of the Collpani regional office. The group has eight members and is run by a board of directors which is led by Marisol. The businesses that the members of the community bank are engaged in are varied and include: selling stoves, selling 'chicharrones' (fried pork rinds), sewing, selling plastic products, selling sweaters and sewing jackets.
Marisol tells us that she has been a member of Pro Mujer for two years. She joined through an invitation from some of her family members. She currently has a business sewing track suits and has been in this business for three years.
Marisol will use the loan that she is requesting to increase her capital (buying fabric, threads, etc.). She will buy her supplies in the market and then, when she has made her outfits, she will sell them in her store. This work enables her to make income with which to support her family in so far as she can. She is married and has one child.
When we asked her what she likes about Pro Mujer, Marisol replied that she enjoys sharing with her fellow bank members and also the savings.

loan.use: to buy fabric, threads, etc.

payment.comment: Over-reported by partner. Reduced to local price.

loan.name: Elsa

texts.es: La clienta, ELSA, vive sola no tiene hijos, es soltera, la clienta se dedica a la produccin de la leche cruda, actualmente cuenta con 3 cabezas de ganado lechero en produccin, y 1 cabezas de ganado lechero preada. El destino del crdito es para comprar un tanque de enfriamiento, donde un grupo de personas est haciendo un gran esfuerzo para comprar un tanque de enfriamiento, ya que la produccin que sacan les queda muy lejos para ir a entregar, en ese sentido, ser de mayor beneficio para la clienta y sus dems compaeras. Actualmente la clienta vive en la localidad de Esquilan Chico que se encuentra en la Provincia de Quillacollo del Departamento de Cochabamba.
texts.en: Our client, Elsa, lives alone. She is single and does not have any children. Her business is producing raw milk. Elsa currently has three head of dairy cattle which are producing milk and one head of dairy cattle which is pregnant. Her loan will be used to buy a milk cooling tank. A group of people are making a big effort to buy a cooling tank as the milk that their cows produce travels a long way to be delivered. This purchase will be a great benefit for our client and also for her fellow dairy farmers. Our client currently lives in the village of Esquilan Chico which is located in Quillacollo province, in Cochabamba department.

loan.use: to (jointly) buy a milk cooling tank

loan.name: Yanet

texts.es: La socia pertenece al banco comunal SEOR DE WIMPILLAY CHOCO; el banco se encuentra ubicado en el Distrito de Huanchac en la Provincia de Cusco y Departamento de Cusco. La socia Yanet, es soltera y tiene 4 hijas mujeres dos de ellas de 18 aos de edad, 16, 14; la socia tiene 37 aos de edad, la socia trabaja elaborando y preparando desayunos por las maanas en forma ambulatoria y ahora est deseando viajar a Iquique Chile para comprar celulares y repuestos de celulares para traer a vender aqu, la socia traer de Tacna y de Chile algunos celulares para ver cmo funciona el negocio de la venta de celulares y accesorios, repuestos y todo lo referente a este negocio. La socia desea el crdito para invertir en la compra de celulares y accesorios ms los repuestos de los mismos. La socia solicita el prstamo para invertir en la compra de celulares y accesorios para la venta. La socia agradece el apoyo que se le otorgara y as mismo se compromete a cumplir de manera disciplinada con los pagos de las cuotas.
texts.en:
Yanet is a member of the "Seor de Wimpillay Choco" community bank which is located in Huanchac district, in Cusco province and department.
Yanet is single and has four daughters. Two of them are already women (18 years old) and the other two are 16 and 14. Yanet is 37 years old. She works making breakfasts in the mornings which she then sells as an itinerant street vendor. She would currently like to travel to Iquique, in Chile, to buy cell phones and [cell phone] spare parts which she will bring back and sell here. She will bring some cell phones back from Tacna and Chile to see how the business of selling cell phones, accessories and parts goes. She would like this loan to buy cell phones, accessories and spare parts.
Yanet is grateful for the support that she is being given and pledges to make her repayments in a disciplined manner.

loan.use: to invest in buying cell phones and accessories to sell

loan.name: Anonymous
loan.use: to purchase clothes such as pants, shirts, sweaters, and ponchos

loan.name: Elena

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal TRES DE MAYO DE POROY; El banco est ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco, y departamento de Cusco.
La socia es la Sra. Elena; ella tiene 39 aos de edad y es casada y tiene 3 hijos; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de venta de chompas, ella teje chompas y lo vende en las diferentes ferias en la ciudad de Cusco, ella vende desde las 9:00 a.m hasta las 6:00 p.m, por medio de este negocio la socia saca adelante a sus hijos, la socia quiere ampliar y mejorar el negocio de venta de chompas. La socia solicita el prstamo para comprar materiales para hacer las chompas como lana, botones e hilos.
La socia est feliz por el prstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
The member belongs to the Tres de Mayo de Poroy Communal Bank, located in the Cusco district in the province of Cusco and department of Cusco.
Elena is 39 years old and married with three children. She alternates her daily activities with her business selling sweaters. She knits sweaters and sells them in the different markets in Cusco. She sells from 9 a.m. until 6 p.m. With this business Elena gets her children ahead. She wants to expand and improve her business selling sweaters.
She is requesting the loan to buy materials such as wool, buttons, and yarn to make the sweaters.
Elena is happy about the loan and is committed to making the payments.

loan.use: to buy materials such as wool, buttons, and yarn, to make sweaters.

loan.name: Elsa Maria

texts.es: Elsa Maria se dedica a la venta de mercadera en general. Tiene ms de 5 aos con esta actividad, ella ha tenido sus retos pero ha sabido enfrentarlos muy bien. A pesar de la competencia que Elsa tiene no brindan el carisma y dedicacin que ella tiene con sus clientes. Realiza este crdito con el fin de comprar ropa en general, lpiz labial perfumes, ropa interior, entre otros productos. Ella suea con tener siempre activo s negocio y as seguirle proporcionando a su familia ingresos necesarios.
texts.en: Elsa Maria sells general merchandise. She has been in this business for more than five years. She has faced some challenges but she has known how to deal with them. In spite of the competition that Elsa has, her competitors don't have the charisma and dedication that she has towards her customers. She is requesting this loan to buy clothes, lipsticks, perfume, underwear and other products. She dreams of always keeping her business active so that she can continue providing her family with the income they need.

loan.use: to buy clothes, lipsticks, perfume, underwear, etc.

loan.name: Yander Mauricio

texts.es:
Yander Mauricio es un seor de 36 aos que vive con su esposa e hijos en un pequeo pueblo en Guanacaste llamado la Garita. La Garita es una planicie de clima bastante clido donde se desarrollan actividades. La economa de esta provincia de Guanacaste se fundamenta principalmente en la ganadera, aunque tambin en esta regin se practican la apicultura,acuacultura y el turismo rural.
Desde hace meses don Yander Mauricio ha presentado algunos problemas de salud.
Actualmente Don Yander Mauricio est solicitando un micro crdito de 300.000 (trescientos mil colones) para el pago de consulta y tratamiento mdico, para as respaldar los gastos de chequeo mdico que debe hacerse. Con esto el espera recuperar su salud por completo y continuar su vida normal, junto a su familia.
Don Yander Mauricio es socia de la Empresa de Crdito Comunal La Garita una de las 110 organizaciones socias de EDESA en Costa Rica. Este ser su primer crdito, y espera poder seguir participando de manera ms activa en este tipo de organizaciones. Y nos afirma que la ECC ha tenido gran impacto en la comunidad, ya que antes no tenan oportunidades para ayudar econmicamente a los habitantes.
texts.en:
Yander Mauricio is a 36-year-old gentleman who lives with his wife and children in a small village in Guanacaste called La Garita. La Garita is a plain with a fairly warm climate where people are engaged in different business activities. The economy of this province of Guanacaste is mainly based on livestock raising although people in this region also work in beekeeping, fish farming and rural tourism.
Yander Mauricio has been suffering from some health problems for some months.
Yander Mauricio is requesting a micro loan for 300,000 colones to pay for a check-up and cover the cost of some medical treatment. This will enable him to shoulder the expenses of the medical check-up that he needs. As a result, he hopes to be able to make a complete recovery and continue his normal life together with his family.
Yander Mauricio is a member of the La Garita Community Loan Company, one of EDESA's 110 member organizations in Costa Rica. This will be his first loan and he hopes to be able to continue taking part in this type of organization in a more active way. He confirms that the Community Loan Company has had a great impact in his community as, in the past, there weren't opportunities for providing financial help to the local people.

loan.use: to pay for a check-up and medical treatment

loan.name: Cristina

texts.es: La socia pertenece al banco comunal SEOR DE WIMPILLAY CHOCO; el banco se encuentra ubicado en el Distrito de Huanchac en la Provincia de Cusco y Departamento de Cusco. La socia Cristina, tiene 40 aos de edad; es conviviente y tiene 3 hijos de 9, 7, 3 aos de edad, la socia se dedica al comercio minorista, la socia vende granos en las gradas del mercado, ella tambin lava ropa en diferentes domicilios y en algunos hoteles, la socia siempre esta tras de un trabajo para poder mantener a sus hijos y en esta ocasin la socia desea comprar granos al por mayor para implementar su negocio y esto le ayudara a que le compren granos para semillas de sembros, la socia desea a futuro tener un espacio estable, la socia solicita el prstamo para invertir en la compra de granos al por mayor. La socia agradece el apoyo que se le otorgara y as mismo se compromete a cumplir de manera disciplinada con los pagos de las cuotas.
texts.en:
Cristina is a member of the "Seor de Wimpillay Choco" community bank which is located in Huanchac district, in Cusco province and department.
Cristina is 40 years old, lives with her partner, and has three children aged 9, 7 and 3. Her business is making retail sales. Cristina sells grains on the steps of the market. She also washes clothes in private homes and some hotels. She always working so that she can support her children.
On this occasion, Cristina would like to buy grain wholesale to stock her business. This will help her sell grain for seeds which will be sown. In the future, she would like to have a stable sales location. She is requesting this loan to invest in buying grains wholesale.
Cristina is grateful for the support that she is being given and pledges to make her repayments in a disciplined manner.

loan.use: to invest in buying grains wholesale

loan.name: Silvia

texts.es: La seora Silvia tiene ya ms nueve aos con su negocio de venta de ropa usada. Esta solicitando un prstamo para invertir en comprar variedad de mercanca que es (Ropa para mujer, hombres, calzado, juguetes y aparatos elctricos) por el momento no cuenta con el dinero necesario para la inversin que desea invertir en su negocio. Doa Silvia planea pagar el crdito con las ganancias que obtiene de su negocio, ya que si esposo el seor Cesar se encargara de los familiares y escolares de sus dos hijos con el sueldo que recibe como msico.
texts.en:
Silvia has owned her business selling used clothing for more than nine years. She is requesting a loan to invest in buying a range of merchandise (women's and men's clothes, footwear, toys and electrical appliances). Right now, she doesn't have the money she needs to make this investment in her business.
Silvia plans to repay her loan with the profits that she makes from her business as her husband, Cesar, will take charge of the family and the school expenses of their two children with the salary he earns as a musician.

loan.use: to buy clothes for her business

loan.name: Flavia

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal SEOR DE WIMPILLAY CHOCCO; El banco est ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco, y departamento de Cusco.
La socia es la Sra. Flavia; ella tiene 42 aos de edad y es soltera y tiene 6hijos; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de venta de productos ella vende arroz,azcar,leche en forma ambulatoria desde las 9:00 a.m hasta las 7:00 p.m,por medio de este negocio la socia saca adelante a sus hijos, la socia quiere ampliar el negocio de venta de productos. La socia solicita el prstamo para comprar arroz, azcar, leche y fideos al por mayor.
La socia est feliz por el prstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Flavia is a member of the "SEOR DE WIMPILLAY CHOCCO community bank which is located in Cusco district, in Cusco province and department.
Flavia is 42 years old, single, and has six children. She divides her time between her daily activities and her business selling various products. She sells rice, sugar and milk as an itinerant vendor from 9.00am to 7.00pm. Through this work, she gets her children ahead in life. Flavia would like to expand her business. She is requesting this loan to buy rice, sugar, milk and noodles wholesale.
Flavia is happy to be receiving her loan and pledges to make her repayments on time.

loan.use: to buy rice, sugar, milk and noodles wholesale

loan.name: Santos

texts.es: Santos tiene 33 aos, convive con Mara de 30 aos, con quien tiene 03 hijos. Juntos habitan en su casa propia ubicada en la comunidad de Nueva Fortaleza, Pichari. El trabajo al que se dedica es el cultivo de cacao, producto que comercializa en los centros de acopio de su ciudad. Cuenta con una parcela de terreno, ah le dedica la mayor parte del tiempo a sus plantas, fertilzandolas y realizando la poda cada cierto tiempo. l nos comenta que en un inicio le fue muy difcil establecerse, pero el carcter perseverante hizo que no descuidara de sus plantas. Ahora le genera buenas ganancias, y con ella puede cubrir la necesidades de sus hijos. Esta ser su primer crdito con MFP, por el que el se compromete en pagar puntualmente el pago de sus cuotas. Con los 1,000 soles que solicita, contratara jornaleros para que realicen la poda a sus plantas.
texts.en:
Santos is 33, and lives with Mara, 30. They have three children and live in their own house in the community of Nueva Fortaleza, in Pichari district.
He grows cacao, and sells it to the middlemen in the city. He has a parcel of land, and there he devotes most of his time to his plants; fertilizing and pruning them from time to time.
He tells us that in the beginning it was very difficult for him to get established; but due to his persevering nature, he didn't neglect his plants. Now they generate good profits for him, and with those he can pay for his children's necessities.
This will be his first loan with MFP, so he is committed to making his payments on time. With the 1,000 soles he is applying for, he will hire day laborers so that he do the pruning of his plants.

loan.use: To hire day laborers.

loan.name: Miluska E,peratriz

texts.es: La socia pertenece al banco comunal SEOR DE WIMPILLAY CHOCO; el banco se encuentra ubicado en el Distrito de Huanchac en la Provincia de Cusco y Departamento de Cusco. La socia Miluska, la socia tiene 19 aos de edad; la socia es conviviente, la socia tiene 2 hijos de 3 y 6 meses de edad; la socia se dedica a la compra y venta de chatarras, la socia tiene un triciclo en el cual agrupa todo lo que recolecta, la socia va por diferentes barrios con su parlante y pide metales, vidrios y otros residuos, la soca desea invertir el crdito en la compra de residuos slidos para reciclar y para la venta de estos. La socia solicita el prstamo para invertir en la compra de residuos slidos para al almacenar y vender. La socia solicita el prstamo para invertir en la compra de celulares y accesorios para la venta.
texts.en:
The member belongs to the "Senor de Wimpillay Choco" communal bank, which is located in the Huanchac district, in Cusco province and department. Miluska is 19, and in a common-law relationship. She has two children, ages three, and six months.
She works works buying and selling scrap materials. She has a tricycle, in which she collects everything she gathers. She goes through different neighborhoods with her loudspeaker, and asks for metals, glass and other waste materials.
She wants to use the loan to buy recyclable solid waste materials. She is applying for the loan in order to buy, store and sell these materials.
The loan will also be used to buy cellphones and accessories for sale.

loan.use: To buy recyclable waste materials to store and sell.

loan.name: Francisca Enriqueta

texts.es: Francisca Enriqueta tiene 43 aos, su actividad es brindar el servicio de molinos. Ella atiende su negocio desde en la maana pues la mayora de sus clientes siempre quedan satisfechos con sus servicios. Ella es una persona muy amable y que ha aprendido bastante con los crditos que ha realizado. Ella solicita este nuevo crdito para la compra de motor y mantenimiento para sus molinos.
texts.en:
Francisca Enriqueta is 43 years old. Her business is providing milling services. She tends her business from early in the morning, and the majority of her customers are always satisfied with her services. She is a very friendly person who has learned a great deal through the loans she has had.
She is applying for this new loan in order to buy a motor, and to pay for maintenance of her mills.

loan.use: To buy a motor and pay for maintenance of her mills.

loan.name: Anonymous
loan.use: to buy cloth, perfumes, shoes, and soaps to resell

loan.name: Yovanna

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal TRES DE MAYO DE POROY; El banco est ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco, y departamento de Cusco.
La socia es la Sra. Yovanna; ella tiene 28 aos de edad y es conviviente y tiene 1 hijos; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de compra y venta de animales menores como cuyes, chanchos y gallinas, ella vende en forma ambulatoria y tambin lleva a diferentes mercados, la socia los hace crecer y engordar y luego los vende, por medio de este negocio la socia saca adelante a sus hijos, la socia quiere ampliar y mejorar el negocio de venta de animales menores. La socia solicita el prstamo para comprar cuyes, chanchos y gallinas y tambin para comprar alimentos para los animales.
La socia est feliz por el prstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Yovanna belongs to the "Tres de Mayo de Poroy" communal bank, located in the Cusco district, which is part of Cusco province and department. Yovanna is 28, in a common-law relationship, and has one child.
She alternates her daily chores with the buying and selling of smaller animals such as guinea pigs, pigs, chickens. She sells door-to-door, and also carries on her business at different markets. She raises and fattens the animals and then sells them. By means of this business, she is helping her family get ahead in life. She wants to expand and improve her business of selling smaller animals.
She is applying for the loan in order to buy guinea pigs, pigs and chickens and also to buy feed for the animals. She is happy to receive the loan, and is committed to making her instalment payments.

loan.use: To buy guinea pigs, pigs, chickens, and animal feed.

loan.name: Unifredo

texts.es: Unifredo tiene 48 aos, convive con Esterfilia de 46 aos, con quien tiene 04 hijos. Juntos habitan en su casa propia ubicada en la comunidad de Nueva fortaleza, Pichari. Apenas estudio la primaria, debido a faltas econmicas, pero eso no lo impidi a seguir adelante. Es as que logr tener su propio campo agrcola, ah siembra caf y cacao, productos que tiene mucha demanda en el mercado nacional e internacional, asimismo afirma que stos productos estn bajo un sistema de cultivo rganico, eso ha hecho que su produccin sea de calidad. Gracias a todo ste trabajo es que puede ahora percibir buenas ganancias. En ocasiones recibe la ayuda de su esposa e hijos, pero cuando se necesita cosechar, necesariamente debe contratar jornaleros para que realicen con mayo rpidez la extraccin. Este ser su primer crdito con MFP, por lo que se compromete en pagar puntualmente el pago de sus cuotas. Con los 1,000 soles que solicita, contratar jornaleros para que limpien sus plantas de caf y cacao.
texts.en:
Unifredo is 48, and lives with Esterfilla 46. They have four children, and live in their own house in the community of Nueva Fortaleza in Pichari district. He barely completed primary schooling due to the lack of financial resources, but that didn't stop him from moving forward. In this way, he managed to acquire his own land.
He grows coffee and cacao, products that are are in great demand in the national and international markets. Also, he says that these products are grown organically; which has resulted in his production being of high quality.
Thanks to all this work, he can now earn earn good profits. Sometimes his wife and children help him, but when the crop needs to be harvested, he must necessarily hire day laborers so that the harvest can be carried out more quickly.
This will be his first loan with MFP, so he is committed to making his instalment payments on time. With the 1,000 soles he is applying for, he will hire day laborers to weed his coffee and cacao plants.

loan.use: To hire day laborers.

loan.name: Gabriela

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal TRES DE MAYO DE POROY; El banco est ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco, y departamento de Cusco.
La socia es la Sra. Gabriela; ella tiene 27 aos de edad y es casada; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de venta de artesana como chompas, pantalones, polos y muecas, ella vende en forma ambulatoria desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 6:00 p.m,por medio de este negocio la socia saca adelante a sus hijos, la socia quiere ampliar y mejorar el negocio de venta de artesana. La socia solicita el prstamo para comprar chompas, polos, pantalones, muecas y llaveros al por mayor.
La socia est feliz por el prstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
The member belongs to the Tres de Mayo de Poroy Communal Bank, located in the Cusco district in the province of Cusco and department of Cusco.
Gabriela is 27 years old and married. She alternates her daily activities with her business selling crafts such as sweaters, pants, jerseys, and dolls.
