She sells on foot from 8 a.m. until 6 p.m. With this business Gabriela gets her children ahead. She wants to expand and improve her business selling crafts.
Gabriela is requesting the loan to buy wholesale sweaters, jerseys, pants, dolls, and key rings.
She is happy about the loan and is committed to making the payments.

loan.use: to buy wholesale sweaters, jerseys, pants, dolls, and key rings.

loan.name: Nataliya

texts.en: Natalya is married and has a daughter. Their small family lives in the town of Pavlograd. Natalya has her own business. She sells women's coats and jackets. Her retail outlet is located in a successful place. Natalya has been involved in this business for over 7 years. She is a hard-working person. Natalya is also polite to her customers. The business income plays a big role in the family's budget. Natalya is requesting a loan in the sum of 20 000 hryvnia to buy new coats and jackets for the fall season.

loan.use: to buy new coats and jackets for the fall season

loan.name: Sonia

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal TRES DE MAYO DE POROY; El banco est ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco, y departamento de Cusco.
La socia es la Sra. Sonia; ella tiene 36 aos de edad y es conviviente y tiene 3 hijos; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de salchipapas que es un plato a base de papas y salchichas, ella tiene una carreta donde vende las salchipapas, ella vende en forma ambulatoria desde las 4:00 a.m hasta las 11:00 p.m, por medio de este negocio la socia saca adelante a sus hijos, la socia quiere ampliar el negocio de venta de salchipapas. La socia solicita el prstamo para comprar papas y salchichas al por mayor.
La socia est feliz por el prstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
The member belongs to the communal bank, "Tres de Mayo de Poroy." The bank is located in the district of Cusco, which belongs to the province of Cusco, and department of Cusco.
The member is Sonia, she is 36 years old, cohabiting, and has 3 children. Sonia alternates her daily activities with the her business of selling salchipapas, which is a dish of potatoes and sausages. She has a cart where she sells the salchipapas door to door from 4:00 am until 11:00 pm. Through this business, Sonia raises her children. Sonia wants to expand the business of selling salchipapas so she is requesting the loan to buy potatoes and sausage in bulk.
Sonia is happy for the loan and agrees to comply with the payment of her dues.

loan.use: to buy potatoes and sausage in bulk.

loan.name: Darwin Jose

texts.es: Darwin Jos tiene su pulpera, desde hace mas de 6 aos que tiene este negocio. La lucha constante que realiza por brindarles a sus 2 hijos menores de edad a su cargo lo necesario ha proporcionado mejor estabilidad a su familia. Empieza a atender a sus clientes desde las 7 de la maana hasta las 10 de la noche sus clientes son amigos, vecinos y familiares que siempre le solicitan variedad en sus productos. El motivo del crdito es para la compra granos bsicos, sopas, enlatados, detergentes, papel higinico entre otros.
texts.en:
Darwin Jos has had a grocery store for over six years. His constant struggle to provide his two minor children in his care with everything they need has led to improved family stability.
He starts to tend to his customers at 7am and continues until 10pm. His customers are his friends, neighbors and family members who always seek out the variety of his products. The reason for the loan is to buy basic grains, soups, canned goods, detergent and toilet paper, among others.

loan.use: to buy stock items for his store.

loan.name: Susana

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal TRES DE MAYO DE POROY; El banco est ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco, y departamento de Cusco.
La socia es la Sra. Susana; ella tiene 26 aos de edad y es conviviente y tiene 1 hijo; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de venta de pia, ella tiene un carreta donde vende pia en rodajas, ella vende en las diferentes calles de la ciudad de Cusco desde las 9:00 a.m hasta las 5:00 p.m, la socia quiere ampliar y mejorar el negocio de venta de pias. La socia solicita el prstamo para comprar pias al por mayor.
La socia est feliz por el prstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Susana, 26, is a member of the Tres de Mayo de Poroy communal bank thats located in Cusco District belonging to Cusco Province and Department.
She has a spouse and a son. She alternates her daily chores with a business selling pineapples. She has a cart where she sells sliced pineapple in various streets in the city of Cusco from 9am until 5pm.
Shed like to expand and improve the pineapple sales business and is asking for a loan to buy pineapples at wholesale. She is happy about the loan and commits to make her installment payments.

loan.use: to buy pineapples at wholesale.

loan.name: Alex

texts.es:
El socio pertenece al banco comunal TRES DE MAYO DE POROY; El banco est ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.
El socio es el Sr. Alex; el tiene 22 aos de edad y es soltero; El socio alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de venta de rboles frutales, el socio vende arboles a diferentes personas que tienen terrenos de cultivo y tambin vende arboles pequeos para adornos, el socio vende en forma independiente, el socio qui9ere ampliar y mejorar el negocio de venta de arboles. El socio solicita el prstamo para comprar rboles frutales y arboles pequeos.
El socio est feliz por el prstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
The member belongs to the Tres de Mayo de Poroy Communal Bank, located in the Cusco district in the province of Cusco and department of Cusco.
Alex is 22 years old and single. He alternates his daily activities with his business selling fruit trees. He sells trees to different people who have croplands, and he also sells small trees for decoration. Alex is self-employed. He wants to expand and improve his business selling trees.
Alex is requesting the loan to buy fruit trees and small trees.
He is happy about the loan and is committed to making the payments.

loan.use: to buy fruit trees and small trees.

loan.name: Veronica

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal SEOR DE WIMPILLAY CHOCCO; El banco est ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco, y departamento de Cusco.
La socia es la Sra. Vernica; ella tiene 32 aos de edad y es conviviente y tiene 2 hijos; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de artesana, ella hace trabajos en trenzado, ella hace trabajos como pulseras, collares y aretes, ella vende en forma ambulatoria desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 9:00 p.m, por medio de este negocio la socia saca adelante a sus hijos, la socia quiere ampliar el negocio de artesana. La socia solicita el prstamo para comprar materiales como lanas y tejedores.
La socia est feliz por el prstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Vernica is a member of the SEOR DE WIMPILLAY CHOCCO community bank which is located in Cusco district, in Cusco province and department.
Vernica is 32 years old, lives with her partner, and has two children. She divides her time between her daily activities and her craft business. She weaves items such as bracelets, necklaces and earrings. She sells her products as an itinerant vendor from 8.00am to 9.00pm. Through this work, she gets her children ahead in life. She would like to expand her craft business. She is requesting a loan to buy yarn and weaving supplies.
Vernica is happy to be receiving her loan and pledges to make her repayments on time.

loan.use: to buy yarn and weaving supplies

loan.name: Tomas

texts.es: A la vivienda del seor Tomas le est haciendo falta los acabados del exterior e interior. Esta solicitando un prstamo para comprar el material que es cemento, arena y pintura especial para la vivienda, ya que en este momento no cuenta con el dinero necesario ya que el se encargara de realizar la mejora en horario adicional a su empleo. Don Tomas planea pagar el crdito con una parte de las ganancias que obtiene de su trabajo en una fbrica en produccin, es la fuente de ingreso que tiene para su familia. Ya que su esposa la seora Estela se dedica al cuidado y atencin de sus hijos. Desea mejorar el patrimonio y la calidad de vida de su familia y evitar enfermedades.
texts.en:
Tomas' home needs some finishing work carrying out to both the outside and the inside. He is requesting a loan to buy material such as cement, sand and special paint for the house. Right now, he does not have the money he needs. He will carry out this improvement work outside of his normal work hours.
Tomas plans to repay his loan with some of the money that he makes from his job in a factory. This is the source of income that he has for supporting his family. His wife, Estela, takes care of their children.
Tomas would like to improve his property, improve his family's quality of life and avoid illnesses.

loan.use: to carry out some finishing work to the outside and inside of his home (paint)

loan.name: Ana Cecilia

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal SEOR DE WIMPILLAY CHOCCO; El banco est ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco, y departamento de Cusco.
La socia es la Sra. Ana Cecilia; ella tiene 31 aos de edad y es conviviente y tiene 2 hijos; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de tienda de abarrotes y tambin tiene un negocio de peluquera, ella atiende desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 7:00 p.m, por medio de este negocio la socia saca adelante a sus hijos, la socia quiere ampliar el negocio de tienda de abarrotes y negocio de peluquera. La socia solicita el prstamo para comprar productos para la tienda de abarrotes como arroz, azcar, mantequilla y leche al por mayor y para comprar materiales para la peluquera como tintes, ruleros y tijeras.
La socia est feliz por el prstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Ana Cecilia is a member of the SEOR DE WIMPILLAY CHOCCO community bank which is located in Cusco district, in Cusco province and department.
Ana Cecilia is 31 years old, lives with her partner, and has two children. She divides her time between her daily activities, her grocery store business and her hairdressing salon. She serves her customers from 8.00am to 7.00pm and, through her businesses, she gets her children ahead in life. Ana Cecilia would like to expand her grocery store business and her hairdressing business. She is requesting this loan to buy products wholesale for her grocery store (rice, sugar, butter and milk), and to buy materials for her hairdressing salon (such as dyes, rollers and scissors).
Ana Cecilia is happy to be receiving her loan and pledges to make her repayments on time.

loan.use: to buy products wholesale for her grocery store (rice, sugar, butter and milk), and to buy materials for her hairdressing salon (dyes, rollers and scissors)

loan.name: Danelia De Los Angeles

texts.es: Danelia De Los ngeles tiene 35 aos, su actividad es la venta de mercadera en general. Hace ms de 2 aos que tiene este negocio, inicio por la necesidad de buscar nuevos ingresos para ella y su familia. Ella se siente contenta porque esta experiencia es muy reconfortante pues no es la primera vez que realiza financiamientos. Tiene 2 hijos de 5 y 15 aos respectivamente a quienes diariamente les ensea valores y trabajar arduamente. El motivo del crdito es para la compra de ropa, perfumes, cremas, lpiz labial, polvos, ropa interior, prendas de oro laminado y plata.
texts.en:
Danelia De Los ngeles is 35 years old. Her business is selling general merchandise. She has been in this business for more than two years. She started out as she needed to find new income for herself and her family. Danelia feels happy because this experience is very comforting. This is not the first time that she has taken out a loan.
Danelia has two children aged 5 and 15. Every day she teaches them values and to work hard. The purpose of this loan is to buy clothes, perfume, creams, lipsticks, powders, underwear, and gold- and silver-plated jewelry.

loan.use: to buy clothes, perfume, creams, lipsticks, powders, underwear, and gold- and silver-plated jewelry

loan.name: Ludmila

texts.en: Ludmila is a widow and a mother of four children. She started her business 8 years ago because she had no other option to support her family. Thanks to her persistence and decisiveness, Ludmila was able to develop her business, which became a small, but stable source of income. Ludmila is requesting a loan in the sum of 5,000 hryvnia to purchase seasonal merchandise. She hopes to make an additional profit and buy a kitchen food processor.

loan.use: to buy seasonal merchandise

loan.name: Reinaldo

texts.es: El cliente, REINALDO, tiene un hijo, es casado, son de familia humilde, el cliente se dedica a la produccin de la leche cruda, actualmente cuenta con 6 cabezas de ganado lechero en produccin, y 2 cabezas de ganado lechero preadas. El destino del crdito es para comprar un tanque de enfriamiento, donde un grupo de personas estn haciendo ese esfuerzo de comprar un tanque de enfriamiento, ya que la produccin que sacan les queda muy lejos para ir a entregar, en ese sentido, ser de mayor beneficio para el cliente y sus dems compaeros. Actualmente el cliente vive en la localidad de Esquilan Chico que se encuentra en la Provincia de Quillacollo del Departamento de Cochabamba.
texts.en: Our client, Reinaldo, is married and has one child. His is a humble family. Our client produces raw milk. He currently has six head of dairy cattle which are producing milk and two head of dairy cattle which are pregnant. The purpose of his loan is to buy a milk cooling tank. A group of people are making this joint effort to buy a cooling tank as the milk their cows produce must travel a long way to be delivered. It will be a great benefit for our client and his fellow dairy farmers. Our client currently lives in the village of Esquilan Chico which is located in Quillacollo province, in Cochabamba department.

loan.use: to (jointly) buy a milk cooling tank

loan.name: Anonymous
loan.use: to buy oil, rice, meat, chicken, cabbage, tortillas, etc.

loan.name: Eva

texts.es: Eva integrante del Banco comunal Los Jardines perteneciente a la comuna de Pealoln. Se dedica al rubro de los servicios y comercio, ya que atiende un ciber, bazar y paquetera, desde hace tres aos. Comenta que en su local cuenta con 8 computadores, carga de celulares, tarjetas para el transporte vehicular (Transantiago), por lo que tambin entrega diferentes servicios. Su local est ubicado en el ante jardn de la casa de su suegra. Sus productos los compra directamente en las distribuidoras y a los proveedores, ya que necesita insumos como CD, para fotos y msica. Con el crdito comprar una maquina fotocopiadora, ya que tena una en mal estado. Sus metas son ampliar su local o arrendar uno ms grande, para acrecentarlo con mas computadores, espera contar con 15 PC. Eva vive junto a su marido y sus dos hijos de 11 y 7 aos de edad. Sus sueos en el mbito personal son recorrer el pas en un viaje. Ella est muy contenta y agradecida de los servicios brindados por Fondo Esperanza, ya que le ha dado la oportunidad de invertir en su negocio y crecer como persona. El grupo del Banco comunal al cual pertenece, es unido, solidario y responsable. Respecto a las capacitaciones, ha aprendido de contabilidad para administrar mejor su negocio. Pealoln se localiza al oriente de la regin metropolitana. Cuenta con diversos atractivos tales como vias, edificios considerados patrimonio histrico y sitios naturales de excursin, elementos que estn transformando a esta comuna en un nuevo panorama turstico dentro de la regin Metropolitana.
texts.en:
Eva is a member of the Los Jardines (The Gardens) communal bank belonging to Pealoln commune. She provides services and is a merchant. She runs an Internet caf, variety store and packaging service; shes been in business for three years.
She comments that in her location she has 8 computers, she sells cell phone recharge time, vehicle transportation cards (Transantiago) and she also provides other services. Her store is located in the front yard of her mother-in-laws house.
She buys her products directly from distributors and suppliers since she needs supplies like CDs for photos and for music.
She will use the loan to buy a photocopier since the one she had was in pretty bad shape. Her goals are to expand her locale or rent a bigger one to add more computers; she hopes to have 15 PCs.
She lives with her husband and two children who are 11 and 7 years old. Her dream on a personal level is to take a trip around her country.
She is very happy with and grateful for the services provided by Fondo Esperanza because its provided her with the opportunity to invest in her business and to grow as a person.
The group of the communal bank shes a member of is very united, mutually supportive and responsible. With respect to the training, shes learned bookkeeping to better manage her business.
Pealoln is located to the east of the metropolitan region. It has several attractions like vineyards, buildings considered to be national relics and natural exploration areas, elements that are turning this commune into a new tourism destination within the metropolitan region.

loan.use: to buy a photocopier.

loan.name: Alla

texts.en:
Alla is married with four children. She rents a space at the central department store in her small city and sells childrens clothing. Her profit is 3,400 UAH per month.
Alla has been in this business for 15 years. During this time she has been able to win many repeat customers. She enjoys selling children's clothing and helps the parents to choose good clothing for their children.
Alla would like to borrow 15,000 UAH to increase the assortment of her inventory. She hopes to receive additional income and spend it on her family needs.

loan.use: to increase the assortment of her inventory.

loan.name: Yana

texts.en: Yana is a buoyant and active person. She is married and, with husband Vadim, has a seven-year-old son. Yana has her own business. She sells jeans, skirts and dresses at the city central market. She is always kind to her customers, and this is why her business is flourishing. She achieved good results in two years and does not plan to stop there. Yana believes that extensive selection and reasonable prices will help her increase her income. This business supports the family. Yana is requesting a loan in the sum of 20,000 hryvnia to expand the selection of her fall merchandise. She plans to use the resulting profit to improve her living conditions.

loan.use: to expand her selection of fall merchandise

loan.name: Las Trabajadoras Group

texts.es: Las Trabajadoras se denomina el grupo D. mujeres conformado en la ciudad D. Ita, gracias a que la actual Directora General la Seora Vernica, contact con la asesora para informarse D. la forma D. trabajo que tiene el Comit D. Mujeres Emprendedoras, una vez asesorada acerca del Programa logr juntar a 14 mujeres quienes se encuentran trabajando muy a gusto en el segundo ciclo, en forma conjunta y solidaria dentro sel programa. Todas ellas realizan actividades para recaudar fondos, se ayudan mutuamente para llegar a los objetivos en comn. La seora Vernica es una D. las miembros, ella se dedica a la venta D. gallinas, comenta que tiene muchos pedidos D. esto. Gracias a su trabajo ella ha logrado sacar adelante a su familia y cubrir los gastos diarios D. la casa. Est muy orgullosa D. lo que hace, por lo que quiere seguir con el negocio. Solicita el crdito para la compra D. gallinas y alimentos para estas. Agradece a la Fundacin por la oportunidad que esta le da.
texts.en:
Las Trabajadoras (The Women Workers) is the name of a group of women that was established in the city of Ita, thanks to the efforts of the current Director General, Sra. Vernica. She contacted a program consultant to obtain information about the requirements for participating in the Committee of Women Entrepreneurs Program. Once she was advised about the program, she was able to gather 14 women who are now working comfortably together in their second loan cycle. They have worked in a cooperative and unified manner as part of the program. All of them participate in fundraising activities, thereby helping one another reach their common objectives.

Sra. Vernica is one of the members who sells chickens. She says that she gets many requests for her animals. Thanks to her work, she has been able to move her family forward and cover the daily household expenses. Vernica is very proud of what she has accomplished and wants to continue with her business. She is requesting a loan to buy chickens and feed for them. Vernica is grateful to Fundacin Paraguaya for the opportunity that has been given to her.

loan.use: to buy chickens and poultry feed.

loan.name: Anibal

texts.es: El seor Anibal es de la ciudad de Santan, tiene 47 aos de edad, est casado con la Seora Isidora con 43 aos de edad. Tienen 4 Hijos, todos mayores de edad, trabajan independientes. Posee una Despensa en su domicilio particular, lo cual, segn el comenta es el sustento de su familia. En cuanto a su clientela dice que diariamente muchas personas se acercan hasta su negocio, pues el les brinda una buena atencin y as tambin buenos precios. El se define como un seor muy trabajador, luchador y pos obre todo muy emprendedor. El solicita el crdito para la compra de bebidas, comestibles, lcteos y otros productos de primera necesidad, los cuales son indispensables para su negocio. Agradece a la Fundacin por la oportunidad que esta le da.
texts.en:
Mr. Anibal is from the city of Santan. He is 47 years old and is married to Ms. Isidora, 43. They have 4 children; all are grown and work independently.
He has a grocery store in his home that he says is the means of support for his family. As for his clientele, he says that every day many people come by his store. He attends to them diligently and sets good prices. He defines himself as a hardworking man, a fighter, and above all, very enterprising.
He is requesting the loan to purchase drinks, foods, dairy products, and other basic necessities that are essential to his business. He thanks the foundation for the opportunity that the loan provides him

loan.use: purchase drinks, foods, dairy products, and other basic necessities.

loan.name: Marta

texts.es: La Seora Marta tiene 52 aos D. edad, est casada y tiene con 4 hijos, es D. la ciudad D. Paraguar, desD. hace ms D. 15 aos vive en casa propia con su marido el Seor Angel. Marta se dedica a la venta D. chipa desD. hace ms D. 2 aos con su marido y dos hijas que tambin empezaron a trabajar en el mismo ramo ya que con el obtienen muy buen ingreso mensual aparte D. que tienen una clientela y zona D. venta formada. Ella comenta que su negocio le genera muy buenos ingresos ya que la chipa, en Paraguay, es muy consumida por todos. Dice que es un negocio con el cual le gustara poder seguir e ir creciendo ms y ms cada da. Ella solicita el crdito para la compra D. materia prima, como ser almidn, manteca, harina, huevo, queso y otros para la elaboracin D. la chipa.
texts.en:
Marta, 52, is married with four children. She's from the city of Paraguar and has lived in her own house with her husband Angel for more than 15 years.
Marta has been selling "chipa" [cheese rolls] for more than two years with her husband and two daughters, who also began to work in the same field since they receive a very good monthly income as well as having customers and an established sales area.
Marta says that her business generates very good earnings for her since everyone in Paraguay eats "chipa." She would like to be able to continue with the business and grow with it more and more every day.
She is requesting the loan to buy manioc starch, lard, flour, eggs, cheese, and other ingredients to make "chipa."

loan.use: to buy manioc starch, lard, flour, eggs, cheese, and other ingredients.

loan.name: Ruth Damaris

texts.es:
La seora Ruth tiene 32 aos de edad. Vive con su esposo y sus dos hijos de 7 y 2 aos de edad.
Ella se dedica a la crianza de ganado bovino (vacas) y porcino (cerdos) con la ayuda de su compaero de vida. Tienen ms de dos aos de realizar esta actividad juntos. La seora Ruth aprendi este trabajo gracias a su mam, pues ella desempeaba esta actividad. Por falta de recursos, la seora Ruth tuvo que abandonar sus estudios universitarios en su tercer ao de psicologa. Debido a esto se dedic a la crianza de ganado para tener una fuente de ingresos.
Ella compra el ganado en los alrededores de la comunidad donde vive. Cuando una persona le avisa que tiene ganado para la venta, ella va y lo negocia, si le parece lo compra. Una vez comprado, ella tiene que llevarlo a su casa a pie por la calle. Cuando adquiere el ganado en la ciudad ella camina unos cinco kilmetros desde el lugar en donde lo compra hasta su casa.
La seora Ruth solicita un prstamo a Fundacin Campo para la compra de ganado de crianza. Si compra novillas, ella comprar tres; pero si decide comprar vacas lecheras comprar solo una, ya que estas tienen un precio ms alto que las novillas. Con el prstamo ella pretende aumentar la produccin de leche y de esta manera poderla procesar y as vender productos lcteos. Ella ha visto la oportunidad de tener buenos ingresos, ya que hay personas que buscan los productos lcteos en su casa y ella an no los tiene disponibles.
A la seora Ruth tiene planes a futuro, segn sea la produccin y crianza del ganado, de hacerle mejoras a su vivienda. Ella quiere repellar las paredes, mejorar el corredor y el techo, ya que en invierno tiene varias goteras.
texts.en:
Ruth, 32, lives with her husband and their two children, ages 7 and 2.
She raises cows and pigs with the help of her life partner. They have been doing this work together for more than two years. Ruth learned this work thanks to her mother, since she always did this work. Ruth had to abandon her university studies in her third year of studying psychology because of lack of resources. Because of this she started raising livestock, to have a source of income.
She buys the livestock on the outskirts of the community where she lives. When someone tells her they have livestock for sale, she goes and negotiates for it; she buys it if it seems good to her. Once bought, she has to take it to her house on foot through the street. When she acquires the animal in the city, she walks some five kilometers from the place she buys it to her house.
Ruth is requesting a loan from the Campo Foundation to buy livestock to raise. If she buys heifers, she will buy three; but if she decides to buy dairy cows, she will buy only one, since they are more expensive than heifers. With the loan she is trying to to increase the milk production and in this way be able to process it to sell dairy products. She has seen the opportunity to have good income, since people are already looking for dairy products at her house and she doesn't have them available yet.
Ruth's plan for the future is to make improvements to her house, depending on the production and raising of her livestock. She wants to plaster the walls and improve the porch and the roof, since there are various leaks in the winter.

loan.use: to buy livestock.

loan.name: Anatilia Josefa

texts.es: Anatila Josefa tiene su negocio es que es una pulpera. Ella se encuentra muy contenta con su medio de vida. La dedicacin que tiene con su negocio es algo que con las ganancias observa que ha valido la pena el esforzarse diariamente. Es en su vivienda donde est ubicado su negocio y llegan sus diferentes clientes a comprar los vveres necesarios como granos bsicos, detergentes, refrescos, pan, galletas, entre otros.
texts.en: Anatila Josefas business is a grocery store. She is very happy with her way of life. The dedication she has toward her business is something that has borne fruit with profits earned and she notes that its well worth the daily effort. Her store is located in her home and various customers come by to purchase needed foodstuffs like basic grains, detergents, soft-drinks, bread and cookies, among others.

loan.use: to buy stock merchandise for her store.

loan.name: Vladislav

texts.en:
Vladislav has a fairly large business with three sales locations. He wants to purchase seasonal merchandise (mens clothing for autumn and winter) for a large amount because this way it's more profitable - he gets good discounts. Vladislar plans to expand, rent out space in a mall.
Vladislav is not taking out the loan for the first time. He was never late with payments even though he has to come from another town of Energodar. He and his wife used the earned profit to make good remodeling in their apartment. Despite his age (46 years old) a son was born recently in his family.

loan.use: to buy mens clothing for autumn and winter

loan.name: Ramona Antonia

texts.es: Ramona Antonia se dedica a la venta de cosmticos, desde hace mas de 9 aos, ella tiene 2 hijos de los cuales solamente el de 17 aos est bajo su cargo. La forma en cmo distribuye sus productos es de manera ambulante pues la mayora de sus clientes saben que siempre est brindando la mejor atencin a sus clientes pues adems la amplia experiencia que ha obtenido por estos aos ha sido la mejor. Es por eso que solicita el financiamiento para la compra de perfumes, cremas, desodorantes, colonias, bodys, talcos, entre otros.
texts.en: Ramona Antonia has been selling cosmetics for over nine years. She has two children but only the 17-year-old is still in her care. She sells her wares door to door because most of her customers know that she always provides the best customer service because the vast experience shes gained over these years has been the best. Because of this, shes asking for a loan to buy perfume, cream, deodorant, cologne, body wash and talc, among others.

loan.use: to buy cosmetics.

loan.name: Veronica

texts.es: La seora Veronica tiene ya ms de diez aos con su negocio de elaboracin y venta de comida que son (hamburguesas, chiles rellenos, tacos y tortas). Solicita un prstamo para invertir en su negocio en comprar material que es (carnes, verduras, tortillas y pan, tambin necesita comprar platos, vasos) no cuenta con el dinero necesario para realizar la inversin ya que tiene un contrato en una compaa para que les entrega platillos de comida todos los das y no quiere desaprovechar esta oportunidad que se le esta presentando para que su negocio tenga un ingreso mas fijo. Doa Veronica es madre soltera y tiene bajo su responsabilidad un hijo que esta estudiando y quiere que tenga los estudia necesario para su futuro. Planea pagar el crdito con una parte de las ganancias que obtiene de su negocio y que es la fuente de ingreso que tiene para su familia.
texts.en:
Vernica has had her food preparation and sales business for over ten years. She makes hamburgers, stuffed chili peppers, tacos and tortas [Mexican sandwiches].
She is asking for a loan to invest in her business buying supplies like meats, vegetables, tortillas and bread; she also needs to buy dishes and glasses. She does not have the necessary funds to make this investment. She has a contract with a firm to deliver meals to them daily and she doesnt want to waste this opportunity for her business to have a more steady income.
Vernica is a single mother with a son in her care who is in school and she wants him to have the necessary schooling for his future. She plans to repay the loan with profits earned in her business which is her familys source of income.

loan.use: to buy ingredients and supplies for her meal preparation.

loan.name: Flor

texts.es: Flor tiene 36 aos, es una mujer dinmica, emprendedora y muy trabajadora; convive con su pareja, con quien tiene tres hijos de 15, 13 y 1 ao y medio. Juntos habitan en su casa propia comparten los das educando e intentando brindarle s una mejor calidad de vida a sus hijos. Ella se dedica a diversas actividades, pues posee un restaurante ofreciendo desayunos y jugos por las maanas, al medio da expende comida, y por las noches ofrece pollo broaster. Asimismo posee un terreno, a 60 km de su vivienda, en ella siembra productos como el cacao y frutas ctricas, a la vez que cra aves de corral. Su esposo es quien ms la apoya en el trabajo, al igual que sus hijos. Pero el trabajo que ms la apasiona es la de cocinar y eso se demuestra en la buena sazn que tiene, y eso le ha dado mucha ventaja en su negocio, pues son muchos los clientes que recurren a su establecimiento. Este ser el tercer crdito con MFP, y por tanto espera el apoyo de cada uno de ustedes para continuar con su trabajo. Con el monto solicitado, comprar pollitos para criarlos para luego convertirlo en materia prima para la preparacin de sus alimentos.
texts.en:
Flor is 36 years old. She is a dynamic, entrepreneurial and very hard-working woman who lives with her partner. The couple have three children aged 15, 13 and 18 months. They live together in their own home and spend their days educating their children and trying to provide them with a better quality of life.
Flor is engaged in a number of different business activities. She owns a restaurant where she sells breakfasts and juices in the mornings. At midday she sells meals and, in the evenings, she sells fried chicken. She also owns a plot of land, 60km from her home, where she grows products such as cacao and citrus fruits. In addition, she raises poultry. Her husband is the one who supports her the most in her work but her children help too. The work that she is most passionate about is the cooking and this shows in the great flavor that her food has. This gives her a great advantage in her business as she has many customers who come to her establishment.
This will be Flor's third loan from MFP and she hopes to receive your support so that she can continue in her work. She will use the sum she has requested to buy chicks to raise and then turn into ingredients for making her food.

loan.use: to buy chicks

payment.comment: Over-reported by partner. Reduced to local price.

loan.name: La Esperanza Group

texts.es: 17 mujeres D. la ciudad D. Asuncin se unieron con el propsito D. obtener mayores beneficios para su familia por medio del trabajo en conjunto D. las mismas. Actualmente ellas se encuentran en el dcimo ciclo del programa D. mujeres emprendedoras D. la Fundacin Paraguaya. Ellas son mujeres muy trabajadoras, luchadoras y por sobre todo muy comprometidas. La Miryam es una D. las miembros, ella se dedica a la venta D. muebles. Este negocio la ayuda con la manutencin D. la casa, como as tambin D. los otros gastos que surgen da a da. Comenta que tiene buenas ventas ya que sus muebles son D. muy buena calidad. Desea poder seguir con el negocio y D. esa forma seguir manteniendo a su familia. Ella solicita el crdito para la compra D. algunos muebles para abastecer su negocio. Agradece a la Fundacin por la oportunidad que esta le brinda, pues D. obtener el crdito le ser D. gran ayuda.
texts.en:
Seventeen women from the city of Asuncin joined together with the aim of obtaining more money for their families by working together. They are currently in their tenth loan cycle as part of the 'Mujeres Emprendedoras' (Entrepreneurial Women) program run by Fundacin Paraguaya. They are very hard-working, tenacious and, above all, very committed.
Miryam is one of the members of this group. Her business is selling furniture. This business helps her to support her household and to cover other expenses that come up on a day-to-day basis. She tells us that she makes good sales as the furniture she sells is very good quality. She would like to be able to continue in her business and thereby continue supporting her family.
Miryam is requesting this loan to buy some pieces of furniture with which to stock her business. She is grateful to Fundacin Paraguaya for the opportunity that they are giving her as this loan will be a great help to her.

loan.use: to buy furniture to sell

loan.name: Martha

texts.es: La Sra. Martha vive en la comunidad conocida como Esquilan Chico, en la provincia de Quillacollo en el departamento de Cochabamba, junto a sus padres, los cuales son mayores de edad y ella los cuida. La Sra Martha se dedica a la produccin de leche cruda y su posterior venta a la empresa Pil Andina. Actualmente cuenta con 12 cabezas de ganado lechero en produccin y obtiene de las mismas un aproximado de 95 litros diarios. El siguiente crdito que solicita es para la compra de un tanque de leche enfriamiento (el tanque de enfriamiento es un deposito para mantener la leche cruda en buen estado, es de este tanque de donde recoge la Empresa Pil la leche todas las maanas y todas las tardes) el cual en primer lugar tiene un costo aproximado de 13.000$us a 16.000$us, es por esta razn que la compra la estn haciendo conjunta con otras 15 personas de la misma comunidad poniendo 1000$us cada uno. La Sra Martha Al tener el tanque de Enfriamiento ms cerca de su casa podr realizar su trabajo en menos tiempo y poder pasar ms tiempo con sus padres.
texts.en:
Martha lives in a community known as Esquilan Chico in Quillacollo Province, Cochabamba Department with her elderly parents that she cares for. Martha is a raw milk dairy farmer. The milk is sold to the Pil Andina firm. She currently has 12 head of dairy cattle producing and she gets about 95 liters daily from them.
The loan shes asking for is to buy a milk cooling tank (The cooling tank is a storage unit to keep raw milk in good condition. This is the tank that the Pil firm collects the milk from every morning and afternoon).
Its price is between US$13,000 to US$16,000 and this is why the purchase is being made together with 15 other people from the same community; each one is putting in US$1,000. By having a cooling tank closer to home, Martha will be able to do her work in less time and be able to spend more time with her parents.

loan.use: to buy a share in a raw milk cooling tank.

loan.name: Lesya

texts.en: Lesya is married. Her husband's name is Vadim. Together they have a grown son. Lesya has her own business, she sells women's shoes. She selects the merchandise correctly and almost every customer can find what she is looking for. Lesya is diligent and hardworking. A stable profit is very important to her. The income from this business goes towards supporting the family. Lesya is asking to provide her with a loan in the amount of 20,000 hrivna to fulfill the assortment for the autumn and winter season.

loan.use: to fulfill the assortment for the autumn and winter season

loan.name: Juana Lissette

texts.es: Juana Lissette se dedica a la venta de mercadera en general. Hace ms 2 aos que tiene este medio de vida. Ella es una mujer responsable, junto a sus dos hijos menores de edad que estn bajo su cargo es una madre que siempre est pendiente de lo necesario para sus hijos. Ella solicita este crdito para la compra de cosmticos, bolsos, ropa en general, calzado entre otros. El obtener este financiamiento le ser beneficioso para lograr variedad en lo que ofrezca a sus clientes.
texts.en: Juana Lissette sells general merchandise. She has been doing this for more than two years. She is a responsible woman. Her two minor children are in her care, and she is a mother who is always looking out for her children's needs. She is asking for this loan to purchase cosmetics, bags, general clothing, and shoes, among other items. Obtaining this loan will help her achieve variety in the products she offers her customers.

loan.use: to purchase cosmetics, bags, general clothing, and shoes, among other items

loan.name: Angel

texts.es: El Sr. Angel vive en la comunidad conocida como Esquilan Chico en la privincia de Quillacollo en el departamento de Cochabamba, Angel es una persona muy trabajadora. No est casado ni tiene hijos y solo termino colegio hasta primaria desde entonces se dedica al 100 % al cuidado de su ganado lechero. Angel se dedica a la produccin de leche cruda y su posterior venta a la empresa Pil Andina y tambin se dedica a la elaboracin de quesillo y su posterior venta en el mercado de Colcapirhua. Actualmente cuenta con 9 cabezas de ganado lechero en produccin y obtiene de las mismas un aproximado de 90 litros diarios. El siguiente crdito que solicita es para la compra de un tanque de leche enfriamiento (el tanque de enfriamiento es un deposito de leche cruda que se mantiene en buen estado, es de este tanque de donde recoge la Empresa Pil la leche todas las maanas y todas las tardes) el cual en primer lugar tiene un costo aproximado de 13.000$us a 16.000$us, es por esta razn que la compra la estn haciendo conjunta con otras 15 personas de la misma comunidad poniendo 1000$us cada uno. Angel al tener el tanque de enfriamiento cerca de casa podr colocar ms leche en el mismo y tal vez dejar de vender quesillo el cual le toma mucho tiempo.
texts.en:
ngel lives in a community known as Esquilan Chico in Quillacollo Province, Cochabamba Department. ngel is a very hardworking man. Hes not married and has no children. He only completed elementary school and since then has been 100% dedicated to work caring for his dairy cattle. ngel is a raw milk dairy farmer. The milk is sold to the Pil Andina firm. He also makes cheese that he then sells at the Colcapirhua market. He currently has nine head of dairy cattle that he gets about 90 liters of daily production from.
The loan hes asking for is to buy a milk cooling tank (The cooling tank is a storage unit to keep raw milk in good condition. This is the tank that the Pil firm collects the milk from every morning and afternoon). Its price is between US$13,000 to US$16,000 and this is why the purchase is being made together with 15 other people from the same community; each one is putting in US$1,000. By having a cooling tank closer to home, ngel will be able to store more of his milk in it and perhaps be able to stop selling cheese which takes up a lot of his time.

loan.use: to pay his share in a milk cooling tank.

loan.name: David Ulises

texts.es: El Seor David es casado, tiene 29 aos de edad, vive en la ciudad de Pilar, tiene casa propia, donde posee las condiciones bsicas para desarrollar sus actividades dentro del seno familiar y movilidad propia para hacerlo, consistente en una moto. l se dedica a la venta de ropas, vaqueros y otro tipo de prendas. Desarrolla esta actividad hace como 2 aos, posee la infraestructura necesaria para el desarrollo de esta actividad y su local es muy reconocido en la vecindad. Solicita el crdito para invertir en la compra vaqueros, remeras, camisas y otros. Agradece a la Fundacin Paraguaya por el apoyo brindado.
texts.en:
David is 29 years old and married. He lives in the city of Pilar. He has his own house, where he has the basic conditions to develop his business activities within the family. He has his own transportation, a motorcycle, to do so.
He sells outfits, jeans, and other types of clothing. He has been doing this for two years. He has the necessary infrastructure for the development of this business activity. His place is very well-known in the neighborhood.
He is requesting the loan to buy jeans, t-shirts, shirts, and other garments. He is grateful to the Fundacin Paraguaya for the support they have provided.

loan.use: to buy jeans, t-shirts, shirts, and other garments to later sell.

loan.name: Norma Del Carmen

texts.es: Norma Del Carmen se dedica a una pulpera. Es una mujer trabajadora y lo ha demostrado por medio de sus negocios que ha sabido manejarlos muy bien. Con fondos propios fue que ella estableci este medio de vida. Uno de sus mayores desafos ha sido el tiempo, pues ella tiene que estar al pendiente de su negocio, por lo que no es fcil ya que es algo agotador. Este crdito que solicita es para la compra de golosinas, refrescos, pan, detergentes, granos bsicos entre otros.
texts.en: Norma Del Carmen runs a grocery store. She is a hard-working woman and she has demonstrated this through her business which she has known how to run very well. She set up her business with her own funds. One of her biggest challenges has been time as she has to devote herself to her business. This is not easy as it is fairly exhausting. She is requesting this loan to buy candies, soft drinks, bread, detergents, basic grains and other products.

loan.use: to buy candies, soft drinks, bread, detergents, basic grains, etc.

loan.name: Nilda

texts.es: La seora Nilda tiene 39 aos de edad, es madre de 2 hijos, una nia de 10 aos y otro de 15 aos. Su cnyuge le ayuda siempre en todo lo referente a sus negocios. Ella se dedica al comercio. Empez el negocio realizando ventas de comestibles como empanadas, milanesas, luego de a poco fue cargando, vendiendo productos de consumo familiar como fideos, azcar, harina, aceite. Ella comenta que su despensa tiene buenos ingresos ya que tiene una clientela bien determinada que siempre acuden a su negocio. Por medio de esto, y con la ayuda de su marido pueden mantener a sus hijos y tambin a la casa. Ella solicita el crdito para la compra de artculos de primera necesidad como ser fideos, galletas, arroz, aceite, azcar, carne y otros para abastecer su local y de esa forma cumplir con sus clientes.
texts.en:
Nilda is 39 years old and has two children, a 10 year old daughter and a 15 year old. Her husband always helps her with everything in regards to her businesses.
She is a merchant. She started the business by selling food like empanadas and 'milanesas' (a breaded meat dish). After a little while she was stocking up and selling household consumer products such as noodles, sugar, flour, and oil. She says that her grocery store has good earnings because she has well-established customers who always frequent her business. With her customers and her husbands help they able able to support their children and maintain their house.
She is requesting the loan to buy basic needs items like noodles, cookies, rice, oil, sugar, meat, and other items in order to stock her place and meet her customers needs.

loan.use: to buy basic needs items like noodles, cookies, rice, oil, sugar, meat, and other items.

loan.name: Dan

texts.es: Dan tiene 42 aos, convive con pareja, con quien tiene un hijo de 4 meses. Juntos habitan en casa de su madre, en compaa de ella y de sus dos sobrinos. Su prioridad es dar educacin y alimentacin a sus hijos. Su trabajo consiste en la reparacin de vehculos motorizados, para ello cuenta con un pequeo taller que ha montado en casa de su madre. Es as que los moto taxis de la zona recurren a su servicio, pues lo consideran como un buen mecnico, ya que los tres aos de continuo trabajo lo han dado la experiencia suficiente para dar solucin a las fallas mcanicas de dichos vehculos. l trabaja solo, pero hay ocasiones que tiene mucho trabajo, por lo que se ver obligado a contratar un asistente. Espera con el tiempo ampliar su taller, pues desea arreglar tambin furgonetas. Este ser el tercer crdito con MFP, por tanto espera el apoyo de cada uno de ustedes para concretar sus objetivos. Con el monto solicitado, comprar herramientas y materiales para implementar su taller, entre ellas un taladro y repuestos.
texts.en:
Dan is 42 years old, lives with his partner, and has a 4-month-old son. They live in his mother's home together with his mother and his two nephews. Dan's priority is to educate and feed his child. His work is repairing motor vehicles and he has a small repair shop that he set up at his mother's home. The motorcycle taxi drivers in this area use his services as they consider him to be a good mechanic. The three years that he has worked in this job have given him enough experience to provide a solution to the mechanical faults experienced by these vehicles. Dan works alone but there are occasions when he has a lot of work and so he will need to hire an assistant. He hopes, over time, to expand his repair shop as he would also like to repair vans.
This will be Dan's third loan from MFP and he hopes to receive your support in reaching his goals. He will use the sum he has requested to buy tools and materials to equip his repair shop, including a drill and some spare parts.

loan.use: to buy a drill and some spare parts

loan.name: Mery Iralda

texts.es:
Mery Iralda tiene 41 aos de edad es soltera tiene dos hijos, vive con los hijos de dieciocho, diez aos de edad en el Cantn Chillanes Provincia de Bolvar.
La VRC Unin y Progreso la Colombia baja, esta conformada por quince integrantes y est ubicada a 90 minutos de la cooperativa esta ventanilla se dedica a Actividades Agrcolas, siembra de cacao, arroz, maz, Soya pltano, naranja, etc.
Mery se dedica a la agricultura, tiene dos hectreas de terreno ah siembra cacao, arroz, maz, soya, pltano las compras y las ventas lo realiza en San Jos del Tambo cada fin de semana, tambien se dedica a la crianza de pollos.
Solicita el crdito para poder comprar ms terreno, semillas, abonos e insumos para mantener en buenas condiciones los cultivos para lo posterior venderlos.
Con el prstamo le ayudar a suplir necesidades econmicas, Enfrentar desafos que son muy frecuentes como la competencia y las plagas. El sueo es poderse comprar una casa y ms terreno para sembrar ms de lo normal para producir y aumentar los ingresos. . . En los tiempos libres le gusta salir de paseo con los hijos al ro para poderse refrescar.
texts.en:
Mery Iralda is 41 years old, single, and has two children. She lives with her children, aged 18 and 10, in Chillanes canton, in Bolvar province.
The 'Unin y Progreso la Colombia Baja' community bank has fifteen members and is located 90 minutes from our cooperative. The members of this community bank work in farming, growing cacao, rice, corn, soy, bananas, oranges, etc.
Mery is a farmer. She has two hectares of land where she sows cacao, rice, corn, soy and bananas. She makes her purchases and sales in San Jos del Tambo every weekend. she also raises chickens.
Mery is requesting this loan to buy more land, seeds, manure and supplies to keep her crops in good condition so that she can sell them later.
This loan will help Mery to financially cover her needs. She faces very frequent challenges in the form of competition and pests. Her dream is to buy a house and more land so that she can sow and produce more than she does now and increase her income.
In her free time, Mery enjoys going out for walks by the river with her children so that they can cool themselves down.

loan.use: to buy more land, seeds, manure and supplies

loan.name: Anonymous
loan.use: to purchase uniforms for employees and for marketing costs

loan.name: Narcisa De Jesus

texts.es:
Narcisa de Jesus tiene 37 aos de edad es soltera vive con los padres no tiene hijos, vive en el Cantn Chillanes Provincia de Bolvar.
La VRC Unin y Progreso la Colombia baja, esta conformada por quince integrantes y est ubicada a 90 minutos de la cooperativa esta ventanilla se dedica a Actividades Agrcolas, siembra de cacao, arroz, maz, Soya pltano, naranja, etc.
Narcisa se dedica a la agricultura siembra cacao, arroz, maz, soya, pltano las compras y las ventas lo realiza en San Jos del Tambo cada fin de semana.
Solicita el crdito para poder comprar semillas, abonos fertilizantes, urea, insumos y lquidos para mantener en buenas condiciones los cultivos para lo posterior venderlos.
Con el prstamo le ayudar a suplir necesidades econmicas, Enfrentar desafos que son muy frecuentes como la competencia y las plagas.
El sueo es comprarse una casa y un terreno ms para sembrar y aumentar los ingresos.
En los tiempos libres le gusta salir de paseo con los padres.
texts.en:
Narcisa de Jesus is 37 years old, single, and lives with her parents. She does not have any children. She lives in Chillanes canton, in Bolvar province.
The 'Unin y Progreso la Colombia Baja' community bank has fifteen members and is located 90 minutes from our cooperative. The members of this bank work in farming, growing cacao, rice, corn, soy, bananas, oranges, etc.
Narcisa is a farmer who grows cacao, rice, corn, soy and bananas. She makes her purchases and sales in San Jos del Tambo every weekend.
Narcisa is requesting this loan to buy seeds, manure, fertilizers, urea, supplies and liquids to keep her crops in good condition for when she sells them later.
This loan will help Narcisa to financially cover her needs. She faces very frequent challenges in the form of competition and pests.
Narcisa's dream is to buy a house and a further plot of land so that she can sow more and increase her income.
In her free time, Narcisa enjoys going out for walks with her parents.

loan.use: to buy seeds, manure, fertilizers, urea, supplies and liquids

loan.name: Iris

texts.es: Iris tiene 25 aos, es una mujer alegre y emprendedora, convive con su pareja y su hijo de apenas nueve meses. Juntos haboitan en casa de su madre, en compaa de ella y de su hermano menor de siete aos. Ella es consultora de belleza, adems vende cosmticos, pues su profesin es de ser cosmetloga. En as que trabaja en su pequeo salon de belleza, negocio que ha montado en los espacios de casa. Ah llegan amigas, vecinos, familiares y pblico en general, para que les haga el servicio de corte de cabello, tratamiento facial y maquillaje. Tiene tres aos ejerciendo esta actividad y hasta la fecha siempre lo ha hecho sola. Su mator anhelo es tener un local propio para su salon de belleza y que este implementada de la mejor tecnologa. Este ser el tercer crdito con MFP, por lo que espera seguir contando con su ayuda, adems agreadece los prstamos anteriores ya que le ayudo a desarrollar su negocio de a poco. Con el monto solicitado, comprar materiales para implementar su salon de belleza, adems de refaccionar su local y sus muebles.
texts.en:
Iris is 25 years old. She is a cheerful and entrepreneurial woman who lives with her partner and her son who is just nine months old. They live in her mother's house together with her mother and her younger brother who is 7 years old.
Iris is a beauty consultant. She also sells cosmetics. She is a cosmetologist by profession. She works in her small beauty salon which she set up in her house. Her friends, neighbors, family members and members of the general public come there for her to cut their hair, provide them with a facial and do their make-up. She has been in this business for three years and, up to now, she has worked alone. Her greatest wish is to own her own premises for her beauty salon and for them to be equipped with the very best technology.
This will be Iris' third loan from MFP and she hopes to continue receiving your help. She is grateful for her previous loans as they helped her to develop her business. Iris will use the sum she has requested to buy materials to equip her beauty salon. She will also refurbish her premises and furniture.

loan.use: to buy materials to equip her beauty salon, and to refurbish her premises and furniture

loan.name: Trabajadoras Group

texts.es: El comit Trabajadoras nace mediante la gestin y el apoyo de otro comit que se encontraba trabajando en dicho lugar. Este comit es de la Ciudad de San Lorenzo, las integrantes del comit fijaron como objetivo principal el crecimiento de cada una de ellas. Las mismas son reconocidas en el lugar como mujeres muy trabajadoras. La Seora Martina, presidenta del grupo, est casada, con 3 hijos. Ella es una mujer muy emprendedora e innovadora. Ella tiene un negocio, se dedica a la venta de prendas de todo tipo, gracias a este negocio ella ha podido mantener a us familia y todos a quienes de ella dependen. Ella solicita el crdito para la compra de prendas, como ser remeras, camisas, pantalones y dems para la posterior venta. Agradece a la Fundacin por la oportunidad que esta le brinda.
texts.en:
The Trabajadoras (Hard -Working Women) communal bank was born through the effort and support of another communal bank that was working in their location. This communal bank is in the city of San Lorenzo. The members of the group established their primary objective to be the growth of each one of them. They are well-known in their area as very hard-working women.
Martina, the president of the group, is married and has three children. She is a very enterprising and innovative woman. She has a business selling all types of clothes. Thanks to this business she has been able to support her family and everyone who depends on her.
She is requesting the loan to buy clothes like t-shirts, shirts, pants, and others to later sell. She is grateful to the Fundacin for the opportunity they are offering her.

loan.use: to buy clothes like t-shirts, shirts, pants, and others to later sell.

loan.name: Mujeres Emprendedoras Group

texts.es: La Sra. Cristina tiene 3 hijos, es conviviente y tiene 41 aos D. edad actualmente es integrante en la alcanca comunal Mujeres Emprendedoras grupo conformado por 5 socios que se dedican a diversas actividades D. comercio. Cristina trabaja desD. hace 10 aos en la venta D. plstico gas y carbn , trabaja en el mercado D. su distrito este trabajo surge por que a su esposo no le alcanzaba el sueldo para mantener a sus tres hijos y es asi que cristina pone su negocio D. vender plasticos con el tiempo se hizo D. un capital y compro carbon y gas para vender cristina trabajo muy duro junto a su esposo,hoy en dia tienen clientes fidelizados y el negocio sigue creciendo, gracias a su esfuerzo y dedicacin a logrado mejores ingresos econmicos, , poco apoco fue comprando cosas para su hogar, sus hijos tienen educacion privada y sobre todo su familia cuenta con una mejor calidad D. vida, con el fin D. seguir creciendo a solicitado un nuevo prstamo para comprar (plasticos, carbon, gas) .Sabemos que Cristina cumplir sus metas con mucho trabajo y esfuerzo y que los prstamos D. Edaprospo le ayudaran.
texts.en:
Cristina is 41 years old, lives with her common-law husband, and has three children. She is currently a member of the 'Mujeres Emprendedoras' (Entrepreneurial Women) community bank which has five members who work in different commercial activities.
Cristina has been selling plastic products, gas and charcoal for ten years. She works in her district market. She started out in this line of work because her husband's salary wasn't enough to support their three children and so she set up a business selling plastic products. Over time, she gathered together some capital and bought charcoal and gas to sell. Cristina and her husband both worked very hard. They now have loyal customers and their business continues to grow. Thanks to her effort and commitment, Cristina has managed to improve their financial income. She has gradually been buying things for their home, their children have a private education and, above all, her family enjoys a better quality of life. With the aim of continuing to grow her business, she has requested a new loan to buy plastic products, charcoal and gas. We know that Cristina will achieve her goals with a lot of work and effort, and the loans from Edaprospo will help her.

loan.use: to buy merchandise (plastic products, charcoal and gas)

loan.name: Najah

texts.en:
Najah is a 46-year-old woman. She is married and has three sons and two daughters. Two of her sons are employed with decent salaries. Her husband works in the grocery store the family has.
Najah wants to support her husband in expanding the grocery store by purchasing more groceries to have better sales and increase the family income. Najah needs to take a loan in the amount of $3,000 from FATEN. Najah is a conservative woman so her husband is photographed instead.

loan.use: to improve her grocery store by purchasing more groceries for sale.

loan.name: Ketty

texts.es: Ketty tiene 33 aos, es una mujer alegra y muy trabajadora, convive con su pareja y sus dos hijos, de 14 y 9 aos. Juntos habitan en su casa propia, en donde reina la alegra y la unidad familiar, pero sobre todo las ganas de salir adelante. El trabajo que realiza es la costura, en donde compone cierres, vestidos, pantalones y blusas; as como confecciona nuevos diseos en lencera. ste trabajo lo aprendi desde muy nia, pero viene ejercindolo hace tres aos, y hasta el momento esta a gusto con lo que hace, adems que le permite tener tiempo para cuidar de sus hijos. Su mayor prioridad es comprar una remalladora, de esa manera le facilitara la confeccion de prendas intimas y que tengan un buen acabado. Este ser el tercer crdito con MFP, por tanto espera la colaboracin de todos ustedes para continuar trabajado. Con el monto solicitado, comprar una maquina remalladora y algunos materiales para continuar confeccionando.
texts.en:
Ketty is 33 years old. She is a cheerful and very hard-working woman who lives with her partner and her two children aged 14 and 9. They live together in their own home where happiness and family unity reign. Above all, they have a desire to get ahead in life.
Ketty's business is sewing. She makes dresses, pants and blouses, and also makes new designs in lingerie. She learned this work when she was very young and has been working in the business for three years. Up to now, she is happy with what she does. In addition, it gives her time to look after her children. Her main priority is to buy a hemming machine which will help her to sew her lingerie and enable her to finish the garments off well.
This will be Ketty's third loan from MFP. She hopes to be able to count on your cooperation so that she can continue working. Ketty will use the sum she has requested to buy a hemming machine and some material so that she can continue sewing.

loan.use: to buy a hemming machine and materials for making lingerie

payment.comment: Over-reported by partner. Reduced to local price.

loan.name: Maria Auxiliadora Group

texts.es: Este Comit se form gracias a la Seora Ramona, es un grupo antiguo, fueron saliendo adelante, cada integrante tiene su propia actividad. Todas ellas son de la ciudad de Villa Elisa. Todas las mujeres son muy trabajadoras y responsables. Una de las miembros es la seora Ramona, ella tiene una despensa, mediante la cual ella mantiene a su familia y todas las personas que de ella dependen. Comenta que tiene muchas ventas, pues tiene muchos clientes que siempre acuden hasta su despensa. Ella dice que todo lo que hace es por darle a su familia una vida digna y decorosa. Ella solicita el crdito para la compra de comestibles, bebidas, lcteos y dems, con lo cual podr aumentar la cantidad de productos que tiene para satisfacer a sus clientes.
texts.en:
This long-standing committee was created thanks to Ramona. Its members are getting ahead in life and each one of them has their own business activity. All of the women are from the town of Villa Elisa. They are all very hard working and responsible.
One of the members of this group is Ramona, who owns a grocery store. Through her business, she supports her family and all the people who are dependent on her. She tells us that she makes a lot of sales as she has many customers who always come to her store. She says that everything she does is done to provide her family with a decent and respectable life.
Ramona is requesting this loan to buy food, drinks, dairy products, etc. This will enable her to increase the quantity of products that she has available with which to satisfy her customers.

loan.use: to buy food, drinks, dairy products, etc.

loan.name: Mohammad

texts.en: Mohammad is a 25-year-old young man. He is a marketing employee with a decent salary. Mohammad wants to prepare for his wedding which is soon. He wants to pay for his wedding expenses such as purchasing home furniture and home appliances...etc. He needs to take a loan in the amount of $2,000 from FATEN to complete the amount he has to pay. When Mohammad takes the loan this will provide for Mohammad better life conditions. Mohammad is photographed in FATEN branch.

loan.use: to pay for wedding expenses.

loan.name: Cumbe Centro (Cuenca) Group

texts.es:
El banco comunal Cumbe Centro est formado por 5 socias y un socio quienes laboran arduamente en diferentes actividades las mismas que les permiten ayudar y salir adelante con sus familias. Nuestras socias viven por la parroquia de Cumbe, este lugar es de clima fri y nos regala un hermoso paisaje y vista de la naturaleza, su gente mantiene la cultura y tradiciones de sus pueblos, se dedican al comercio, cra de animales y a la agricultura.
Una de las integrantes de este grupo es la Seorita Andrea, es socia del banco comunal Cumbe Centro, tiene 28 aos de edad, es soltera y vive con su padre quien es de profesin chofer y labora prestando sus servicios con su propia unidad de taxi. Comparten los gastos del hogar y la casa en que habitan es propiedad de su padre.
Nuestra socia se dedica a la venta de productos Yanbal hace 6 aos, vende sus productos todos los das y sin un horario fijo. Tambin en su casa cra de gallinas.
Se encuentra en el cuarto crdito que realiza en el banco comunal y su nuevo crdito lo va a invertir en la compra de pollos para incrementar su negocio.
Su meta es tener un local para vender sus cosmticos.
texts.en:
The Cumbe Centro Communal Bank is made up of five women and one man who work hard in different activities that allow them to help their families and get ahead with them. Our members live near the parish of Cumbe. This place has a cold climate with a pretty landscape and a view of nature. The people there maintain the culture and traditions of their communities, and they work in commerce, raising animals, and agriculture.
Andrea is one of the members of this group. She is a member of Cumbe Centro Communal Bank. She is 28 years old and single, and lives with her father, who is a driver by profession and works for hire with his own taxi. They share the household expenses, and the house they live in belongs to her father.
Andrea has been selling Yanbal cosmetics for six years. She sells her products every day and without a set schedule. She also raises chickens at home.
This is the fourth loan she has taken from the communal bank, and she will use her new loan to buy chickens to increase her business.
Her goal is to have a place to sell her cosmetics.

loan.use: to buy chickens.

loan.name: Nelida Neyda

texts.es: La Sra. Nelida Neyda vive en la comunidad conocida como Esquilan Chico en la ciudad de Cochabamba. Nelida es soltera y no tiene ningn dependiente a su cargo. Nelida se dedica a la produccin de leche cruda aproximadamente 30 litros diarios, esta produccin la entrega a la Pil mediante el numero de socio de su hermana. El siguiente crdito que solicita es para la compra de un tanque de leche enfriamiento (el tanque de enfriamiento es un deposito de leche cruda que se mantiene en buen estado, es de este tanque de donde recoge la Empresa Pil la leche todas las maanas y todas las tardes) el cual en primer lugar tiene un costo aproximado de 16.000$us, es por esta razn que la compra la estn haciendo conjunta con otras 15 personas de la misma comunidad poniendo 1000$us cada uno. Nelida desea que al tener el tanque de enfriamiento cerca de su casa pueda comprar en un futuro una accin de la Empresa Pil Andina y poder entregar leche cruda a su nombre y no al de su hermana.
texts.en:
Seora Nelida Neyda lives in the community known as Esquilan Chico in the city of Cochabamba. Nelida is unmarried, and has no children. Nelida works producing raw milk, approximately 30 liters daily. She delivers this production to the Pil Company, under her sister's membership.
The loan that she is requesting is to buy a tank for cooling milk (the cooling tank is a place to keep raw milk in good state, and is how the Pil Company receives the milk every morning and evening). This tank costs approximately $16,000, so for this reason she is making the purchase together with 15 other people in her community, who are putting in $1,000 each.
Nelida wants to able to have a cooling tank near her home, so that in the future she can buy a deed with the Pil Andina Company, and be able to deliver raw milk in her own name rather than that of her sister.

loan.use: to buy a cooling tank for raw milk together with other people.

loan.name: Grace Narcisa

texts.es:
Grace Narcisa tiene 22 aos de edad es soltera vive con los padres en el Cantn Chillanes Provincia de Bolvar.
La VRC Unin y Progreso la Colombia baja, esta conformada por quince integrantes y est ubicada a 90 minutos de la cooperativa esta ventanilla se dedica a Actividades Agrcolas, siembra de cacao, arroz, maz, Soya pltano, naranja, etc.
Grace se dedica a la agricultura, tiene dos hectreas de terreno ah siembra cacao, arroz, maz, soya, pltano las compras lo realiza en San Jos del Tambo y los vende en el mercado del local cada fin de semana tambien se dedica a la crianza de cerdos.
Solicita el crdito para poder comprar semillas, abonos, fertilizantes, insumos y lquidos para mantener en buenas condiciones los cultivos para lo posterior venderlos.
Con el prstamo le ayudar a suplir necesidades econmicas, Enfrentar desafos que son muy frecuentes como la competencia y las plagas.
El sueo es poderse comprar una casa y ms terreno para sembrar ms de lo normal para producir y aumentar los ingresos.
En los tiempos libres le gusta salir de paseo con los padres.
texts.en:
Grace Narcisa is 22 years old . She is unmarried and lives with her parents in the Chillanes canton, province of Bolvar. La Unin y Progreso la Colombia Baja Communal Bank is comprised of fifteen members and is located 90 minutes from the cooperative. The members of this communal bank work in agriculture and grow cocoa, rice, corn, soy beans, bananas, oranges, and other produce.
Grace is a farmer. She has two hectares of land and where she grows cocoa, rice, corn, and soy beans. She shops in San Jos del Tambo and sells her products in the town market every weekend. She also raises pigs.
She is requesting the loan to buy seeds, manure, fertilizer, supplies, and liquid fertilizers to maintain her crops in good condition for future sale.
The loan will help her meet her financial needs and enable her to face frequent challenges such as competition and blight.
Her dream is to be able to buy a house and more land so that she can plant and produce more than the normal amount of crops and increase her income. In her spare time, she enjoys going for walks with her parents.

loan.use: to purchase seeds, manure, fertilizer, supplies, and liquid fertilizer.

loan.name: Lilliette Del Carmen

texts.es: Lilliette de 28 aos de edad, originaria de Managua, pero vive en Estel, es madre de dos hijos, ella es comerciante se dedica a vender ropa de vestir, ella estudio Administracin de empresa. Inicio a los 25 aos de edad, decidi crear su propio negocio as emplear los conocimientos adquiridos en la universidad, lleva tres aos con este negocio del cual sobrevive ella y sus hijos. Realizo el crdito para comprar inventario de ropa de diferentes estilos y medidas con el objetivo de ofrecer nuevos y variados productos a sus clientes poder atraer a mas clientes, mejoras sus ventas pues unos de sus propsitos a realizar es poder poner otra tienda de ropa.
texts.en:
Lilliette is 28 years old. She is originally from Managua but lives in Estel. She is the mother of two children. Lilliette sells clothes. She studied Business Administration. Lilliette started working at the age of 25. She decided to create her own business so that she could use the knowledge she gained at University. She has been in this business for three years and, through it, she supports herself and her children.
Lilliette requested this loan to buy inventory (clothes in different styles and sizes). Her aim is to offer new and varied products to her customers so that she can attract more customers and improve her sales as one of her goals is to open another clothes store.

loan.use: to buy inventory (clothes in different styles and sizes) with the goal of offering new and varied products to her customers

loan.name: Liria

texts.es: Liria tiene 67 aos, es una mujer muy trabajadora y responsable, es casada y madre D. un hijo, ya mayor e independiente, viven juntos, y l ya asume gastos del hogar. Su trabajo consiste en la elaboracin y venta D. tamales y humitas, empanadas y papa rellena, platillos que tienen mucha demanda en su regin. Es as que su labor empieza desD. muy temprano, yendo al mercado a comprar los insumos necesarios como maz molido, harina, carne D. pollo y chancho; especias. Estos platillos lo aprendi D. su madre, tanto en el proceso D. la preparacin como en la sazn, y eso le ha generado muchos seguidores que siempren consume lo que venD.. La mayora D. sus clientes son aquellos que son atendidos en la vulcanozadora D. su hijo, cuy taller se encuentra cerca D. su casa. Le gusta su trabajo, adems D. que le genera ganancias la hace una mujer independiente. Mas adelante deseara tener una fuente D. soda en su casa, para que pueda tener un servicio ms completo. Este ser su primer crdito con MFP, por tanto espera el apoyo D. cada uno D. ustedes. Con el monto solicitado, comprar ingredientes e insumos para la elaboracin D. sus productos.
texts.en:
Liria is 67 years old. She is a very hard-working and responsible woman. She is married and the mother of one son, who is already grown and independent. They live together, and he covers some household expenses.
Her work consists of preparing and selling tamales and humitas [corn cakes], as well as empanadas and stuffed potatoes. These are dishes in great demand in her region. Her work starts very early in the morning, when she goes to the market to buy the necessary ingredients such as ground corn, flour, chicken, pork and spices. She learned to make these dishes from her mother, who taught her both the preparation process and the seasoning, and they have earned her a great following of customers who regularly eat what she sells.
Most of her customers are people who are getting service at her son's tire repair business; the workshop is located near their home. She likes her work, because in addition to generating income, it makes her an independent woman. In the future, she would like to have a soda fountain in her home, so that she can offer more complete service. This will be her first loan with MFP, and she hopes for support from each one of you. With the amount she is requesting, she will buy ingredients and supplies to prepare her products.

loan.use: to buy ingredients to prepare the food she sells.

payment.comment: Over-reported by partner. Reduced to local price.

loan.name: Claudia

texts.es: Claudia integrante del Banco comunal Persa Rodoviario perteneciente a la ciudad de Talca. Se dedica al rubro del comercio, especficamente vende ropa deportiva para nios, damas y varones. Trabaja en ste negocio desde hace 9 aos y el local lo arrienda en el persa de la ciudad de Talca. Preferentemente vende ropa de temporada y exclusiva, por lo que le ha ido muy bien en su negocio. Su horario es durante todo el da, de lunes a domingo. Su mercadera la compra en la ciudad de Santiago en diferentes locales y distribuidoras. Tambin los proveedores se encargan de ofrecerle mercadera en su propio local. Su clientela la conserva desde sus inicios, por lo tanto tambin es fija. Con el crdito comprar buzos deportivos para nios, mujer y hombre, adems de pantalones poleras, short y calzas. Sus metas son acrecentar su negocio y abastecerlo de mercadera, ya que si le va bien, tendr un mejor ingreso econmico para proporcionarle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida. Claudia vive junto a sus dos hijos de 6 y 3 aos de edad. Claudia distribuye sus horarios para acomodarlos con su trabajo y el cuidado de sus hijos. Sus sueos son costear los estudios de sus hijos, para que sean profesionales. Adems se encuentra realizando todos los trmites para postular y obtener su casa propia. Ella est muy contenta y agradecida de los servicios entregados por Fondo Esperanza, disfruta y se siente cmoda de la compaa, fiato, lealtad y compromiso del grupo al cual pertenece. Respecto a las capacitaciones realizadas en las reuniones ha aprendido a distribuir mejor su negocio. Talca pertenece a la regin del Maule, ubicada en la zona centro del pas. Constituye el centro administrativo, econmico y cultural de la regin, siendo la ciudad ms importante del Valle Central chileno. Sobre Talca existe una curiosa referencia en Chile, la frase "Talca, Pars, y Londres". Entre los mitos al respecto, algunos dicen que es una derivacin de la originalmente dicha por un ingls "Talca parece Londres", por la abundante neblina que cubre frecuentemente la ciudad en la temporada invernal, a semejanza de la capital del Reino Unido.
texts.en:
Claudia is a member of the Persa Rodoviario Communal Bank in the city of Talca. She works in commerce, specifically selling sportswear for children, women, and men. She has been working in this business for nine years and she rents a space in the market in the city of Talca. She prefers to sell seasonal and exclusive clothing, which is why her business has gone well for her. Her work schedule is all day, Monday through Sunday. She buys her merchandise in different places and from different distributors in the city of Santiago. The suppliers also offer her merchandise in her own place. Her clientele has been with her since the beginning, so it is also established.
With the loan she will buy sportswear for children, women, and men, as well as pants, shirts, shorts, and leggings.
Her goals are to increase her business and supply it with merchandise, since if it goes well for her she will have a better income to give her family a better quality of life.
Claudia lives with her two children, ages 6 and 3. Claudia arranges her schedule to accommodate her work with the care of her children.
Her dream is to pay for her children's education so they will be professionals. She also is taking all the necessary steps to apply to get her own house.
Claudia is very happy and grateful for the services offered by Fondo Esperanza. She enjoys and feels comfortable with the company, credit, loyalty, and commitment of the group she belongs to. With regard to the training given in the meetings, she has learned how to better distribute her business.
Talca is in the Maule region, located in the central part of the country. It is the administrative, economic, and cultural center of the region, being the most important city in the Central Valley of Chile. There is a curious allusion to Talca in Chile, the expression "Talca, Paris, and London." Among the many myths about the matter, some say that it derives from something an English person once said, "Talca looks like London" [Spanish "parece" 'looks like' and "Pars" 'Paris' sound alike] because of the abundant fog that frequently covers the city in the winter season, similar to the capital of the United Kingdom.

loan.use: to buy sportswear for children, women, and men, as well as pants, shirts, shorts, and leggings.

loan.name: Maribel

texts.es: La Sra. Maribel vive en la comunidad conocida como Esquilan Chico en la ciudad de Cochabamba, la Sra. Maribel es soltera pero vive con su pareja hace mas de 8 aos. La Sra. Maribel se dedica a la produccin de leche cruda aproximadamente 100 litros diarios, la cual vende 50% a la Empresa Pil Andina y el otro 50 % lo destina a la elaboracin de quesillo.
