El siguiente crdito que solicita es para la compra de un tanque de leche enfriamiento (el tanque de enfriamiento es un deposito de leche cruda que se mantiene en buen estado, es de este tanque de donde recoge la Empresa Pil la leche todas las maanas y todas las tardes) el cual en primer lugar tiene un costo aproximado de 16.000$us, es por esta razn que la compra la estn haciendo conjunta con otras 15 personas de la misma comunidad poniendo 1000$us cada uno. La Sra. Maribel al tener el tanque de enfriamiento cerca de casa podr colocar ms leche en el mismo y tal vez dejar de vender quesillo el cual le toma mucho tiempo.
texts.en:
Seora Maribel lives in the community known as Esquilan Chico in the city of Cochabamba. Seora Maribel is unmarried, but has been living with her significant other for over 30 years. Seora Maribel works producing raw milk, approximately 100 liters daily. She sells 50% to the Pil Andina Company, and the other 50% goes to making cheese.
The loan that she is requesting is to buy a tank for cooling milk (the cooling tank is a place to keep raw milk in good state, and is how the Pil Company receives the milk every morning and evening). This tank costs approximately $16,000, so for this reason she is making the purchase together with 15 other people in her community, who are putting in $1,000 each.
Maribel wants to able to have a cooling tank near her home, so that in the future she can collect more milk in it and perhaps stop selling cheese as it takes up so much time.

loan.use: to buy a cooling tank for raw milk, together with other people.

loan.name: Taghreed

texts.en: Taghreed is a 43-year-old woman. She works in agriculture and wants to purchase more new green houses to prepare for the coming season. This loan will help her to increase her income so she will live in better life conditions.

loan.use: to pay for purchasing green houses to prepare for the new season.

loan.name: Lucia

texts.es: La Sra. Lucia vive en la comunidad conocida como Esquilan Chico en la ciudad D. Cochabamba, junto a su esposo y su hijo pequeo. La Sra. Lucia se dedica a la produccin D. leche cruda, su producto lo entrega a la Empresa PIL Andina la cual se encarga D. la distribucin D. leche en toda la ciudad D. Cochabamba, actualmente tiene 14 vacas en produccin, produciendo en promedio 90 litros diarios. La actividad que realiza es familiar y regular a lo largo del ao. El cliente solo entrega a la empresa Pil el monto mnimo D. leche para que su Mama no pierda la accin es por cuestin D. precio D. venta, y falta D. tanque D. enfriamiento en la zona que no pueD. vender el 100% D. su produccin a la PIL El siguiente crdito que solicita es para la compra D. un tanque D. leche enfriamiento (el tanque D. enfriamiento es un deposito D. leche cruda que se mantiene en buen estado, es D. este tanque D. donD. recoge la Empresa Pil la leche todas las maanas y todas las tardes) el cual en primer lugar tiene un costo aproximado D. 16.000$us, es por esta razn que la compra la estn haciendo conjunta con otras 15 personas D. la misma comunidad poniendo 1000$us cada uno. La Sra Lucia ahora que podr tener acceso a este Tanque D. enfriamiento podr entregar el 100% D. su produccin D. leche a la Empresa Pil Andina.
texts.en:
Seora Lucia lives in the community known as Esquilan Chico in the city of Cochabamba, with her husband and young son. Seora Lucia works producing raw milk. She delivers her production to the Pil Andina Company, which is responsible for milk distribution throughout Cochabamba city. She currently has 14 milking cows, producing on average 90 liters a day. It's a family business, and one that takes place throughout the year. This client only delivers the minimum amount of milk to the Pil Company, so that her mom doesn't lose her contract. It's a question of selling-price, and as she doesn't have a cooling tank in her area, she cannot sell 100% of her production to the Pil Company.
The loan that she is requesting is to buy a tank for cooling milk (the cooling tank is a place to keep raw milk in good state, and is how the Pil Company receives the milk every morning and evening). This tank costs approximately $16,000, so for this reason she is making the purchase together with 15 other people in her community, who are putting in $1,000 each.
Seora Lucia will now be able to have access to this cooling tank, and will be able to deliver 100% of her milk production to the Pil Andina Company.

loan.use: to buy a cooling tank for raw milk, together with other people.

loan.name: Maribel

texts.es: Maribel tiene 32 aos, es una mujer valiente y muy responsable, convive con su pareja y sus tres hijos de 12, 7 y 4 aos, con quienes comparte sus das en su casa propia. Juntos hacen el esfuerzo de mejorar su calidad de vida. Su trabajo consiste en el transporte de pasajeros va fluvial, pues ella es duea de un bote. Es as que realiza transporte turstico en la laguna de Yarinacocha, con Bimbo que es como se llama su bote y por el que es muy conocido entre los turistas que llegan a visitar a esta parte de la ciudad. Tiene diez aos ejecutando ste trabajo, y gracias a ello ha logrado darles una buena educacin a sus hijos, adems que est siempre en contacto con la naturaleza y en compaa de su esposo. Por ahora lo que prioriza es la compra de un nuevo bote, pues aumentado la demanda del servicio. Este ser el tercer crdito con MFP, esta muy contenta con su grupo ya que son muy responsable y sobre todo respetuosos entre ellos. Con el monto solicitado, pagara la primera cuota de la compra de un bote.
texts.en:
Maribel is 32 years old. She is a brave and responsible woman. She has her own home that she shares with her partner and three children, ages 12, 7, and 4. Together, the family works hard to improve their quality of life. She owns a boat and transports passengers by river. Her boat is named Bimbo and she transports tourists on the Yarinacocha lagoon. She is very well-known among the tourists who visit this part of the city.
She has been working in this job for ten years and, thanks to it, she has been able to provide her children with a good education. In addition, her works keeps her in touch with nature and allows her to spend time with her husband. For now, her priority is to buy new boat as there is growing demand for her service. This will be her third loan with MFP. She is very happy with the group as they are very responsible and above all, they have respect for one another. With the amount she is requesting, she will make the first payment of her boat purchase. .

loan.use: to make the first payment on the purchase of an additional boat.

payment.comment: Over-reported by partner. Reduced to local price.

loan.name: Enma Beatriz

texts.es:
La Seora Enma es socia del banco comunal Pisando Fuerte, vive por los alrededores de la ciudad de Cuenca, esta ciudad es la tercera ciudad ms importante del pas, es patrimonio cultural de la humanidad desde 1999 por su belleza arquitectnica y cultura, su gente es amable y gentil.
La Seora. Enma tiene 46 aos, es separada y en su unin conyugal ha concebido 6 hijos de 28, 26, 23, 19, 16 y 8 aos de edad, sus dos primeros hijos son casados e independientes, su tercer hijo estudia en la universidad, su cuarto hijo trabaja y le ayuda econmicamente, su quinta hija pasa en casa y ayuda en los quehaceres del hogar y su ultimo hijo estudia en la escuela. No tiene casa propia por lo que viven arrendando.
Doa Enma se dedica la venta de comida hace 3 aos, trabaja de lunes a sbados y no tiene horario fijo ya que deja de trabajar cuando termina de vender todo su producto.
Este es su primer crdito que realiza en el banco comunal y lo va a invertir en la compra de vajilla y vveres para la elaboracin de sus platos.
Su meta es crecer ms en su negocio.
texts.en:
Enma is a member of the Pisando Fuerte communal bank and she lives on the outskirts of Cuenca, the third most important city of the country. It has been a Unesco World Heritage site since 1999, known for its beautiful architecture and culture. Its people are friendly and gentile.
Emma, 46, is separated and has 6 children: 28, 26, 23, 19, 16 and 8. Her oldest two are married and independent, her third, a son, is a student at the university, her fourth, a son, works and helps her with expenses, her fifth, a daughter, is at home and helps her with the housework, and the youngest, a son, is in school. They rent since they dont own their own house.
Enma has sold food for the last 3 years. She works Mondays through Saturdays, but she doesnt have a regular schedule. She stops working when she finishes selling all of the food.
This is her first loan with the communal bank and she will use it to buy dishes and ingredients for her food.
Her goal is to have her business grow.

loan.use: to buy dishes and ingredients

loan.name: Bertha Paulina

texts.es:
La Seora. Bertha es socia del banco comunal Pisando Fuerte, vive por los alrededores de la ciudad de Cuenca, esta ciudad es la tercera ciudad ms importante del pas, es patrimonio cultural de la humanidad desde 1999 por su belleza arquitectnica y cultura, su gente es amable y gentil.
Doa Bertha tiene 23 aos, es casada y fruto de su unin conyugal ha concebido 2 hijos de 5 y 4 aos de edad, su primer hijo estudia en el jardn de infantes. Su esposo es de profesin mecnico industrial, no tienen casa propia por lo que viven arrendando.
La Seora. Bertha se dedica a la venta de todo tipo de ropa, esta actividad la realiza en su casa o ambulantemente y lleva un ao y medio en el negocio, trabaja todas las tardes de lunes a sbados.
Este es su segundo crdito que realiza en el banco comunal y lo va a invertir en la compra de pantalones, blusas, camisetas y ropa de nios para surtir su mercadera.
Su meta es estabilizarse en el negocio.
texts.en:
Mrs. Bertha is a member of the communal bank, "Stepping Strong." She lives in the outskirts of Cuenca which is the third most important city in the country. Since 1999 it has been the Cultural Heritage for Humanity due to it's agricultural and cultural beauty, and it's friendly and kind people.

Mrs. Bertha is 23 years old, married and has two children of 5 and 4 years of age. Her first son is in kindergarden. Her husband is an industrial mechanic. They do not own a home so they rent.

Mrs. Bertha sells a variety of clothes from her home or door to door and has been doing so for a year and a half. She works every evening from Monday to Saturday.

This is her second loan with the communal bank and she will use it to buy pants, blouses, shirts, and children's clothes to stock up her merchandise.

Her goal is to stabilize her business.

loan.use: buy pants, blouses, shirts, and children's clothes.

loan.name: Mara Narcisa

texts.es:
La Seora. Mara es socia del banco comunal Pisando Fuerte, vive por los alrededores de la ciudad de Cuenca, esta ciudad es la tercera ciudad ms importante del pas, es patrimonio cultural de la humanidad desde 1999 por su belleza arquitectnica y cultura, su gente es amable y gentil.
Doa Mara tiene 31 aos, es casada y fruto de su unin conyugal ha concebido 3 hijos de 14, 10 y 2 aos de edad, su primer hijo estudia en el colegio, y su segundo hijo en una escuelita de la ciudad. Su esposo es de profesin latonero (arreglo de latas de vehculo), no tienen casa propia por lo que viven arrendando.
La Seora. Mara se dedica a comprar adornos de cermicas (artesanas), las cuales les pinta y luego las vende, lleva un ao y medio en este negocio.
Este es el segundo crdito que realiza en el banco comunal y lo va a invertir en la compra de adornos de cermica para continuar con el negocio.
Su meta es agrandar su negocio.
texts.en:
Mara is a member of the Pisando Fuerte (Taking Strong Steps) communal bank. She lives in the outskirts of the city of Cuenca. This is the countrys third most important city. Its been a Cultural Heritage of Humanity since 1999 due to the beauty of its architecture and culture. Its people are kind and charming.
Mara is 31 years old, married and has three children who are 14, 10 and 2 years of age. Her oldest son is in secondary school and her next oldest son goes to the local elementary school. Her husband is an auto body repairman. They do not own their house; they are renters.
Mara buys ceramic decorations (crafts) that she paints and then sells. Shes been in this business for a year and a half.
This is the second loan shes taken in the communal bank and shes going to use it to buy clay decorations to stay in business. Her goal is to expand her business.

loan.use: to buy ceramic decorations.

loan.name: Mery

texts.es: Mery tiene 33 aos, es una mujer alegre, trabajadora y responsable; es casada y madre de tres hijos de 14, 12 y 06 aos. Juntos habitan en su casa propia, lugar donde comparten la alegra de estar da a da juntos y sobre todo el sueo de tener una mejor calidad de vida. Su trabajo consiste en la venta de comida, actividad que empieza desde muy temprano, donde se dirige al mercado para comprar los productos frescos e insumos para la preparacin de sus alimentos. Ya luego se establece en una agencia de transporte terrestre, en donde expende sus platillos, pues en estos dos aos de trabajo ha logrado ganarse clientes, quienes son pasajeros y trabajadores de dicha agencia. Ella espera mantener en su negocio, pues suea con algn da tener su propio restaurante. Este ser el tercer crdito con MFP, y hasta el momento le ha ido muy bien con sus compaeros de su grupo. Con el monto solicitado, montar un nuevo negocio, como es la venta de ropa, pues considera un negocio rentable; asimismo comprar utensilios nuevos.
texts.en:
Mery is 33 years old. She is a cheerful, hard-working and responsible woman. She is married and has three children aged 14, 12 and 6. They live in their own home where they share the joy of being together day by day and, above all, their dream of enjoying a better quality of life.
Mery's business is selling meals. She starts her work very early in the morning, heading to the market to buy fresh produce and supplies for making her food. She sells her meals at a transport agency. Over the two years she has been in this business, she has managed to gain customers: both passengers and people who work for the agency. She hopes to keep working in her business as she dreams of some day owning her own restaurant.
This will be Mery's third loan from MFP and, up to now, she has got along really well with her fellow group members. Mery will use the sum she has requested to set up a new business selling clothes. She considers this to be a profitable business. She will also buy new utensils.

loan.use: to buy new utensils and clothes

loan.name: Por Un Futuro Mejor (Cuenca) Group

texts.es:
El banco comunal Por un futuro Mejor est formado por 10 mujeres quienes viven por el cantn Paute, este cantn es de clima templado lo cual es propicio para la floricultura y tambin se da una gran variedad de frutas. Su gente se dedica al comercio, a la cra de animales y a la agricultura. En este cantn hay varios lugares tursticos, su gente es clida y amable como nuestras socias, quienes son personas muy luchadoras y trabajan en diferentes actividades las mismas que les permiten mejorar econmicamente y sacar adelante a sus familias.
Una de las integrantes de este grupo es la Seora. Delia, vive por los alrededores del cantn Paute, tiene 24 aos, es casada y en su unin conyugal ha concebido 3 hijos de 8, 5 y 1 ao de edad, sus dos primeros hijos estudian en una escuelita del cantn. Su esposo labora en la agricultura, la casa en la que habitan es de su propiedad.
Doa Delia se dedica a la agricultura, ella siembra papas y mellocos que los vende en el mercado del cantn, trabaja de domingo a domingo sin un horario fijo ya que labra sus propios terrenos. Tambin se dedica a la cra de ganado, gallinas y chanchos.
Este es el sexto crdito que realiza en el banco comunal y lo va a invertir en la compra de semillas y abono.
Su sueo es comprarse un vehculo.
La foto pequea adjunta es de una de las socias que por motivos del trabajo no pudo estar presente cuando se tom la foto del grupo.
texts.en:
The Por un Futuro Mejor (For a Better Future) communal bank is formed by ten women who live in Paute Canton. This is a canton with a mild climate that is apt for flower growing and also produces a great variety of fruit. Its residents are merchants, raise livestock and farm. There are several tourist attractions in this canton. Its people are warm and kind like our members who are very hardworking people engaged in a variety of activities that make it possible for them to improve economically and support their families.
One of the group members is Delia. She lives around Paute Canton. Shes 24 years old, married and has three children who are 8, 5 and 1 year old. Her two oldest children go to the local elementary school. Her husband works in farming and the house they live in is their property.
Delia is a farmer. She grows potatoes and mellocos [a tuber] that she sells in the cantons market. She works Sunday to Sunday with no fixed work schedule since she works her own fields. She also raises cattle, chickens and pigs.
This is the sixth loan shes taken with the communal bank and shes going to use it to buy seeds and manure. Her dream is to buy herself a vehicle.
The small inserted photo is of one of the members who, because of work commitments, was unable to be present when the group photo was taken.

loan.use: to buy seeds and manure.

loan.name: Andres

texts.es: El seor Andrs, habita en la ciudad de Estel, tiene 57 aos de edad, tiene tres hijos, el es agricultor, aprendi lo bsico en la escuela a leer y a escribir la condiciones de pobreza en la que el creci no le permitieron seguir estudiando, pero la dedicacin y el esfuerzo arduo de cada da hizo que se especializara en siembra de vegetales oficio que aprendi desde muy joven. Hoy en da lleva 30 aos dedicndose a la siembra. Adems de eso el se dedica la venta y crianza de ganada actividad que se dedica cuando la temporada de siembra esta baja. El vende sus siembras e la ciudades de Managua y Estel. El solicito el crdito para comprar semilla de papa certificada. Con esta inversin le ayudara adquirir esta semilla mas fcilmente, podr darle un mejor mantenimiento de su cultivo, comprar insumos para siembra que necesita. Su meta prxima es poder lograr su propia siembra de papa, cosechar su propia semilla para no tener que comprarla y darle una mejor calidad de vida a su familia.
texts.en:
Andrs lives in the city of Estel. He is 57 years old and has three children. He is a farmer. Andrs learned the basics at school. He learned how to read and write but the conditions of poverty in which he grew up did not allow him to continue studying. However, the commitment and effort that he puts into his work every day have meant that he has become a specialist in growing vegetables: a trade that he learned at a very young age. Andrs has been growing crops for 30 years. In addition, he also raises and sells livestock. He carries out this work during the off season for crop growing. He sells his crops in Managua and Estel.
Andrs requested this loan to buy certified potato seeds. This investment will help him to acquire this seed more easily. He will be able to better maintain his crops and buy the supplies he needs to sow his crops. His next goal is to sow his own potato seed and harvest his own seed so that he no longer has buy it. This will enable him to provide his family with a better quality of life.

loan.use: to buy certified potato seed

loan.name: Patricia

texts.es: Patricia tiene 42 aos, es una mujer alegre y dinmica, es madre soltera de tres hijos, pero solo vive con su ltimo hijo de 8 aos, por quien cuida de su educacin. Ambos habitan en su casa propia. Su trabajo consiste en la venta de comida, actividad que inicia desde muy temprano para ir al mercado y comprar los ingredientes y especias que necesitar al momento de preparar sus alimentos. Su buena sazn han atraido a muchos clientes, es as que las afueras de su casa, lugar donde expende su comida, esta repleta de fieles consumidores. Tiene tres aos trabajando en esta actividad y hasta el momento lo ha hecho sola. Lo que le gusta de su trabajo es wur est siempre activa y en contacto con las personas, ya que le gusta mucho conversar e intercambiar opiniones con sus clientes, por ello desea tener un local apropiado para que pueda seguir vendiendo y ofreciendo mejor comodidad a sus clientes. Este ser el sexto crdito con MFP, y por tanto pide que lo apoyen para continuar trabajando. Con el monto solicitado, podr comprar materiales para acondicionar un local pequeo para atender a sus clientes. Adems comprar ingredientes e insumos para la preparacin de comida.
texts.en:
Patricia, 42, is a cheerful, dynamic woman. Shes a single mother of three children but only her youngest, 8-year-old, son still lives with her; she sees to his education. They live together in her own house.
Her work consists in selling food, an activity she starts very early when she goes to the market to buy the ingredients and spices she needs at the moment of preparing her meals. Her tasty preparations have attracted many customers so the space outside her house where she serves her meals is always crowded with faithful customers.
Shes been in this business for three years and has worked alone to date. What she likes about her work is being always active and in contact with people because she enjoys chatting and exchanging opinions with them very much. Because of this, shed like to have a properly furnished space where she can continue selling and offering more comfort to her customers.
This will be her sixth MFP loan so shes asking for your support so she can stay in business. She will use the amount requested to buy materials to equip a small locale to take care of customers in. In addition, shell buy ingredients and supplies to prepare her dishes.

loan.use: to buy ingredients to prepare meals as well as materials to equip the space.

payment.comment: Over-reported by partner. Reduced to local price.

loan.name: Enma Lorena

texts.es:
Enma tiene 43 aos de edad, es madre soltera de dos hijos, reside en el Barrio San Jose en el Departamento de El Paraiso.
Enma es una persona muy trabajadora y luchadora de la vida. Hace unos aos su esposo la abandon a ella y a sus dos hijos y para sacar a su pequea familia tuvo que mudarse a la casa de sus padres y empez a dedicarse a una actividad economica y a otra pero en ninguna le iba bien asi que decidi buscar un empleo, el cual consigui. Luego de unos aos de haber conseguido el trabajo decidi ponerse a vender cosmeticos por catalogos para tener una fuente extra de ingresos y le ha ido muy bien. La mayoria de sus ventas las realiza con sus compaeros de trabajo, los fines de semana sale a vender en la comunidad y tambien en su casa tiene unos cuantos productos para la venta.
El prestamo que Enma solicita lo necesita para surtir de mas y variados productos como barniz de uas, listick, sombras de ojos, delinear de ojos y labios, cremas, desodorantes, perfumes, entre otros. Con el apoyo del prestamo Enma podra ofrecer una mayor cantidad de productos a sus clientes y espera que sus ventas mejoren, y obtener una buena ganancia que le permita llevar el sustento a su casa.
Su meta es instalar una tienda de variedades en su casa y dedicarle mas tiempo a la crianza de sus dos hijos. Este es su segundo ciclo en FAMA y espera cumplir con el compromiso de sus cuotas de manera puntual como lo hizo en el prestamo anterior.
texts.en:
Enma is 43 years old and a single mother of two children. She lives in the neighborhood of San Jose located in the El Paraiso department.
Enma is a hard working person and a fighter in life. A few years ago, her husband abandoned her and her two children. In order to keep her small family going, she had to move to her parents house. She began making a living in one endeavor after the other, but none of them went well, so she decided to look for employment and she found it. After a few years of working, she decided to begin selling catalogue cosmetics as an extra source of income. It has gone very well for her. She makes most of her sales through her work mates. On the weekends she goes out to the community to make her sales in addition to the few products she has for sale at her home.
Enma needs the loan she is requesting to increase and diversify her supply of products such as nail polish, lipstick, eye shadows, eyeliner and lip liner, creams, deodorants and perfumes among other things. With the help of this loan, Enma will be able to offer a larger quantity of products to her customers. She hopes that her sales will improve and that she will make a better profit that allows her to support her home.
Her goal is to start a variety shop in her house and spend more time raising her two children. This is her second loan with FAMA and she hopes to make good on her repayment commitment as punctually as she did on her last loan.

loan.use: to purchase cosmetics.

loan.name: Raquel

texts.es: Raquel tiene 25 aos, es una mujer muy activa y emprendedora, convive con su pareja, con quien tiene tres hijos de 5, 4 y 10 meses. Juntos habitan en su casa propia. Su trabajo consiste en la venta de pescado seco, alimentos tiene demanda de los pobladores de su ciudad. Es as que se provee de este alimentos en el ro Ucayali, y de ahi se encarga de secarlos y poner sal, por lo que pueden estar asi durante tiempos sin descomponerse. En el que luego son llevado a vender a los comerciantes. Tiene cinco aos realizando este trabajo, y en compaa de su esposo, que juntos hacen un buen equipo de trabajo. Lo que le gusta de su trabajo es que dispone de tiempo para cuidar de sus hijos, sin embargo corre riesgo cada vez que va al rio en busca de pescado, por que hay momentos en que es muy caudoloso. Adems menciona que mas adelante le gustara realizar otra actividad como es la siembra de maz. Este ser su sexto crstamo con MFP, por lo que espera el apoyo de cada uno de ustedes para concretar su trabajo. Con el monto solicitado, comprar semillas para empezar con la siembra de maz, considera que es una buena inversin, pues demora tres meses para comercializarlos.
texts.en:
Raquel is an active, enterprising 25 year old woman. She lives with her partner and three children, ages 5, 4, and 10 months. They live together in their own home. She makes her living selling dried fish, a food that is in demand by the people in her city. She obtains this fish from the Ucayali River, and then dries and salts it so that it may be preserved over time. Then she sells it to shopkeepers. She has been engaged in this occupation for five years and she and her husband make a good team. She likes this job because it gives her time to take care of her children. However, she runs a risk each time she goes to the river in search of fish because there are times when the currents flow strongly.
In addition, she mentions that, in the future, she would like to embark on another activity: growing corn. This will be her sixth loan with MFP and she hopes for the support of each one of you to carry out her job. With the amount requested, she will buy seeds to start planting corn. She considers this a good investment because it takes three months to sell them.

loan.use: to buy corn seeds.

loan.name: Jorge Eduardo

texts.es:
El seor Jos Eduardo es un hombre trabajador que le gusta imponerse retos y cumplirlos, por eso hace 5 aos inicio con su negocio de papelera y mercera en uno de los ejidos cercanos a la ciudad, por que vio que seria una mejor opcin de tener mayores ingresos al colocarlo en un lugar donde no hay mucha competencia. Jose Eduardo comenta que todos los das sale de su trabajo hacia el ejido y hace 15 a 20 minutos en llegar pero esta teniendo resultados favorables y sobre todo en lo econmico para su familia.
El negocio cuenta con variedad de producto de papelera, mercera, regalos y servicio de internet para cualquier persona a un precio accesible. Para Jos Eduardo es muy importante mantener su negocio con mercanca variada para que sus clientes encuentren lo que necesiten ya que por la lejana es muy difcil de conseguir, por ello el prstamo lo utilizara para comprar cuadernos lpices, plumas, marcadores, mochilas, listones, y equipo de cmputo que este en mejores condiciones; de esta manera sus ventas incrementaran y su negocio ser prosperado.
texts.en:
Jos Eduardo is a hardworking man who likes to set goals for himself and accomplish them. Because of this, five years ago he started his stationery and variety shop in one of the ejidos [system of cooperative land tenure] near the city because he saw that it was a better option for earning higher income to establish it in a place where there was little competition. Jos Eduardo comments that he leaves work daily and heads to the ejido; its a 15 to 20 minute trip but hes having favorable results above all for his familys economy.
The business has a variety of paper goods, merchandise, gifts and Internet access service for anyone at an accessible price. For Jos Eduardo its important to keep his business stocked with a good variety of merchandise so that his customers can find whatever they need because its hard for them to get things due to the distances involved. Because of this, hell use the loan to buy notebooks, pencils, pens, markers, backpacks, ribbon and computer equipment thats in better condition so that he can increase sales and his business will continue to make progress.

loan.use: to buy notebooks, pencils, backpacks and computer equipment.

loan.name: Fernando

texts.es: Fernando tiene un hijo de 1 ao del cual quiere formar un buen ciudadano y desea ofrecerle una mejor calidad de vida. Hace 3 aos el compro un terreno, en el cual ha estado construyendo con ahorros y prestamos de esta misma institucin. Para Fernando es muy importante ofrecerle a su esposa e hijo un hogar digno, en el que vera crecer a su pequeo. Aun el vive en casa de suegra mientras el termina de construir su casa, en la cual viven en comunin y sin problemas, pero Fernando desea tener su propio patrimonio que sea de el mismo del cual pasara en un fututo a mano de su hijo. En este momento el quiere terminar el bao y necesita comprar la taza de bao, accesorios, enjarrar y pintar, de esta manera el vera terminado su proyecto.
texts.en:
Fernando has a one year old son, for whom he wants to be a good provider and be able to give him a better quality of life. Three years ago he bought some land, on which he is building using his savings and loans from this same financial institution.
It is very important to Fernando to be able to provide his wife and child with a decent home, in which he will be able to see his little one grow up. They are still living in his mother-in-law's house while he finishes building their home. They live there all together without problems, but Fernando wants to have his own legacy to pass down to his son in the future.
At this moment in time, he wants to finish the bathroom and needs to buy the toilet and accessories, and to plaster and paint. In this way he will be able to wrap up his project.

loan.use: to buy bathroom accessories, and to plaster and paint.

loan.name: Jelina

texts.en:
Jelina is 40 years old and lives in Embargo, Ozamiz City. She is married with one child.
To earn a living, Jelina has a business selling foods such as rice cake, cassava cake, etc. She earns about PHP 1,500 each month doing this type of work. Jelina has requested a loan of 5,000 to purchase piglets for hog fattening.
Jelina has been a member of PMPC for 6 months. In the future, Jelina would like to be successful in her chosen business..

loan.use: to purchase piglets

loan.name: Pelongo Group

texts.en:
Alicia is married with eight children. Alicia is 63 years old and lives in Aurora.
Alicia sells dried fish to earn a living and has had this business for 20 years. Each month, she earns PHP 4,000 doing this work. She has requested a loan for 11,000 to purchase more dried fish for her retail store.
Alicia has been a member of PMPC for five years. Alicia is the leader of a two person group. Although they borrow as a group, each member of the group has their own business.

loan.use: to purchase more dried fish for her retail store

loan.name: Jerry

texts.en:
Jerry is 21 years old and lives in San Vicente Bajo. He is married with one child.
To earn a living, Jerry has a business selling different kinds of dried fish. He earns about PHP 1,500 each month doing this work. Jerry has requested a loan of 5,000 to purchase dried fish for his retail business.
Jerry has been a member of PMPC for three years. In the future, Jerry would like to have a space to sell his dried fish in the market.

loan.use: to purchase dried fish for his retail business

loan.name: Rosie

texts.en:
Rosie is 34 years old and lives in Mitazan, Aloaran, Misamis Occidental. She is single.
To earn a living, Rosie has a business sell clothings. She earns about PHP 3,000 each month doing this type of work. Rosie has requested a loan of 14,900 to purchase more clothes to sell.
Rosie has been a member of PMPC for five years. In the future, Rosie would like to have a big store of boutique.

loan.use: to purchase more clothes to sell

loan.name: Jingkie

texts.en:
Jingkie is 23 years old and lives in Toril, Aloran, Misamis Occidental. She is married with one child.
Jingkie has a general store. She sells items such as canned goods, softdrinks, vegetable oil, cigarettes, sugar and milk for a living. She has been doing this for four years. She has requested a loan of 3,000 to purchase more stocks for her general store.
Jingkie has been a member of PMPC for five years.

loan.use: to purchase more stocks for her general store

loan.name: Gary

texts.en:
Gary is 47 years old and lives in Talairon,Oroquieta City. He is married and has two children. To earn a living, Gary operates a general store where he sells items such as canned goods, soft drinks, sugar, milk, milo, nescafe, etc. He earns about 4,800 PHP each month doing this work. Gary has requested a loan of 7,000 PHP to purchase more inventory for his general store.
Gary has been a member of PMPC for a year. In the future, Gary would like to have a grocery store. He is a hard-working father and he loves his family very much. Gary is a MIGS member of PMPC.

loan.use: to purchase more inventory

loan.name: Edna

texts.en: Edna is married and has five children. Edna is 40 years old and lives in Baadero, Osamiz City. To earn a living, Edna owns a boarding house. She has had this business for 10 years. Each month, she earns approximately 8,000 PHP. She has requested a loan of 30,000 PHP to purchase lumber for some renovations to her boarding house. Edna has been a member of PMPC for two years. In the future, Edna wants to improve her living conditions.

loan.use: for purchase lumber for boarding house repair

loan.name: Analyn Group

texts.en: Analyn is 26 years old and lives in Gotokan Daku, Ozamiz City. She is married and has two children. Analyn has a general store that sells groceries, hotcakes, and barbeque. She has had this business for three years. She requested a loan of 3,000 PHP to purchase inventory for her general store. Analyn has been a member of PMPC for just this year. In the future, Analyn hopes to expand her business. Analyn is the leader of a 3-person group. Although they borrow as a group, each member of the group has her own business.

loan.use: To purchase inventory for her general store

loan.name: Teofila Magpulong's Group

texts.en:
Teofila is married with four children. Teofila is 58 years old and lives in Gotokan Daku, Ozamiz City.
Teofila sells hotcakes and puto to earn a living and has had this business for 10 years. She has requested a loan of PHP 3,000 to purchase ingredients for her snack vending.
Teofila has been a member of PMPC for just this year. In the future, Teofila hopes to hopes to expand her snack vending. Teofila is the leader of a five-person group. Although they borrow as a group, each member of the group has their own business.

loan.use: to purchase ingredients for her snack vending

loan.name: Elma Group

texts.en:
Elma is married with four children. Elma is 44 years old and lives in Ozamiz City.
Elma sells sells snacks to earn a living and has had this business for three years. Each month, she earns PHP 1,500 doing this work. She has requested a loan for PHP 3,000 to purchase ingredients for her snacks vending.
Elma has been a member of PMPC just this year. In the future, Elma hopes to expand her snacks vending. Elma is the leader of a four person group. Although they borrow as a group, each member of the group has their own business.

loan.use: To purchase ingredients for snacks vending

loan.name: Virgie

texts.en:
Virgie is 32 years old and lives in Balintawak, Pagadian City. She is married with four children.
Virgie has a sari sari store selling different kind of products. She has had this business for six years. She has requested a loan of 28000 to purchase more stock of products for her general store.
Virgie has been a member of PMPC for four years. In the future, Virgie hopes to expand her sari sari store.

loan.use: to purchase more stock of products for her general store

loan.name: Enriquita

texts.en:
Enriquita is 62 years old and lives in Nabuna, Aloran, Misamis Occidental. She is married with eight children.
To earn a living, Enriquita has a business selling snacks such as puto, hotcakes, bibingca, etc. She earns about PHP 500 each month doing this work. Enriquita has requested a loan of 3,000 to purchase ingredients for her snack vending business.
Enriquita has been a member of PMPC for two years. In the future, Enriquita would like to have more capital so that she can help her family with financial challenges.

loan.use: to purchase ingredients for her snack vending business

loan.name: Ferlito

texts.en:
Ferlito is 40 years old and lives in Small Potungan, Concepcion. He is single with no children.
Ferlito has a shop that sells assorted grocery items and other dry goods. He has had this business for two years. He has requested a loan of 20,000 PHP to purchase assorted groceries.
Ferlito has been a member of PMPC for a month.

loan.use: to purchase assorted groceries

loan.name: Cristina

texts.en:
Cristina is a married woman who has two adult children. She and her husband are both farmers. They primarily grow rice crops to sell. Cristina does her best to help augment their income. She also wants to be able to extend support to her children even though they have their own families now.
Cristina has requested this loan to purchase seeds, fertilizers, and other farm inputs. Cristina hopes that this loan will help increase their harvest.

loan.use: to purchase seeds, fertilizers, and other farm inputs

loan.name: Cristina

texts.en: Cristina, 42-year-old married mother of five, is a farmer who has been growing and selling rice in Sto. Nio, South Cotabato for quite some time now. Cristina works hard to help her husband provide for their needs and send their children to school. She has requested this loan to purchase seeds, fertilizers and other farm inputs, and hopes for their business to grow bigger.

loan.use: to purchase seeds, fertilizers and other farm inputs.

loan.name: Delia

texts.en: 53-year-old Delia is a married woman who has two children aged 24 and 12. She lives in the town of Sto. Nio, South Cotabato, where her rice farm is also located. Delia has been farming rice for more than 20 years. She has requested this loan to purchase fertilizers, herbicides, and other farm inputs. Delia hopes to be able to manage her farm well.

loan.use: to purchase fertilizers, herbicides, and other farm inputs

loan.name: Dorcas

texts.en:
Dorcas is a 43-year-old married woman with 4 children. Her oldest child is 24 years old. Dorcas and her husband both work as farmers. They cultivate the land where they grow rice crops. Dorcas has been in the rice farming business for 26 years.
Dorcas has requested this loan to purchase fertilizers, herbicides and other farm inputs. Dorcas hopes for their business to grow. She also hopes for her children to finish their schooling and be successful.

loan.use: to purchase fertilizers, herbicides, and other farm inputs

loan.name: Salomat

texts.en: Salomat made a good profit and expanded her business, she bought a Xerox machine. Right now her brother works instead of her in the dealer center. Salomat now does sales on the market of Dushanbe. She rents out a store where she sells fabrics and kits for the newborns. She is taking out the loan to buy fabrics and perfumes.

loan.use: to buy fabrics and perfumes.

loan.name: Marufjon

texts.en: Marufjon lives in the region of Shahrituz. He is 31 years old, married and has three children. His wife takes care of the household. He has secondary education. Marufjon has been doing animal husbandry for more than five years. He feeds and sells large horned cattle. This way he makes a living. He is taking out the loan to buy a cow with a calf for future resale. He wants to improve his family's financial situation and build a new house.

loan.use: to buy a cow with a calf.

loan.name: Anonymous
loan.use: To buy beans and potatoes.

loan.name: Jumanazar

texts.en: Jumanazar lives in the region of Shahrituz. He is 55 years old, married and has seven children. His son is now working in Russia. Jumanazar breeds small horned cattle. He has been doing this business for two years. He is taking out the loan to buy calves. He also wants to expand his business.

loan.use: to buy calves.

loan.name: Elsie

texts.en:
Elsie is a 57-year-old married woman with 3 children. She is a farmer from the town of Sto. Nio, South Cotabato. Elsie grows rice crops and coffee on her land. She has been in this kind of farming for 5 years. Elsie earns about 5000 PHP per month from her business. She has requested this loan to purchase seeds and fertilizers and to pay for the labor of farmers she hired to help till her land.
In the future, Elsie hopes to start another business.

loan.use: to purchase seeds and fertilizers and to pay for labor

loan.name: Abdurashid

texts.en: Abdurashid lives in the Shahrituz region. He is 69 years old, married and has three children. His wife is a homemaker and his oldest daughter went to work in Russia. Abdurashid provides a service. He works as a barber in a men's hair salon. He has been in this business for 40 years. He is taking out the loan to buy a chair and accessories.

loan.use: to buy a chair and accessories.

loan.name: Erlinda

texts.en:
Erlinda is a 52-year-old married woman with 5 children. She lives in the town of Sto. Nio, South Cotabato with her family.
Erlinda is a farmer and has been growing and selling rice for 30 years. She works hard to support her family. Erlinda has requested this loan to purchase fertilizers, herbicides, and other farm inputs. Erlinda hopes to improve her income so that she could pay in full the land that she acquired.

loan.use: to purchase fertilizers, herbicides, and other farm inputs

loan.name: Ernesto

texts.en:
Ernesto is a 36-year-old married farmer working in Sto. Nio, South Cotabato. Ernesto grows rice on his land. He has been in this business for 10 years. Each month, he earns about 12,000 PHP.
Ernesto has requested this loan to purchase fertilizers, seeds, and insecticides. Ernesto hopes to provide a better quality of life to his family. He also hopes for his children to finish college and have bright futures.

loan.use: to purchase fertilizers, seeds, and insecticides

loan.name: Eufemia

texts.en:
Eufemia is a 58-year-old married woman from the town of Sto. Nio, South Cotabato. She has a 21-year-old child.
Eufemia is a farmer and has been growing and selling rice for 30 years. With her income from farming, she is able to support her familys basic needs. Eufemia plans to use her loan to purchase fertilizers, insecticides, and seeds. She hopes to have a better quality of life.

loan.use: to purchase fertilizers, insecticides, and seeds

loan.name: Grace

texts.en:
Grace is a farmer from Sto. Nio, South Cotabato. She is 30 years old and married with 2 young children.
Grace has been growing and selling rice for 10 years. She also started raising pigs to augment her income. Grace plans to use her loan to purchase fertilizers, piglets, and feed. Grace hopes that she would be able to manage her businesses well. She also hopes to save for her childrens education.

loan.use: to purchase fertilizers, piglets, and feed

loan.name: Jenibeb

texts.en:
Jenibeb is a 24-year-old married woman with 2 young children. She is a farmer working in Sto. Nio, South Cotabato. Jenibeb grows rice crops to sell. She also raises pigs to help augment their family income. Jenibeb works hard to earn more and save for her children's education.
Jenibeb has requested this loan to purchase seeds, fertilizers, and pig feed. She hopes that this loan would help improve her businesses.

loan.use: to purchase seeds, fertilizers, and pig feed

loan.name: Jessica

texts.en:
Jessica is a married woman with 2 children. She and her husband are both farmers. They till land in Sto. Nio, South Cotabato, where they also live. The main crop they grow to sell is rice. According to Jessica, they earn about 10000 PHP per month from rice farming.
Jessica has requested this loan to purchase fertilizers, insecticides, and seeds. Jessica hopes that their business will grow bigger.

loan.use: to purchase fertilizers, insecticides, and seeds

loan.name: Joebert

texts.en:
Joebert is a 39-year-old married man with 4 children. The oldest child is 11 years old.
Joebert is a farmer working in Sto. Nio, South Cotabato. He has been growing and selling rice for 10 years. He earns about 13000 PHP per month doing this type of farming. Joebert also raises pigs in his backyard. He has requested this loan to purchase pig feed, seeds, and fertilizers. Joebert hopes to be able to provide a better quality of life for his family.

loan.use: to purchase pig feed, seeds and fertilizers

loan.name: Lloyd

texts.en:
Lloyd is a 27-year-old farmer from Sto. Nio, South Cotabato. He is still single but hopes to have a family in the future.
Lloyd primarily grows rice crops to sell. He has been in this business for 5 years. Lloyd also started raising pigs to augment his income. He requested this loan to purchase piglets, feeds, and fertilizers. Lloyd hopes that his ventures will succeed.

loan.use: to purchase piglets, feeds, and fertilizers

loan.name: Lynett

texts.en:
Lynett is a 33-year-old married woman with 2 children aged 10 and 9. She is a farmer working in Sto. Nio, South Cotabato. Lynett helps her husband grow rice crops on their land. Lynett has been in rice farming for 10 years.
Lynett has requested this loan to purchase seeds, fertilizers, and insecticides. Lynett hopes that their farm will grow bigger. She also wishes for her children to be able to go to college and have a bright future.

loan.use: to purchase seeds, fertilizers, and insecticides

loan.name: Sanavbar

texts.en: Sanavbar lives in the Javan region. She is 43 years old and married. She has two children. Her husband is at work in Russia. Sanavbar herself works in a tailor shop. She sews men's trousers and women's national dresses. Besides this she sews curtains and blinds at home for trade. She has been in this kind of work for 27 years. She is requesting a loan to purchase fabric.

loan.use: Purchase fabric.

loan.name: Marilyn

texts.en:
45-year-old Marilyn is from the town of Sto. Nio, South Cotabato. She is married and has 3 children aged 20, 19 and 11. Marilyns husband is a farmer.
Marilyn is a balut (a boiled fertilized egg famous in the Philippines) maker. She has had this business for 7 years now. Marilyn also helps her husband grow rice on their land and raises pigs in their backyard. Marilyn has requested this loan to buy more duck eggs, pig feeds, and fertilizers. Marilyn hopes that their businesses will grow. She also hopes to be able to fund her 2 childrens college education.

loan.use: to buy more duck eggs, pig feeds, and fertilizers

loan.name: Marilyn

texts.en:
Marilyn is a 35-year-old married woman with 7 children. The oldest child is 17 years old. Her husband works as a farmer and a baker.
Marilyn has been in the business of rice farming for quite some time now. She earns about 8000 PHP per month doing this type of farming. Marilyn works hard to ensure that her family eats 3 times a day and to send her children to school. She has requested this loan to purchase fertilizers, pesticides, and other farm inputs. Marilyn hopes that her familys living situation will improve.

loan.use: to purchase fertilizers, pesticides, and other farm inputs

loan.name: Niel

texts.en:
Niel is a 46-year-old married woman with three children. The oldest child is 24 years old.
Niel is engaged in farming. She and her husband till land in Sto. Nio, South Cotabato. They primarily grow rice crops to sell. Niel also raises pigs in her backyard.
Niel has requested this loan to purchase seeds, fertilizers and pesticides. She hopes to earn better and be able to pay in full for the land that she acquired.

loan.use: to purchase seeds, fertilizers and pesticides.

loan.name: Nelia

texts.en:
Nelia is a 47-year-old married woman with 5 children. Her oldest child is 23 years old.
Nelia is a farmer working in Sto. Nio, South Cotabato. She has been growing and selling rice for over 10 years. Nelia has requested this loan to purchase fertilizers, seeds, and insecticides. Nelia hopes to be progressive in life. She also desires for her children to finish college and have a bright future.

loan.use: to purchase fertilizers, seeds, and insecticides

loan.name: Nena

texts.en: Nena is a 57-year-old widow with 5 children to look after. Nena does rice farming and raising pigs to earn a living. She tills a parcel of land in Sto. Nio, South Cotabato where she grows rice crops. She raises her pigs in her backyard. Nena sells pork meat to the people in her community. Nena works hard to provide for her children. She has requested this loan to purchase piglets, feeds, and vitamins. She hopes to start another business in the future.

loan.use: to purchase piglets, feeds, and vitamins

loan.name: Rustam

texts.en: Rustam is a resident of the Yavan region. He is 45 years old, married and has four children. His wife is a homemaker. He works as a mechanic. He has been in this business for ten years. Also in his free time from work he provides a taxi service. He transports people via the route Dushanbe - Yavan. He is taking out the loan to repair his car.

loan.use: to repair the car.

loan.name: Norberto

texts.en:
Norberto is a 57-year-old married man with 4 children. His oldest child is 22 years old.
Norberto is a farmer working in Sto. Nio, South Cotabato. He has been growing and selling rice for 25 years. He has requested this loan to purchase fertilizers, seeds, and herbicides. Norberto hopes that his business will grow. He also hopes for his children to finish their studies and be successful.

loan.use: to purchase fertilizers, seeds, and herbicides

loan.name: Rene

texts.en:
Rene is a 45-year-old married man with 3 children. His oldest child is 19 years old.
Rene is a farmer from Sto. Nio, South Cotabato. He has been growing rice for 12 years now. Rene earns about 15000 PHP per month doing this type of farming. He works hard to improve his business. Rene has requested this loan to purchase fertilizers and insecticides.
In the future, Rene hopes to have a stable business.

loan.use: to purchase fertilizers and insecticides

loan.name: Richel

texts.en:
Richel is a 35-year-old married woman with three children aged 12, 10 and 7. She is engaged in farming. Richel tills land in Sto. Nio, South Cotabato. She primarily grows rice crops to sell. Richel works hard to help provide for her familys needs and keep her children in school.
Richel requested this loan to purchase seeds, fertilizers and insecticides. Richel hopes to improve her familys living situation.

loan.use: to purchase seeds, fertilizers and insecticides.

loan.name: Roselyn

texts.en:
38-year-old Roselyn earns a living through farming. She is married and has 2 children aged 19 and 11.
Roselyn helps her husband grow rice crops on their land located in Sto. Nio, South Cotabato. Roselyn also runs a small sari-sari store business. She sells items like canned goods, shampoo and various other items. She has requested this loan to purchase seeds, fertilizers, and other farm inputs. Roselyn hopes to fund her childrens education through her businesses.

loan.use: to purchase seeds, fertilizers, and other farm inputs

loan.name: Sandra

texts.en:
Sandra is 45 years old and is a married woman with seven children. The oldest child is 26 years old.
Sandra helps her husband grow rice crops on their land located in Sto. Nio, South Cotabato. She also raises pigs in their backyard. Sandra does her best to support her family. She has requested this loan to purchase seeds, fertilizers and other farm inputs. Sandra hopes for this loan to help them achieve an abundant harvest.

loan.use: to purchase seeds, fertilizers and other farm inputs.

loan.name: Tessie

texts.en:
Tessie is a 47-year-old married woman with 4 children. Tessies husband works as a farmer and carpenter.
Tessie helps her husband plant rice crops on their land. She also raises pigs and sells delicacies to the people in her community. Tessie does all this to support her family. She has requested this loan to purchase seeds, fertilizers, and pig feeds. Tessie hopes that through their businesses, they will have a better quality of life.

loan.use: to purchase seeds, fertilizers, and pig feeds

loan.name: Annie

texts.en:
Annie is a married woman with three children. The oldest child is six years old.
Annie is engaged in farming. She tills land in Sto. Nio, South Cotabato. Annie primarily grows rice crops on her land. She is able to buy her familys basic needs through her income form the farm. Annie requested this loan to purchase fertilizers, insecticides and other farm supplies. Annie hopes to have a better quality of life.

loan.use: to purchase fertilizers, insecticides and other farm supplies.

loan.name: Odinahmad

texts.en: Odinahmad lives in the Javan region. He is married. He is 39 years old and has two children. For more than five years, Odinahmad has been a trader in the market. He rents a stall where he sells home goods and electronics. He is requesting a loan to purchase and clothes hangers and dishware to have a wider range of goods.

loan.use: purchase clothes hangers and dishware

loan.name: Diezan

texts.en:
Diezan is 47 years old and is a married man with two children, aged 6 and 2. Diezan is a farmer working in Sto. Nio, South Cotabato. He primarily grows rice and corn crops to sell. Diezan works hard to improve his business and continue providing for his family.
Diezan has requested this loan to purchase fertilizers, herbicides and other farm supplies. Diezan hopes to save for his childrens education.

loan.use: to purchase fertilizers, herbicides and other farm supplies.

loan.name: Edna

texts.en:
Edna is 45-year-old married woman with two children. Her husband is a farmer.
Edna raises pigs for a living. She has a backyard piggery, which she hopes to expand in the future. Edna also helps her husband keep their farm free of weeds and pests. Edna has requested this loan to purchase pig feeds and fertilizers. Edna hopes to start another income-generating project in the future.

loan.use: to purchase pig feeds and fertilizers.

loan.name: Nodira

texts.en: Nodira lives in the city of Tursun-zoda. She is 25 years old and unmarried. Nodira lives together with her parents. She is a trader in the market. She has her own store where she sells perfume, cosmetics and houseware. She has been doing this work for five years. She is requesting a loan to buy foodstuff. She wants to widen the variety of her goods.

loan.use: Purchase foodstuff

loan.name: Eduardo

texts.en: Eduardo is 52 years old and is a married man with five children. He has been in the business of raising hogs for 11 years. Eduardo earns about 8000 PHP from this business. He plans to use his loan to purchase piglets, feed and vitamins. Eduardo hopes to become a successful businessman someday. He also hopes to sustain his children's education.

loan.use: to purchase piglets, feed and vitamins.

loan.name: Dastagul

texts.en: Dastagul lives in the Dangara region. She is 46 years old. She is a widow with four children. Two of her sons are in high school and the other two are college students. Dastagul herself has been a businesswoman for 20 years. She has a grocery store. She is requesting a loan to buy confectionery, milk products, soft drinks and natural juices.

loan.use: To buy confectionary, milk products, soft drinks and natural juices.

loan.name: Anonymous
loan.use: purchase stock (iron, wire, stone, sheets, nails and others)

loan.name: Simiao

texts.pt:
Nasceu no Distrito de Panda, Provincia de Inhambane, sul de Moambique, casado e pai de 2 filhos todos frenquentam a Escola. Fez 6 classe e parou por falta de condies financeiras. Vive na casa propria com a sua familia e no sustenta mais ninguem.
Saiu da sua terra natal Inhambane para Maputo a procura de melhores condies, Alfaiate ha mais de 11 anos e consegue um rendimento de cerca de 4.500.00mt por ms que aplica nas despesas de casa e poupa algum na sua conta bancaria (BIM). Nunca teve emprestimos em outros bancos, conheceu a Hluvuku atravez de amigos que tambem sa clientes desta instituio. Este o seu sexto emprestimo na Hluvuku no valor de 25.000.00mt com qual pretende comprar material de construo de uma casa (cimento, ferro, pedra, pregos e outros) para dar continuidade com a sua obra. No futuro pretende manter a sua alfataria e fazer crescer o seu negocio, assim ir solicitar mais emprestimos a Hluvuku.
texts.en:
Simiao was born in the District of Panda in the Province of Inhambane in the south of Mozambique. Hes married and the father of 2 children who both attend school. He completed 6th grade and did not continue his education due to a lack of financial means. He lives in his own house with his family and does not support anyone else.
He left his home town Inhambane for Maputo in search of better living conditions. He has been a tailor for more than 11 years and manages a monthly income of around 4,500.00 meticals (MZN) which he spends on household expenditures and saves in his bank account.
He has never had loans from other banks and became acquainted with Hluvuku through friends who are also clients. This is his sixth loan with Hluvuku for the value of 25,000.00 MZN with which he intends to purchase construction materials for a house (cement, iron, stone, nails and others) to allow him to continue his build work.
In future he intends maintain his tailors shop and grow his business and as such he will solicit further loans from Hluvuku.

loan.use: purchase construction materials for a house (cement, iron, stone, nails and others)

loan.name: Anonymous
loan.use: purchase used clothing for re-sale

loan.name: Jamal

texts.en: Jamal is a 46-year-old man. He is married and has two sons and one daughter. As a municipality employee, he receives a decent salary, but he also has two other ventures, selling vintage home appliances and a chicken shop. These two side projects are another source of income for the family. Jamal wants to improve his two ventures by purchasing more vintage home appliances for sale as well as more chickens for his shop. He needs to take out a loan in the amount of $2,000 from FATEN and combine it with the amount he has to cover the full price. When Jamal gets the loan, which is repaid on a monthly basis, he will be able to make the payment and improve his work on the two side projects. He will have a better collection of vintage home appliances for sale and higher quantities of chickens for sale. This way he will increase his income and his family will live in better conditions. Jamal is photographed in the picture.

loan.use: To purchase more vintage home appliances and more chickens for his shop.

loan.name: Anonymous
loan.use: to buy products (rice, fish, eggs, peanuts, etc.).

loan.name: Anonymous
loan.use: to buy construction materials (sand, cement, stone, iron, etc.).

loan.name: Silveio

texts.pt:
Nasceu em Marpanha, provincia de Sofala, centro de Moambique, casado e pai de 3 filhos todos maiores de idade. Fez 4 classe e na continuou devido a falta de condies financeiras. Vive na casa propria com a sua familia e sustenta 3 netos que vivem com ele.
saiu da sua terra natal para Maputo a procura de emprego, pensionista e a esposa comerciante ha mais de 21 anos e tem uma penso e mais o rendimento da esposa d cerca de 8.800.00mt por ms que aplica nas despesas de casa e poupa algum na sua conta bancaria. Nunca teve emprestimos em outros bancos, conheceu a Hluvuku atravez de amigos que tambem sa clientes desta instituio. Este o seu quarto emprestimo na Hluvuku no valor de 20.000.00mt com qual pretende comprar material de construcao de uma casa (cimento, barrotes, areia, pedra, ferro, e outros.) para a sua obra. Os primeiros emprestimos foram de: 10.300.00mt, 17.000.00mt, e 12.000.00mt todos para o comercio. Tambem vende produtos de primeira necessidade no seu estabelecimento. No futuro pretende solicitar mais valor para concluir a sua casa para oferecer mais conforto a sua familia, ir solicitar mais emprestimos a Hluvuku.
texts.en: Silveio was born in Marpanha, in the province of Sofala in central Mozambique. He is married and the father of three adult children. He went to school through the fourth grade but had to drop out because of financial difficulties. He lives in his own home with his family, and also supports three grandchildren, who lives with them. He left Marpanha for Maputo to find a job. He is retired and his wife has owned a store for more than 21 years. He also has a pension. His wife earns about 8,800 meticals a month, which they use to cover household expenses. They are able to save a little in their bank account each month. He's never had loans from other banks. He learned about Hluvuku from coworkers who are also clients of the institution. This is his fourth loan with Hluvuku, in the amount of 20,000 meticals, which he will use to buy construction materials (cement, rebar, sand, stone, iron, etc.) to build a house. His first loans, in the amounts of 10,300, 17,000, and 12,000 meticals, were all used for the business. They also sell staple goods in their store. He hopes to ask for further loans from Hluvuku to finish his house so he can provide his family with a more comfortable life.

loan.use: to buy construction materials (cement, rebar, sand, stone, iron, etc.).

loan.name: Ernesto

texts.pt:
Nasceu na provincia de Inhambane, sul de Moambique, casado e pai de 6 filhos alguns maiores de idade e outros ainda frequentam a escola. Fez 5 classe e na continuou devido a falta de condies financeiras. Vive na casa propria com a sua familia e sustenta a sua sobrinha que vive com ele.
Nunca saiu da sua terra natal, trabalha como encarregado geral de uma bananalndia ha mais de 10 anos e tem um salario de 6.500.00mt por ms que aplica nas despesas de casa e poupa algum na sua conta bancaria. Nunca teve emprestimos em outros bancos, conheceu a Hluvuku atravez de amigos que tambem sa clientes desta instituio. Este o seu segundo emprestimo na Hluvuku no valor de 20.000.00mt com qual pretende comprar material de construcao de uma casa (cimento, barrotes, areia, pedra, ferro, e outros.) para a sua obra. Os primeiro emprestimo foi de 15.000.00mt para a compra de bens de consumo. No futuro pretende solicitar mais valor para concluir a sua casa, mobiliar para oferecer mais conforto a sua familia, ir solicitar mais emprestimos a Hluvuku.
texts.en: Ernesto was born in the province of Inhambane in southern Mozambique. He is married and the father of six children, some of whom are adults while the others attend school. He went to school through the fifth grade but had to drop out because of financial difficulties. He lives in his own home with his family, and also supports his nephew, who lives with him. He's never left Inhambane. He's worked as the general manager of a banana plantation for more than 10 years and earns about 6,500 meticals a month. He uses his salary to pay for household expenses and also saves a little in a bank account. He has never had loans from other banks. He learned about Hluvuku from friends who are also clients of the institution. This is his second loan, in the amount of 20,000 meticals, which he will use to purchase construction materials (cement, rebar, sand, stone, iron, etc.) to continue the construction on his house. His first loan was in the amount of 15,000 meticals, which he used to purchase consumer goods. He hopes to ask for further loans from Hluvuku to finish his house so he can provide his family with a more comfortable life.

loan.use: to purchase construction materials (cement, rebar, sand, stone, iron, etc.) for his house.

loan.name: Alberto

texts.pt:
Nasceu na provincia de Tete, norte de Moambique, casado e pai de 5 filhos todos maiores de idade. Fez 4 classe e na continuou devido a falta de condies financeiras. Vive na casa propria com a sua familia e no sustenta mais ninguem.
Saiu da sua terra natal em misso de servio, pensionista militar ha mais de 20 anos e tem uma penso de 6.800.00mt por ms que aplica nas despesas de casa e poupa algum na sua conta bancaria. Nunca teve emprestimos em outros bancos, conheceu a Hluvuku atravez de amigos que tambem sa clientes desta instituio. Este o seu quarto emprestimo na Hluvuku no valor de 16.000.00mt com qual pretende comprar material de construcao de construcao de uma casa (areia, pedra, cimento, barrotes, e outros) para dar continuidade com a sua casa. Os primeiros emprestimos foram de: 4.000.00mt, 8.500.00mt, e 12,500.00mt, para sua obra. No futuro pretende solicitar mais valor para concluir a sua casa, ir solicitar mais emprestimos a Hluvuku.
texts.en: Alberto was born in the province of Tete in northern Mozambique. He is married and the father of five adult children. He went to school through the fourth grade but had to drop out because of financial difficulties. He lives with his family in a home they own, and isn't financially responsible for anyone else. He left Tete in order to fulfill his military service. He retired from the military after 20 years and earns a pension of 6,800 meticals a month. He uses the pension to pay for household expenses and also saves a little in a bank account. He has never had loans from other banks. He learned about Hluvuku from friends who are also clients of the institution. This is his fourth loan, in the amount of 16,000 meticals, which he will use to purchase construction materials (sand, stone, cement, rebar, etc.) to continue the construction on his house. His first loans, in the amounts of 4,000, 8,500, and 12,500 meticals, were all also used for his home. He hopes to ask for further loans from Hluvuku so he can finish his house.

loan.use: to purchase construction materials (sand, stone, cement, rebar, etc.) for his house.

loan.name: Fernando

texts.pt:
Nasceu em Vilanculos, na provincia de Inhambane, sul de Moambique, casado e pai de 4 filhos todos ainda frequentam a escola. Fez 6 classe e na continuou devido a falta de condies financeiras. Vive na casa propria com a sua familia e no sustenta mais ninguem.
Saiu da sua terra natal a em busca de melhores condies de vida, fotgrafo ha mais de 5 anos e tem um salario de 12.000.00mt por ms que aplica nas despesas de casa e poupa algum na sua conta bancaria. Nunca teve emprestimos em outros bancos, conheceu a Hluvuku atravez de amigos que tambem sa clientes desta instituio. Este o seu primeiro emprestimo na Hluvuku no valor de 15.000.00mt, com qual pretende comprar material de construcao de construcao de uma casa (areia, ferro, pedra, cimento, barrotes, e outros.) para continuar com a obra da sua casa. No futuro pretende solicitar mais valor para concluir a sua casa, ir solicitar mais emprestimos a Hluvuku.
texts.en: Fernando was born in Vilanculos, in the province of Inhambane in southern Mozambique. He is married and the father of four children, all of whom attend school. He went to school through the sixth grade but had to drop out because of financial difficulties. He lives with his family in a home they own, and isn't financially responsible for anyone else. He left Vilanculos in search of a better life. He's been a photographer for more than five years and earns about 12,000 meticals a month. He uses his salary to pay for household expenses and also saves a little in a bank account. He has never had loans from other banks. He learned about Hluvuku from friends who are also clients of the institution. This is his first loan, in the amount of 15,000 meticals, which he will use to purchase construction materials (sand, iron, stone, cement, rebar, etc.) to continue the construction on his house. He hopes to ask for further loans from Hluvuku so he can finish his house.

loan.use: to purchase construction materials (sand, iron, stone, cement, rebar, etc.) for his house.

loan.name: Anonymous
loan.use: to purchase home construction materials (sand iron, stones, cement, beams, etc.)

loan.name: Telma

texts.pt:
Nasceu na cidade de Maputo, provincia do mesmo nome, sul de Moambique, viuva e me de 1 filho que frequenta a escola. Fez 10 classe e na continuou devido a falta de condies financeiras. Vive na casa propria com a sua familia e sustenta os pais enviando dinheiro para auxiliar nas dispesas.
Nunca saiu da sua terra natal, comerciante ha mais de 2 anos e tem um rendimendo de cerca de 5.000.00mt, por ms que aplica nas despesas de casa e poupa algum na sua conta bancaria. Nunca teve emprestimos em outros bancos, conheceu a Hluvuku atravez de amigas que tambem sa clientes desta instituio. Este o seu primeiro emprestimo na Hluvuku no valor de 15.000.00mt, com qual pretende comprar produtos (leo, arroz, amendoim,sumos, peixe, e outros.) para aumentar o volume do negocio. No futuro pretende solicitar mais valor para ampliar a sua actividade comercial e construir um salo,ir solicitar mais emprestimos a Hluvuku.
texts.en:
Born in Maputo city, in the province of the same name, in southern Mozambique, the borrower is a widow and the mother of a son who goes to school. She completed Grade 10 but did not continue as it was too expensive. She lives in her own house with her family, and supports her parents by sending money to assist with their expenses.
She has never left her homeland. She has been running a small business for more than two years and earns about 5,000 MT (Mozambican Meticals) per month. She uses this for household expenses and saves some in her bank account.
She has never had loans with other banks. She found out about Hluvuku through friends who are also clients of this institution. This is her first loan with Hluvuku for the amount of 15,000 MT. With the loan she will buy more products (oil, rice, peanuts, juices, fish, and others) to increase the volume of business.
In the future she will try to grow her business and build a space for it. She will ask for more loans from Hluvuku.

loan.use: buy products for sale (oil, rice, peanuts, fish and other items.)

loan.name: Manessa

texts.pt:
Nasceu na cidade de Maputo, provincia do mesmo nome, sul de Moambique, solteira e me de 3 filhos dos quais 2 maiores de idade e um ainda frequenta a escola. Fez 5 classe e na continuou devido a falta de condies financeiras. Vive na casa propria com a sua familia e sustenta mais dois sobrinhos que vivem com ela.
Nunca saiu da sua terra natal, comerciante ha mais de 5 anos e tem um rendimendo de cerca de 8.500.00mt, por ms que aplica nas despesas de casa e poupa algum na sua conta bancaria. Nunca teve emprestimos em outros bancos, conheceu a Hluvuku atravez de amigas que tambem sa clientes desta instituio. Este o seu primeiro emprestimo na Hluvuku no valor de 12.000.00mt, com qual pretende comprar cerveja E refrescos para aumentar a quantidade da sua mercadoria. No futuro pretende solicitar mais valor para ampliar a sua actividade comercial e construir uma casa,ir solicitar mais emprestimos a Hluvuku.
texts.en:
Born in Maputo city, in the province of the same name, in southern Mozambique, the borrower is single and the mother of three children. Two are adults, and one still attends school. She completed Grade 5 and did not continue due to lack of funds. She lives in her own home with her family and supports two nephews who live with her.
She has never left her homeland. She has run a small business for more than five years and earns about 8,500 MT (Mozambican Meticals) per month. She uses this money for household expenses and saves some in her bank account.
She has never had loans with other banks. She found out about Hluvuku through friends who are also clients of this institution. This is her first loan with Hluvuku for the amount of 12,000 MT. With the loan she will buy beer and soft drinks to increase the amount of goods in her small shop.
In the future she will try to grow her business and build a house. She will ask for more loans from Hluvuku.

loan.use: to buy beer and soft drinks to sell.

loan.name: Grande

texts.pt:
Nasceu na provincia de Tete, norte de Moambique, casado e pai de 7 filhos dos quais 5 maiores de idade e 2 ainda frequentam a escola. Fez a 4 classe e no continuou devido a falta de condies financeiras. Vive na casa propria com a sua familia e no sustenta mais ninguem.
Saiu da sua terra natal em misso de servio, pensionista militar ha mais de 18 anos e tem uma penso de 4.571.00mt, por ms que aplica nas despesas de casa e poupa algum na sua conta bancaria. Nunca teve emprestimos em outros bancos, conheceu a Hluvuku atravez de amigos que tambem sa clientes desta instituio. Este o seu QUINTO emprestimo na Hluvuku no valor de 10.000.00mt, com qual pretende comprar material de construcao de uma casa (ferro, chapas, cimento, pedra, e outros.) para dar continuidade a sua obra. Os primeiros emprestimos foram de: 8.600.00mt, 11.000.00mt, 7.000.00mt, e 14.000.00mt todos para a mesma finalidade. No futuro pretende solicitar mais valor para concluir a sua casa e oferecer conforto a sua familia, ir solicitar mais emprestimos a Hluvuku.
texts.en:
Grande was born in Tete Province in northern Mozambique. He is married and has seven children; five of them are grown, and two still attend school. Grande finished fourth grade and did not continue school because of financial problems. He lives in his own house with his family and does not support anyone else.
He left his hometown on a work assignment. Grande has been retired from the military for more than 18 years and has a pension of 4,571 meticais per month. He uses the money for household expenses and saves some in his bank account.
He has never had loans from other banks, and he learned about Hluvuku through friends who are also customers of this institution. This is his fifth Hluvuku loan; he is asking for 10,000 meticais to buy home construction materials (iron, metal sheets, cement, stone and other items) so he can continue building his house. The previous loans were for: 8,600 meticais; 11,000 meticais; 7,000 meticais; and 14,000 meticais, all for the same purpose.
In the future Grande intends to ask for more money to finish his house and make his family comfortable, so he will ask Hluvuku for more loans.

loan.use: to buy construction materials for a house (iron, metal sheets, cement, stone, etc.).

loan.name: Arlindo

texts.pt:
Nasceu na cidade de Maputo, provincia do mesmo nome, sul de Moambique, casado e pai de 1 filho que ainda frequenta a escola. Fez a 7 classe e no continuou devido a falta de condies financeiras. Vive na casa propria com a sua familia e sustenta mais uma enteada enviando dinheiro para auxiliar nos estudos.
Nunca saiu da sua terra natal, refretrio na empresa DICKSON Moambique ha mais de 6 anos e tem um salario de 8.000.00mt, por ms que aplica nas despesas de casa e poupa algum na sua conta bancaria. Nunca teve emprestimos em outros bancos, conheceu a Hluvuku atravez de amigos que tambem sa clientes desta instituio. Este o seu segundo emprestimo na Hluvuku no valor de 10.000.00mt com qual pretende comprar material de de construcao de uma casa (areia, ferro, chapas, cimento, pedra, e outros.) para dar continuidade a sua obra. O primeiro emprestimo foi de: 10.000.00mt para a sua obra. No futuro pretende solicitar mais valor para ampliar a sua casa e oferecer mais conforto a sua familia, ir solicitar mais emprestimos a Hluvuku.
texts.en: He was born in the town of Maputo, in the province of the same name, in southern Mozambique. He is married and has a son who still goes to school. He completed 7th grade and didn't continue for lack of financial conditions. He lives with his family in a house he owns. He also supports his stepdaughter by sending money to help with her education. He has never left his homeland. He has worked in refractory services for Dickinson Mozambique for over six years and earns a salary of 8.000mt a month. He uses it to pay for home expenses and saves part of it in his bank account. He has never had loans in other banks. He first heard of Hluvuku through friends who are also clients of this institution. This is his second loan with Hluvuku. It is for 10.000mt, which he intends to use to purchase house construction supplies (sand, iron, metal sheets, cement, stone, etc.) so that he can keep building. The first loan was for 10.000mt to build his house. In the future, he plans to request more money in order to enlarge his house and offer more comfort to his family. He will request other loans to Hluvuku.

loan.use: to purchase house construction supplies (sand, iron, metal sheets, cement, stone, etc.).

loan.name: Anonymous
loan.use: to purchase house construction supplies (rafters, iron, sand, cement, stone, etc.).

loan.name: Elicha

texts.pt:
Nasceu na cidade de Maputo, provincia do mesmo nome, sul de Moambique, solteiro e no tem filhos. Frequenta a Univercidade Pedaggica e est no 1 ano de psicologia. Vive na casa propria com a sua familia e sustenta seus irmos que vivem com ele.
Nunca saiu da sua terra natal, professor ha mais de 2 anos e tem um salario de 5.050.00mt, por ms que aplica nas despesas de casa e poupa algum na sua conta bancaria. Nunca teve emprestimos em outros bancos, conheceu a Hluvuku atravez de amigos que tambem sa clientes desta instituio. Este o seu primeiro emprestimo na Hluvuku no valor de 10.000.00mt, com qual pretende comprar material de de construcao de uma casa (barrotes, ferro, areia, cimento, pedra, e outros.) para dar continuidade sua obra. No futuro pretende solicitar mais valor para concluir os seus estudos para melhorar as condies de vida da sua familia, ir solicitar mais emprestimos a Hluvuku.
texts.en:
Elicha was born in the city of Maputo in the province of the same name in southern Mozambique. He is single and has no children and is in his first year studying psychology at the Universidade Pedaggica. He has never left his hometown and he lives at home with his family and supports his brothers and sisters who also live with him.
He is a teacher and has earned a monthly salary of 5,050 MZN [Mozambique Meticais] for two years, which goes to his household expenses and also some savings in his personal bank account.
He has never taken out a loan from any other bank and became aware of Hluvuku [Kiva field partner] through some friends who are also Hluvuku clients.
