This will be his first loan with Hluvuku in the amount of 10,000 MZN [Mozambique Meticais] with which he plans to buy construction materials (bricks, steel, cement, etc.) so she can continue working on his house.
He plans to take out further loans from Hluvuku in the future to finish his studies and improve his family's living conditions.

loan.use: to buy construction materials (bricks, steel, cement, etc.)

loan.name: Mame

texts.fr: Monsieur Mame vit au Sngal. Il est g de 34 ans. Il sactive depuis plus de 10ans dans le commerce. Il gre une boutique dalimentation gnrale et vend des denres alimentaires de toute sorte. Il a hrit cette activit de son pre. Il est socitaire de lun des guichets de lU-IMCEC depuis octobre 2006. Il sollicite un crdit de 400 000 frs prvu pour lachat de denres en particuliers de nouveaux produits pour les besoins de son commerce. Son objectif est de renforcer son fond de commerce pour mieux dvelopper ses activits, accroitre ses bnfices et faire face a ses charges de chef de famille.
texts.en:
Mr. Mame lives in Senegal. He is 34 years old and has been active for over ten years in commerce. He manages a grocery store and sells provisions of all kinds. This business was passed down to him by his father.
Mr. Mame has been an associate of a U-IMCEC branch since October 2006. He is requesting a loan of 400,000 for buying grocery items, new products in particular, for business purposes.
His goal is to bolster his working capital to develop his business further, to increase his profit, and to meet his responsibilities as head of household.

loan.use: to buy grocery items to resell

loan.name: Aby

texts.fr: Madame Aby est une matrone a la retraite qui habite au Sngal. Elle est veuve et volue dans le secteur du commerce, en particuliers dans la vente de thioups, wax, vaisselle, encens et savon. Elle a une exprience de 2 ans dans son activit. Madame Aby est en retraite et ne veut pas rester oisive sans rien faire. Cest la raison pour laquelle elle a choisi cette activit de commerce qui lui permet de se procurer des revenus et de complter sa pension de sorte quelle pourra couvrir ses dpenses familiales. Elle sollicite un crdit de 500 000 frs prvu pour lachat de marchandises quelle commercialise. Son souhait est de maximiser ses bnfices.
texts.en: Ms. Aby is a trained midwife in retirement who lives in Senegal. She is a widow and works in commerce, particularly in selling thioup cloth, wax cloth, pots and pans, incense, and soap. She has two years of experience in this business. Ms. Aby is a retiree but does not want to remain idle with nothing to do. For this reason, she chose this work in commerce that allows her to have an income and to round out her pension. In this way, she will be able to cover her family expenses. She is requesting a loan of 500,000 francs for buying merchandise that she sells. Her wish is to maximize her profits.

loan.use: to buy thioup and wax fabrics, pots and pans, and other goods to resell

loan.name: Mamadou

texts.fr: Monsieur Mamadou est un homme mari de 59 ans qui vit au Sngal. Il est marabout de profession mais sactive en mme temps dans la vente dhabits(Thioups) et de tlphones. Il a une exprience de 20 ans dans son activit. Il a choisi cette activit par opportunit, et ce qui lintresse le plus ce sont les gains financiers. Il est socitaire de lun des guichets de lU-IMCEC depuis juin 2002. Il a dj rembours 11 crdits antrieurs. Il sollicite un prt de 100 000 frs prvu pour le rglement dune commande de thioups quil aurait reu. Son objectif est de renouveler son stock pour rpondre la demande de la clientle en ces veilles de fte. Son souci est damliorer le niveau de ses profits.
texts.en: Mr. Mamadou is a 59-year-old married man who lives in Senegal. He is a traditional healer by profession but is active at the same time in selling clothing (of thioup cloth) and telephones. He has 20 years of experience in this work, which he chose by chance. Most interesting to him are the financial gains. He has been an associate of a U-IMCEC branch since June 2002. He has already repaid eleven previous loans. He is requesting a loan of 100,000 francs for settling a bill for an order of thioups that he would have received. His goal is to renew his stock of goods to respond to customer demand as the holidays approach. His concern is to improve his level of profit.

loan.use: to buy "thioup" cloth to resell

loan.name: Carmen Rosa

texts.es: La seora Carmen Rosa, tiene 30 aos vive en concubinato, tienen 4 hijos pequeos los cuales dependen de sus ingresos, viven en la comunidad de Esquilan Chico en una pequea casa, su principal actividad es la produccin de la leche cruda, actualmente cuenta con 2 cabezas de ganado lechero en produccin y una cabeza de ganado preada, la leche vende a PIL, que es una empresa dedicada a la fabricacin de productos lcteos. El destino del crdito es para la compra de un tanque de enfriamiento, dicha compra se est realizando por un grupo de personas los cuales no contaban con un tanque para acumular la leche, actualmente existe otro tanque, pero es demasiado lejos para transportar la leche y depositarla alli, con la compra de dicho tanque se beneficiaran todo el grupo porque se instalara en la zona. Entre sus sueos y metas es, en futuro contar con una granja pequea, y realizar una nueva construccin de su domicilio ya que la tiene la construccin est en mal estado.
texts.en:
Carmen Rosa, 30, has a spouse and four small children who depend on her income. They live in the community of Esquilan Chico in a small house. Her main activity is raw milk production. She currently owns two heads of dairy cattle in production and one pregnant cow. She sells the milk to PIL which is a firm dedicated to manufacturing dairy products.
The loan is to buy a cooling tank. This purchase is being undertaken by a group of people who did not have a milk storage tank. Currently, there is another tank in existence but its too far away to transport the milk there to be stored. The purchase of said tank will benefit the entire group because it will be installed in the area.
Among her dreams and goals for the future are to have a small farm and start to build a new house because the one she has built now is in poor condition.

loan.use: to pay her share of a raw milk cooling tank.

loan.name: Jos Carlos

texts.es:
El seor Jos tiene 28 aos de edad vive con su compaera de vida y cuatro hijos.
El seor Jos se dedica desde hace cuatro aos a la crianza, engorde y venta de cerdos, l los compra de 22 das de nacido y luego los cuida para poder venderlos bien. Antes el se dedicaba a la agricultura como jornalero, incluso hoy en da tambin trabaja en eso, adems del cuido de los cerdos.
El debe comprar concentrado para alimentar a sus cerdos, para esto debe trasladarse hasta la ciudad en busca de ellos.
Don Jos quiere seguir trabajando para sacar adelante a su familia, por lo que esta solicitando un prstamo a Fundacin Campo, para la compra de cinco cerdos pequeos, concentrado de inicio y concentrado de engorde, as como fertilizantes para la milpa. Con esto don Jos podr recibir mejores ingresos, lo que le permitir mejorar la calidad de vida de su familia, al mismo tiempo estara incrementando la cantidad de la crianza de cerdos. l es un cliente recurrente de la fundacin y ha pagado a tiempo sus cuotas, ya que de este rubro se obtiene un buen margen de ganancias.
Don Jos espera seguir en la crianza de los cerdos, quiere comprar una novilla e instalar la luz en su casa, as como hacer un galera para tener mas cerdos y reparar el techo de la granja.
texts.en:
Jos is 28 years old. He lives with his life partner and their four children. For the last four years Jos has been raising pigs to sell. He buys them when they are 22 days old and then cares for them in order to sell them well. Before, he used to work as a day worker in farming and today he still does that besides taking care of the pigs. He needs to buy feed concentrate to feed his pigs and to do so he must travel to the city in search of it.
Jos wants to continue working to support his family so hes asking Fundacin Campo for a loan to buy five piglets, the starting concentrate and fattening concentrate as well as fertilizer for his corn crop. With this, Jos will be able to earn better income that will allow him to improve his familys quality of life while at the same time hed be increasing the number of pigs hes raising.
Hes a returning client of the Fundacin and has made his installment payments on time because he earns a good profit margin from this line of work. He hopes to continue raising pigs. He wants to buy a young heifer and install electricity in his house as well as to build corrals to have more pigs and to repair the farms roof.

loan.use: to buy pigs and feed for them.

loan.name: Mujeres Unidas Del Divino Nio Jesus Group

texts.es: El comit denominado Mujeres Unidas del Divino Nio Jess, se form gracias a la iniciativa D. una D. las miembros, la cual haba escuchado sobre el programa D. mujeres emprendedoras D. la Fundacin Paraguaya. Despus D. esto form a sus amigas y vecinas D. lo que surge el grupo. Todas ellas se unieron con el propsito D. mejoras sus condiciones D. vida y la D. su familia. Una D. las miembros es la seora Andresa, ella tiene una mercera, donD. venD. todo tipo D. artculos, como ser prendas D. vestir, artculos para regalo y otros. Mediante su negocio, el cual le genera sus ingresos, ella pueD. mantener a su familia y a quienes D. ella dependen. Comenta que tiene una clientela bien formada que siempre compran D. ella. Ella solicita el crdito para la compra D. artculos para regalos, prendas y otros artculos para abastecer su local y D. esa forma poder cumplir con sus clientes. Agradece a la Fundacin por la oportunidad que esta le da.
texts.en:
This committee, named United Women of the Divine Child Jesus, was formed thanks to the initiative of one of its members, who had heard about the program for enterprising women promoted by the Paraguay Foundation. Afterwards, she got together with her friends and neighbors to create what became the group. All the women united around the proposal of improving their condition of life and that of their families.
One of the members is Andresa who has a notions shop where she sells all sorts of articles, including items of clothing, gift articles, and other things. By means of the store, which generates her income, she can maintain her family and all those who depend on her. Andresa comments that she has a well-developed clientele who always buy from her.
Andresa requests the loan to buy gift articles, items of clothing, and other items to supply her shop, and in this manner, to be able to satisfy her customers. She is very grateful to the Foundation for the opportunity it provides.

loan.use: buy gift merchandise, including women's garments, and other items to sell.

loan.name: Francisca

texts.es: La seora Francisca tiene 71 aos, es casada, tienen 5 hijos los cuales son independientes, doa Francisca a pesar de su edad sigue trabando con la ayuda de sus hijas, vive en la comunidad de Esquilan Chico, en la provincia de Quillacollo, del departamento de Cochabamba. Su principal actividad es la produccin de la leche cruda, actualmente cuenta con 10 cabezas de ganado lechero en produccin, el producto entrega a PIL, una empresa que se dedica a la elaboracin de productos lcteos. El destino del prstamo es para la compra de un tanque de enfriamiento, dicha compra se est realizando por un grupo de personas los cuales no contaban con un tanque para acumular la leche, o si tenan otro tanque les quedaba muy lejos, entonces un grupo de personas decidi comprar un tanque con lo cual se beneficiara todo la zona. Uno de sus sueos es seguir creciendo en su actividad hasta llegar a tener una pequea granja de por lo menos 30 cabezas que pueda pasar al manejo de sus hijas.
texts.en:
Francisca is 71 years old, is married, and has five adult children. In spite of her age, Francisca is able to continue working with the help of her children. She lives in the town of Esquilan Chico, in the Quillacollo province, in the Cochabamba department. Her main business activity is the production of raw milk. Currently she has 10 head of dairy cattle. She delivers the product to PIL, a factory that makes dairy products.
The purpose of the loan is to buy a cooling tank. This purchase is being made by a group of people who do not have a tank for collecting milk or who have another tank that is too far away. So the group decided to buy a tank that could benefit everyone in the area.
One of her dreams is to continue growing her business until she has a little farm with at least 30 head of cattle that she can pass on to her daughters.

loan.use: to buy a cooling tank for raw milk with a group of people

loan.name: Leonardo

texts.es:
El seor Leonardo tiene 57 aos de edad, vive con su compaera de vida, tres de sus seis hijos, y un nieto. Sus tos le ensearon a ganarse el pan de cada da como agricultor, y actualmente tiene 20 aos de desempear esta labor. Anteriormente el trabajaba como jornalero.
Para comprar sus insumos don Leonardo debe caminar cinco kilmetros y luego abordar un bus que recorre otros dos kilmetros. Luego, l paga un carro para que lo lleve a su casa ya con los productos comprados. El viaje completo demora mas o menos tres horas ida y vuelta. Este viaje lo hace dos veces al ao, en mayo y agosto, cuando es poca de cultivacin.
Don Leonardo esta solicitando un prstamo a Fundacin Campo para la compra de una yunta de bueyes, debido a que se aproxima la temporada de recoleccin de las cosechas de maz que el produce. Con la nueva yunta de bueyes l podr sacar la cosecha de manera mas rpida, ya que podr sacar el doble de producto en un solo viaje. Adicionalmente, con la nueva yunta Don Leonardo prestar sus servicios de acarreo y arado de tierra a las personas de su comunidad. Con mayor eficiencia, y los ingresos adicionales mejorar el nivel de vida de su familia. De igual forma, l siente que ayudar a las personas de su comunidad prestndoles un servicio que les ayudar a tener mejores ganancias.
texts.en:
Leonardo is 57 years old, lives with his life partner, three of their seven children, and one grandson. His uncles taught him to earn his daily bread as a farmer, and now he has been doing that work for 20 years. Previously he worked as a day laborer.
To buy his supplies, Leonardo must walk five kilometers and then get on a bus that goes another two kilometers. Then, he hires a car to take him to his house along with his purchases. The entire journey takes about three hours round trip. He makes this trip twice a year, in May and August, when its planting season.
Leonardo is asking for a loan from Fundacin Campo to buy a team of oxen for the upcoming corn crop that he grows. With the new team of oxen he will be able to harvest the corn more quickly which means he will be able to double his product in one trip. Also, with the new oxen Leonardo will rent his hauling and plowing services to people in the community. With more efficiency and additional income he will improve the quality of life for his family. By the same token, he feels he will help the people of his community by providing them a service that will help them get more income.

loan.use: to buy a team of oxen

loan.name: Mujeres Emprendedoras Group

texts.es: El comit "Mujeres Emprendedoras" se origin a travs de promociones que fue hecho en el barrio. Todas las integrantes son de la misma zona, conocidas y vecinas del barrio. El objetivo de cada de una de ellas es trabajar, fomentar el espritu solidario y llegar al nivel mximo del programa. Desean poder crecer no solo econmicamente sino tambin en lo personal. Una de las miembros es la seora Raimunda, ella se dedica a la venta de comestibles, mediante lo cual puede ayudar en los gastos de la casa y en la manutencin de la familia. Comenta que tiene muchos clientes,pues tiene una sazn deliciosa. As tambin nos dice que le gustara poder seguir con esto e ir creciendo da a da gracias a su trabajo. Ella solicita el crdito para la compra de carne, pollo, harina, huevos y otros, los cuales son insumos necesarios para la elaboracin de los alimentos que ella vende.
texts.en:
The 'Mujeres Emprendedoras' (Entrepreneurial Women) committee was created as a result of promotional work that took place in their neighborhood. All the members of the group are from the same area. They are neighbors and acquaintances from the same neighborhood. The aims of each and every one of them are to work, to promote a supportive spirit within their group and to reach the top level of the program. They would like to grow not only financially but also on a personal level.
One of the members of this group is Raimunda whose business is selling food. This work enables her to help cover her household expenses and help support her family. She tells us that she has a lot of customers because her food tastes delicious. She also tells us that she would like to be able to continue in the program and continue growing every day thanks to her work.
Raimunda is requesting a loan to buy meat, chicken, flour, eggs and other products which are the supplies she needs to make the food that she sells.

loan.use: to buy meat, chicken, flour, eggs, etc.

loan.name: Angelita Maritza

texts.es: Angelita mujer trabajadora, emprendedora, comerciante, sus hijos estudiantes. El mayor proyect que tiene es mejorar la infraestructura de la vivienda as su familia tendr proteccin y seguridad. Con el prstamo compra mercadera para vender como: lotera, raspadita entre otros productos. Que comercializa siendo el generador del sustento de su familia. Agradece a la financiera por el apoyo a mejorar su nivel de vida y el desarrollo de su negocio.
texts.en:
Angelita is a hardworking and enterprising merchant, and her children are students. Her main project is to improve the infrastructure of her home so that her family will have protection and security.
With the loan she will buy merchandise to sell such as lottery scratch-offs and other items that she sells to be the breadwinner for her family. She thanks the lender for the support to improve her quality of life and to develop her business.

loan.use: to purchase lottery ticket merchandise

loan.name: Nancy Estela

texts.es: La seora Nancy es de la ciudad de Encarnacin, ella es una clienta recurrente de la Fundacin, siempre cumple muy bien con sus obligaciones. Se dedica a la venta de prendas para damas y caballeros, este es su medio de subsistencia y la de su familia. Ella comenta que todos los das empieza a muy tempranas horas su jornada de trabajo, regresando muy tarde ya a su casa. Dice que este trabajo la ayuda a poder salir adelante y darle a su familia una vida digna y decorosa. Quiere continuar con su negocio, por lo que quiere seguir invirtiendo en el. Ella solicita el crdito para la compra de prendas de todo tipo, con lo cual podr cumplir las demandas de clientes. Agradece a la Fundacin, por la oportunidad que esta le brinda, pues de obtener el crdito le ser de gran ayuda.
texts.en:
Nancy is from the city of Encarnacin. She is a returning client of the Fundacin [Paraguaya], and always fulfills her obligations very well.
Nancy sells clothing for women and men. This is her means of support and that of her family. She says that she begins her work day very early every day, returning home when it is already very late. This work helps her to be able to get ahead and give her family a proper and honorable life.
She wants to continue with her business, which is why she wants to continue investing in it.
Nancy is requesting the loan to buy all types of clothes so she will be able to fulfill her customers' orders. She thanks the Fundacin for the opportunity it is offering her, since receiving the loan will be a big help.

loan.use: to buy clothing to sell.

loan.name: Janeth

texts.en:
Janeth is 23 years old, married, has one dependent child, and lives in the town of Esquilan Chico in a small house. Her main business activity is producing raw milk. Currently she has three head of dairy cattle. She sells the milk to a factory that makes dairy products.
The loan is to buy a cooling tank. This purchase is being made for a group of people who do not have their own cooling talk to collect all their milk. There is another tank but it is located very far away. The purchase of this new tank will benefit everyone.
Among her dreams is, in the near future, to have a small farm with many dairy cows.

loan.use: to buy a cooling tank for raw milk with other farmers.

loan.name: Javier

texts.es: El seor Javier tiene 44 aos de edad y vive en una casa propia que comparte con de sus hermanos domicilio que esta ubicado en el barrio Lourdes de la ciudad de Tarija. Javier es casado y tiene 2 hijos de 20 y 13 aos a quienes cuida y apoya en su educacin y estudios. El seor Javier se dedica desde hace ms de 10 a trabajar como empleado pblico. Y los fines de semana a la preparacin de comidas para ocasiones especiales como ser cumpleaos, bautizos, matrimonios y otros eventos. Javier quiere tener mejores ingresos para salir adelante junto a su familia, pero l nos cuenta que tiene la necesidad de comprar un mejor equipo para poder preparar las comidas porque el que tiene esta pequeo. Es por eso que el crdito ser destinado para la compra de estos equipos, para de ese modo poder incrementar sus ingresos econmicos. Javier nos cuenta que quiere mejorar las condiciones de vida que tiene, por eso nos dice que el proximo credito que solicite sera para ampliar la actividad que tiene.
texts.en: Javier is 44 years old and lives in his own house which he shares with his brothers household and which is located in the Lourdes neighborhood in the city of Tarija. Javier is married and has two children who are 20 and 13 years old and who he cares for and supports in their education and studies. Javier has been working for more than 10 years as a public employee. On the weekends he makes food for special occasions like birthdays, baptisms, and other events. Javier would like to have more income in order to move forward together with his family, but he says that he has to buy better equipment to be able to prepare food because what he has now is small. Its for this reason that the loan is for the purchase of that equipment because that way he can increase his income. Javier says that he wants to improve his living conditions, and for this reason he says that the next loan he asks for will be to expand the business he has.

loan.use: to buy equipment to prepare food for social events

loan.name: Juan Antonio

texts.es:
Juan es un joven de 21 aos de edad, muy luchador con muchos sueos que cumplir, l vive con su mam.
l desde pequeo le ha tocado trabajar, a sus ocho aos de edad empez a trabajar en la agricultura y fue su to quien le enseo, ya que sus padres se separaron, por tener que trabajar para ayudar a su mam l solo logro estudiar hasta el cuarto grado, aprendiendo lo necesario de leer y escribir, luego el salio de su hogar a la edad de 16 aos en busca de su pap a la ciudad, all lo encuentra y l le ensea a manejar en un carro que tenia para hacer viajes a otras personas y cobrar por ese servicio, de esta forma el fue ganando experiencia como motorista, a los 18 aos el inicia a trabajar como motorista de camiones que trasladan madera a distintas partes del pas, l maneja durante cinco horas para entregar los fletes de madera, para esto l debe cargar el camin por la tarde de 6:00 p.m. a 10:00 p.m. una vez cargado sale a las 3:00 a.m. de la madrugada a dejar la madera.
l desea emprender esta actividad de manera independiente, comprar la madera e irla a distribuir a mejores precios, por su propia cuenta, es por eso que esta solicitando un crdito a Fundacin Campo. Con esto l recibir mejores ingresos y ser una gran oportunidad para seguir luchando y proporcionarle a su familia algo mejor, ya que el desea ahorrar para comprarse un camin, ya que el trabajar de manera independiente es su visin.
El desea ser un ejemplo para otros jvenes, que con esfuerzo se puede alcanzar todo en la vida, solo basta trabajar y proponerse metas.
texts.en:
Juan is a young man of 21 who is very determined, with many dreams to fulfill. He lives with his mother. He has had to work from a young age. At the age of eight he began to work in farming; his uncle taught him, since his parents were separated.
Because of having to help his mother, he only managed to attend school to fourth grade, learning the basics of reading and writing. Then he left home at 16 to look for his father in the city. He found him there, and his father taught him to drive a car that he owned, so that he could take people on trips, and charge for that service. In this way, he started to gain experience as a driver.
At the age of 18, he began to drive the trucks that transport wood to different parts of the country. He drives for five hours to deliver the shipments of wood. To do this, he has to load the truck in the evening from 6:00pm to 10:00pm. Once loaded, he leaves at 3:00am to drop off the wood.
He wishes to undertake this work on an independent basis; buying the wood and distributing it at better prices on his own. That is why he is applying to Fundacin Campo for a loan. In this way, he will receive a better income. It will be a great opportunity to continue working hard, and to provide his family with a better life; as he wants to save to buy his own truck, since his vision is to work independently.
He wishes to be an example for other young men, who with effort can achieve everything in life; they only have to work and set goals.

loan.use: To buy wood.

loan.name: Mujeres Maravilla Group

texts.es: La formacin de este comit fue gracias a la seora Adelaida, pues ella contact con sus amigas y vecinas del barrio y las organizo, y de all surge el comit. Ellas son en total 21 mujeres, las cuales trabajan de forma coordinada, conjunta y dentro de un ambiente de respeto. La seora Adelaida se dedica a la venta de cosmticos hace ya un tiempo, por lo que ya tiene una clientela bien formada, pues siempre muchas mujeres le hacen pedidos de los cosmticos que vende. Comenta que tiene mucha demanda por lo que le gustara seguir invirtiendo en su pequeo emprendimiento. Adems de eso nos dice que por medio de este trabajo ella ha logrado mantener y sacar adelante a su familia. Ella solicita el crdito para la compra de cosmticos, para que pueda surtirse y cumplir con la demanda de sus clientes. Agradece a la Fundacin por la oportunidad que esta le brinda, pues de obtener el crdito le ser de mucha ayuda.
texts.en:
This group was formed thanks to Adelaida, who contacted her friends and neighbors in the neighborhood and organized them to form the group. They are 21 women in all who work in a coordinated and unified manner, and in a respectful environment.
Adelaida has been selling cosmetics for a long time already, and because of this she already has a well-established clientele, since many women always order cosmetics from her. She comments that because she has lots of orders she would like to continue investing in her small business. She also tells us that she has been able to support her family and get them ahead with this job.
Adelaida is requesting the loan to buy cosmetics so she can stock her business and fulfill her customers' orders. She thanks the Fundacin [Paraguaya] for the opportunity it is offering her, since obtaining the loan will be of great help.

loan.use: to buy cosmetics to sell.

loan.name: Luisa Ercilia

texts.es: Doa Luisa, cuenta con su propio negocio, un comedor desde hace veintidos aos, el cual ha venido creciendo, al trabajar con dedicacion en su negocio para el apoyo economico de su familia, su esposo se desempea en administracion de empresa, el cual ha apoyado con el dinero de su labor. Es madre de tres hijos, uno casado y dos estudiante de la universidad, doa luisa, ha sido muy trabajadora, comenzo con la venta de fritanga , lo que con los aos, puso su comedor con las ganancias y luego con financiamiento en Afodenic, logro ampliar a comedor, su especialidad en comida es el pollo asado al horno, pues se ha hecho gustar muchos por los clientes. Con este nuevo prestamo sera para la compra de docientas cincuenta libra de pollo entero, docientas cincuenta libra de carne de res y cerdo. Siendo los platos que mas se venden., al comprar al mayor, le rebajan y da a precios accesibles su comida, es por eso cada dia sus ventas han crecido. El cual esta sastifecha.
texts.en:
Luisa has had her own business for the last 22 years; its an eatery thats been growing thanks to the dedication she puts into her work to provide economically for her family. Her husband works managing a firm and he contributes the money he earns with his labor.
She is the mother of three children. Ones married and two go to university. Luisa has been very hardworking. She started out selling fried fast food. In time, she was able to open her dining room with the profits and then with loans from Afodenic was able to expand the dining room. Her specialty is roasted chicken that has become very popular with her customers.
She will use this new loan to buy 250 pounds of whole chicken and 250 pounds of beef and pork since these are the dishes that sell the most. Prices are reduced when she buys wholesale and she can then sell her dishes at affordable prices; this is why her sales have increased daily and this makes her satisfied.

loan.use: to buy chicken and meat.

loan.name: Anonymous
loan.use: to buy stock merchandise.

loan.name: Micaela

texts.es:
La seora Micaela es soltera, tiene 56 aos de edad, tiene 4 hijos, no tuvo la oportunidad de estudiar, se dedica a la venta de telas de lona de diferentes colores y calidades, inici este negocio por la necesidad que tenia de mejorar su condicin de vida y hasta el momento lleva 15 aos de experiencia.
Decide solicitar un prstamo que le servir para ampliar su capital de trabajo para la compra de mas telas para la venta lo que es lona de diferentes colores y comercializar mas de este producto. En el futuro espera ver su negocio el mas grande del lugar donde vive.
texts.en:
Micaela, 56, is single. She has four children. She never had the opportunity to go to school. She sells canvas in various colors and textures. She started the business because she needed to improve her living conditions and to date has 15 years experience.
She decides to request a loan to increase her working capital to buy more canvas in various colors in order to sell more of this product. In the future she hopes her business will be the largest in the area where she lives.

loan.use: to buy merchandise.

loan.name: Anonymous
loan.use: to buy materials to make her hammocks.

loan.name: Marta Yolanda

texts.es:
La seorita Marta Yolanda es soltera, tiene 22 aos de edad, curs los estudios de educacin primaria, tiene 1 hijos que aun no estudia, se dedica a la confeccin de tejidos, la confeccin de delantales tpicos y camisas, inici este trabajo como operaria, y hasta ahora lleva 15 aos de experiencia.
Solicita un prstamos que lo utilizara para la compra de telas e hilos para producir mas del trabajo que realiza, espera que su negocio crezca en el futuro.
texts.en:
Seorita Marta Yolanda is single and 22 years old. She studied up to primary school level, and has one child who is not yet in school. She works doing sewing, making traditional smocks and shirts. She started in this work as an operator, and has 15 years of experience up to this point.
She is requesting a loan which she will use to buy fabric and thread for producing more items. She hopes that her business will grow in the future.

loan.use: to buy fabric and thread.

loan.name: Anonymous
loan.use: to buy merchandise.

loan.name: Morena Guadalupe

texts.es:
La seora Morena tiene 26 aos de edad, es madre soltera de un hijo.
Ella se dedica a la crianza de cerdos ya tiene tres aos de realizar esta actividad, debido a que le genera ingresos considerables. Donde ella vive las calles son empedradas y valastreadas ( son tierra rocosas y disparejas), ella debe caminar a pie durante dos horas y en carro son cinco kilmetros, para ir a comprar los insumos que necesita, se levanta a las 4:00 a.m. de la maana por que hay poco transporte en la zona.
La seora Morena solicita un prstamo a Fundacin Campo, para la compra de insumos para el engorde de cerdos, estos sern: concentrado, harinilla y maz amarillo, as como vitaminas para los cerdos recin nacidos. Adems comprara dos cerdos reproductores en periodo de gestacin.
Al tener el prstamo, ella podr comprar los insumos a tiempo para el engorde de sus cerdos y crecerlos ms rpido y fcil. Hoy en da ella tiene que viajar al pueblo cuatro veces por semana a comprar los insumos. De esta manera ella podr comprar ms cantidad de insumos, lo que le permitir comprarlos a mejor precio y tendr que viajar menos al pueblo y con el ingreso adicional planea comprar insumos agrcolas para el cultivo de frjol.
A ella le gustara ahorrar de los ingresos que recibir, para construir una mejor galera y comercializar ms cerdos, ella quiere tener su granja bien establecida, puesto que en la zona no se observan cerdos de raza solo indios que no dejan mucha ganancia como el que ella cuida que es el cerdo de raza.
texts.en:
Sra. Morena is 26 years old and is a single mother with one son.
She has been raising pigs for three years because they generate a substantial income. The streets where she lives are cobbled and gravel (the ground is rocky and uneven) and she has to walk on foot for two hours, which by car is 5 kilometers, in order to buy the supplies she needs and has to get up at 4 a.m. in the morning because there is little transportation in the area.
Morena is requesting a loan from Fundacin Campo to buy supplies to fatten the pigs: this will be concentrated feed, coarsely ground wheat mixed with bran and yellow corn, as well as vitamins for the new born pigs. In addition she will buy two pregnant breeding pigs.
Upon receiving the loan she will be able to buy supplies in time to fatten her pigs and grow them more rapidly and easily. Nowadays she has to go to town four times a week to buy supplies. With the loan she will be able to buy a greater quantity of supplies which will allow her to buy at a better price and she will have to spend less time traveling. With the additional income she plans to buy agricultural supplies to plant beans.
She would like to save the income she will receive in order to build a better pig pen and market more pigs. She wants to have her farm well established since one does not see purebred pigs in the area but only native ones, which do not provide as much profit as purebred pigs.

loan.use: to buy more supplies to feed her pigs and to buy more pigs.

loan.name: Residenciales El Campo N 2 Group

texts.es: El Grupo Solidario Residenciales El Campo 2 est integrado por tres socias, Reina Isabel, Elbia y Santos Blacina. Las tres socias viven en Juticalpa, Olancho. Reina Isabel tiene 50 aos de edad, es viuda, y tiene 5 hijos. Comenz con una mini pulpera hace 12 aos con un prstamo de 2,000 Lempiras. En el 2003 tuvo un mercadito pero su esposo se enferm y tuvo que vender su negocio para pagar los gastos mdicos. Ahora se dedica a la venta de ropa de segunda mano de forma ambulante. Tiene una clientela buena y sus hijos le ayudan a vender la ropa. Con el prstamo comprar un fardo de ropa de segundo mano de primera clase. Tambin usar sus ahorros para comprar tres fardos ms. Con el prstamo podr crecer su negocio y aumentar sus ganancias para suportar a su familia y salir adelante. Sus sueos son que podr construir su casa propia y que sus hijos sigan estudiando. Elbia vende verduras y usar el prstamo para comprar verduras por mayor y aumentar sus ganancias. Santos Blacina vend productos cosmticos y con el prstamo comprar ms productos cosmticos para crecer su inventario y aumentar sus ganancias para salir adelante.
texts.en:
The Solidarity Group Residenciales El Campo 2 consists of three members: Reina Isabel, Elbia, and Santos Blacina.
Reina Isabel is 50 years old, widowed, and has five children. She started a mini-market 12 years ago with a loan of 2000 HNL. In 2003, she was operating her small business until her husband became ill. Reina had to sell the business in order to pay his medical expenses. Now she sells secondhand clothing as a street vendor. She has a good customer base and her children help with selling clothes. Her loan will be used to buy a bundle of first-rate used clothes. She will also use her savings to buy three additional bundles. This loan will enable her to grow her business and increase her income so that she can support her family and move them forward. Her dreams include building her own home and seeing her children continue their studies.
Elbia sells vegetables and will use her loan to buy vegetables in bulk so that she can increase her earnings.
Santos Blacina sells cosmetics and will use her loan to buy more of these products so that she can grow her inventory and increase her earnings to help her move forward.

loan.use: to purchase a bundle of used clothing.

loan.name: Matilde

texts.es:
La seora MatilD. es casada, tiene 42 aos D. edad, curs los grado D. educacin primaria, tiene 4 hijos 3 D. los cuales estudian, se dedica al comercio a la venta D. ropa para todas las edades, inici este negocio como trabajadora para otro negocio, y hasta el momento lleva 10 aos D. experiencia.
Solicita un dinero como prstamo para invertirlo en su negocio para la compra D. mas mercadera suteres, playeras, lencera, pants, camisetas, etc. En el futuro espera ver su negocio con venta mayor.
texts.en:
MatilD. is 42 years old, married, and completed her primary education. She has four children, three of whom are in school. MatilD. sells clothes for all ages. She started this business while working for another business. She now has ten years experience.
MatilD. is requesting a loan to invest in her business. She will buy more merchandise (sweaters, t-shirts, underwear, pants, etc). In the future, she hopes that her business will experience more sales.

loan.use: to buy merchandise

loan.name: Jose Roberto

texts.es: El Sr. Roberto esta casado con la seora San Juana y tienen ya treinta y cinco aos juntos y han formado un a bonita familia, actualmente ellos se dedican a atender una tienda de abarrotes , la cual les a permitido salir adelante da con da, ellos estn muy contentos por habernos encontrado ya que los apoyaremos en la realizacin de su proyecto, el cual consiste en realizar la compra de mercanca para su tienda ya que desean tener en inventario los diferentes productos que les demandan sus clientes as como tambin seguir brindado el excelente servicio que los caracteriza.
texts.en:
Sr. Roberto is married to Sra. San Juana. They have been together for 35 years and have formed a beautiful family. Roberto currently manages a grocery store, which allows him to move forward day after day. He is pleased to have contacted Credituyo for assistance with completing his project.

Roberto plans to buy merchandise for his store. He wants to have an inventory of different products so that he can meet the demands of his customers and continue providing the excellent service for which he is known.

loan.use: to buy merchandise for his store.

loan.name: Norma Margarita

texts.es: La Sra. Norma es una persona trabajadora y responsable , con esfuerzo da con da pudo adquirir su casa , ella se preocupa por brindarles a sus pequeos hijos la mejor estabilidad, es por ello que se acerco con nosotros para realizar su proyecto , el cual consiste en ampliar la plata baja de su casa, ve en el crdito la posibilidad de ofrecer a sus hijos un excelente patrimonio , adems de que sus familiares y amigos estn mas cmodos cuando la visitan, es por ello que esta agradecida por habernos encontrando.
texts.en:
Sra. Norma is a hardworking and responsible person who has strived each day to acquire her house. She worries about providing her young children greater stability. For this reason, she has approached Credituyo about completing her project. She wants to expand the first floor of her house, so she sees this loan as a possibility of providing her children a great inheritance.

In addition, her relatives and friends will be more comfortable whenever they visit her. For this reason, she is thankful for having contacted Credituyo.

loan.use: to expand the ground floor of her house.

loan.name: Wilder

texts.es: Wilder, de 38 aos de edad, originario de Estel, esta casado, padre de 3 hijos, el es comerciante, es dueo de una mini tienda. Anteriormente el trabajaba en una abarrotera pero despus se decidi poner su propio negocio, donde vende mercadera de todo tipo como ropa, zapato, cosmticos,alimentos con la ayuda de su papa dirige el negocio que hoy en da adems el tiene venta de paleta de todo sabor muy deliciosas y demandas por sus clientes. Solicito el crdito para comprar mercadera nueva de ropa, zapatos, cosmticos y productos alimenticios en general para abastecer su mini tienda. Con esta inversin pretende mejorar sus ventas, ofrecer productos de mejor calidad, lograr mejorar su negocio pues tiene como meta lograr convertir su mini tienda convertirla en una tienda de venta de mercadera en General que le permita emplear a mas personas dentro de su comunidad.
texts.en:
Wilder is 38 years old and originally from Estel. He is married, the father of three children, and a merchant who owns a small store. Wilder previously worked at a grocery store, but afterwards he decided to establish his own business. He sells all types of merchandise such as clothing, shoes, cosmetics, and food with the help of his father. Today his store also sells popsicles of all delicious flavors in order to meet the demands of his customers.

Wilder is requesting a loan to buy merchandise such as new clothing, shoes, cosmetics, and general food products to keep his small store stocked. With this investment he intends to improve his sales, offer products of better quality, and achieve better results in his business. His goal is to convert his small store into a general merchandise depot where he can employ more people from his community.

loan.use: to buy new clothing, shoes, cosmetics, and general food products.

loan.name: Martha Alicia

texts.es: La Sra. Martha es una persona responsable y muy trabajadora que actualmente tiene una tienda de abarrotes que le permite obtener ingresos para salir adelante da con da , ella esta muy contenta de habernos encontrado ya que le estamos apoyando para la realizacin de su proyecto el cual consiste en la compra de mercanca para su negocio para poder tener en existencia la mercanca que le requieren sus clientes , ve en el crdito la posibilidad de brindar a su familia una excelente calidad de vida y seguir brindando a sus clientes el excelente servicio que los caracteriza.
texts.en:
Sra. Martha is a responsible and hardworking person who currently has a grocery store, which allows her to generate income to move forward day after day. She is very pleased to have contacted Credituyo for assistance with completing her project. She plans to buy merchandise for her business so that she will have inventory to meet the requirements of her customers.

Martha views this loan as a possibility of providing her family an excellent quality of life and continuing to offer her customers the excellent service for which she is known.

loan.use: to buy merchandise for her store.

loan.name: Santos Francisco

texts.es: Santos, es originario del Espinal una comunidad localizada en Estel, tiene 33 aos de edad, tiene 2 hijos, el es agricultor. Inicio a la edad de 12 aos ayudando a su papa y mama preparando la tierra, comercializando el producto. Hoy en da el terreno donde siembra no es propio siembra a media con un amigo, ha logrado comprar su propia casa producto de su esfuerzo y arduo trabajo durante estos aos. Pues este oficio le ha permitido sobrevivir a pesar de que no pudo estudiar por dedicarse a trabajar para poder comer. Realizo el prstamo para la compra de insumos y establecimiento de 5 manzanas de frijol. Esta inversin le ayudara a sacar adelante su siembra de frijoles, mejorar sus areas de siembra. Uno de sus objetivos es lograr comprar su terreno propio de siembra, pero su meta principal es lograr que sus hijos estudien y logren tener una carrera universitaria mejorar sus condiciones de vida.
texts.en:
Santos is originally from Espinal, a community in the town of Estel. He is 33 years old, has two children, and works as a farmer. Santos started out at the age of 12, helping his father and mother with preparing the land and selling their products. Today he plants crops, but he does not own the land on which they are planted. He and a friend plant crops together. Santos was able to buy his own house as a result of the effort and hard work he has put in all these years. His work has enabled him to survive. Even though he was not able to attend school, Santo has been dedicated to his work so that he could feed himself.

With this loan, Santos will buy supplies so that he can establish five plots of beans. This investment will help him move forward with his planting and improve his crop. One of his goals is to buy his own land for planting, but his main objectives are to provide an education for his children, help them achieve a university degree, and improve their living conditions.

loan.use: to purchase farming supplies for planting five plots of beans.

loan.name: Svetlana

texts.en: Svetlana is asking for a loan to increase the range of her commodities. With the additional income, she plants to buy a refrigerated room. Svetlana plans to expand her business and, if possible, open another outlet. Svetlana lives with her husband in their home. With a previous loan she was able to better her living standards.

loan.use: Increase her range of goods

loan.name: Lomas De San Pedro (Portoviejo) Group

texts.es:
EL Banco Comunal Las Lomas De San Pedro se rene cada quince das en el en el sitio las Palmas D. Cantn Montecristi, conocido por su rica cultura pre colonial y por su artesana que es reconocida a nivel nacional e internacional. Lugar de los famosos sombreros de paja toquilla.
Este es un grupo de personas que hace 4 meses decidieron unirse y formar este Banco Comunal que les ha sido de gran ayuda ya que han podido incrementar sus pequeos negocios. Se dedican a diversas actividades tales como comercio, servicios, venta de comidas entre otras actividades.
En este lugar conocimos a la seora Holandina, tiene 56 aos de edad, est casada y de esta relacin tienen 5 hijos todos mayores de edad e independientes. Su esposo se dedica a la agricultura.
Nuestra amiga para ayudarse y ayudar a su marido con los gastos D. hogar hace mas de 20 aos puso un pequeo negocio en su casa en el cual se dedica a la venta de golosinas, helados, bebidas, ciertos bocadillos y comidas rpidas, ella tambin en su local ofrece entretenimiento ya que tiene cuatro mesas de billar hasta donde llegan sus clientes con la finalidad de entretenerse y disfrutar de un momento ameno, trabaja todos los das con la ayuda de su esposo cuando l puede, nos cuenta que los fines de semana es cuando ms clientes llegan hasta su local.
Este crdito lo va a emplear en surtir mas su negocio va a comprar helados, gaseosas, golosinas y vveres para preparar los alimentos. Est en el Banco Comunal desde que inicio y le gusta cmo trabaja la institucin.
Su sueo es tener una tienda bien surtida.
texts.en:
The Communal Bank Las Lomas de San Pedro (The Hills of San Pedro) meets every 15 days at the site of Las Palmas in the canton of Montecristi, which is known for its rich pre-colonial culture and its handicrafts that have received national and international recognition. This place is famous for its straw hats.

Four months ago, this group of individuals decided to join together and start this Communal Bank. Their union has been a great help in growing their small businesses. They engage in different business activities such as retail, services, selling food, and other trades.

It is in this place that one can meet Sra. Holandina. She is 56 years old, married, and has five grown children who are independent. Her husband is a farmer.

To help her husband with the household expenses, Holandina has managed a small business in her home for more than 20 years. She sells candy, ice cream, beverages, and certain snacks and fast foods. Holandina also provides entertainment at her establishment since she has four billiard tables for customers who want to pass the time and enjoy a relaxing moment. She works every day and has the help of her husband whenever he is able. Holandina says that the weekends are when most of her customers come to her shop.

This loan will be used to restock her business by purchasing ice cream, sodas, candy, and ingredients for preparing her dishes. Holandina has been with the Communal Bank from the beginning and enjoys working with the organization. Her dream is to have a well-stocked store.

loan.use: to purchase ice cream, sodas, candy, and ingredients.

loan.name: Mara Dolores

texts.es:
El Banco Comunal Picoaza se rene cada quince das en la parroquia Picoaza de la ciudad de Portoviejo. Lugar conocido por ser una zona muy comercial, por sus fiestas tradicionales de San Pedro y San Pablo y por la rica cultura histrica que encierran sus montaas.
En este lugar vive la seora Mara, ella tiene 57 aos de edad, es madre soltera de dos hijos que en la actualidad ya son mayores de edad, uno de ellos an viven con ella.
Nuestra amiga para ganarse el sustento diario desde hace mas de 15 aos tiene un bar, en el cual adems de vender gaseosas y cervezas, tambin vende bocadillos y comidas rpidas, ella nos cuenta que trabaja desde las 14h00 ya que a esa hora y en las noches acuden sus clientes a su local a conversar y distraerse un poco despus de las labores diarias. Trabaja todos los das y sus hijos le ayudan en su local.
Este crdito es para comprar gaseosas, cervezas y vveres para preparar los alimentos. Este es su cuarto ciclo en el Banco y le gusta los beneficios que tiene al ser socia de la institucin.
Sus sueos son tener un local mucho ms grande y un restaurante.
texts.en:
The Communal Bank Picoaza meets every 15 days in the parish of Picoaza in the city of Portoviejo. This place is known for being a commercial area, celebrating the traditional festivals of St. Peter and St. Paul, and having a rich historical culture influenced by the surrounding mountains.

Sra. Mara lives in this place. She is 57 years old and a single mother of two grown children. One of them still lives with her.

Mara has earned her daily living for more than 15 years by managing a bar where she sells sodas and beer. She also offers snacks and fast food. Mara says that she works from 2pm and continues through the night because that is when her customers come to her establishment to talk and find a bit of a distraction after a day of work. She works every day and her children help with managing the business.

This loan will be used to buy sodas, beer, and ingredients for preparing her dishes. Mara is participating in her fourth loan cycle with the Communal Bank and enjoys the benefits associated with being a member of the organization. Her dreams include having a larger establishment and a restaurant.

loan.use: to buy sodas, beer, and ingredients.

loan.name: Cruz Magdalena

texts.es:
El Banco Comunal Picoaza se rene cada quince das en la parroquia Picoaza de la ciudad de Portoviejo. Lugar conocido por ser una zona muy comercial, por sus fiestas tradicionales de San Pedro y San Pablo y por la rica cultura histrica que encierran sus montaas.
En este lugar vive la seora Cruz, ella tiene 52 aos de edad, est casada y fruto de esta relacin tiene tres hijos los mismos que ya son mayores de edad e independientes. Su marido es chofer y comerciante.
Ella y su esposo se dedican a la venta de ropa de todo tipo, recorren la ciudad y los campos en una camioneta que es de su propiedad y que les permite desplazarse por muchos lugares donde realizan las ventas, las mismas que son al contado aunque tambin deja a crdito pero solo a personas conocidas y de confianza, trabajan los viernes, sbados y domingos, la mercadera la compran en Guayaquil ya que su hijo vive all, l les da comprando y se las enva por transporte de cooperativa.
Este crdito es para comprar pantalones, camisetas, blusas y ropa de nios. Est en el Banco Comunal hace 4 ciclos y le gusta porque los intereses son bien bajos.
Su sueo es tener su propio almacn para vender en un lugar estable.
texts.en:
The Communal Bank Picoaza meets every 15 days in the parish of Picoaza in the city of Portoviejo. This place is known for being a commercial area, celebrating the traditional festivals of St. Peter and St. Paul, and having a rich historical culture influenced by the surrounding mountains.

Sra. Cruz lives in this place. She is 52 years old, married, and has three children who are grown and independent. Her husband is both a chauffeur and a merchant.

Cruz and her husband sell all types of clothing. They travel to the city and the rural areas in a truck that they own. This enables them to reach many places in order to make sales. They sell their products for cash but they also extend credit only to people that they know and trust. Cruz and her husband work Fridays, Saturdays, and Sundays. The merchandise is purchased in Guayaquil, which is where her son lives. Her son buys the merchandise and then sends it to her via transportation provided by a cooperative.

This loan will be used to buy trousers, t-shirts, blouses, and childrens clothing. Cruz has been with the Communal Bank for four loan cycles and enjoys being a member because the interest rates are very low. Her dream is to have her own store so that she can sell from a stable place of business.

loan.use: to buy trousers, t-shirts, blouses, and childrens clothing.

loan.name: Nury Emperatriz

texts.es:
El Banco Comunal Picoaza se rene cada quince das en la parroquia Picoaza de la ciudad de Portoviejo. Lugar conocido por ser una zona muy comercial, por sus fiestas tradicionales de San Pedro y San Pablo y por la rica cultura histrica que encierran sus montaas.
En este lugar conocimos a la seora Nury, tiene 52 aos de edad, hace varios aos el compaero de toda su vida falleci y quedo sola con sus tuvo 5 hijos que tuvo de esta relacin, en la actualidad 4 de ellos ya son mayores de edad, el ultimo que tiene 16 aos es el que aun vive con ella y estudia en colegio.
Nuestra amiga para ganarse el sustento diario y con esto sacar adelante a sus hijos hace 15 aos empez un negocio de venta de ropa, el cual lo ha mantenido hasta la fecha y es a travs de este negocio que ha podido salir adelante, su forma de venta es puerta a puerta, aunque tambin tiene muchos clientes que le encargan sus productos con anticipacin, trabaja de mircoles a domingo, deja sus productos a crdito y cobra los das sabados. Ella compra en Guayaquil cada fin de mes o cuando necesita mercadera.
Este crdito lo va a utilizar para comprar pantalones, camisetas, blusas y ropa de nios. Es socia fundadora del Banco Comunal y le gusta por la ayuda que le han brindado con los crditos para sacar adelante su negocio.
Sus sueos son terminar su casa y construir un pequeo local para vender sus productos.
texts.en:
The Communal Bank Picoaza meets every 15 days in the parish of Picoaza in the city of Portoviejo. This place is known for being a commercial area, celebrating the traditional festivals of St. Peter and St. Paul, and having a rich historical culture influenced by the surrounding mountains.

It is in this place that one can meet Sra. Nury. She is 52 years old. Her companion in life died several years ago and she was left alone with their five children. Four of them are now adults. The youngest one is 16 years old, lives with her, and attends school.

Nury has been able to earn her daily living and move her children forward because of the clothing business she started 15 years ago. She has been able to keep her business running through today and it allows her to stay ahead. Her sales are made by going door-to-door, but she also has many customers who order their products in advance. Nury works Wednesday through Sunday. She extends credit for her products and collects payment on Saturdays. Nury goes shopping in Guayaquil at the end of every month or whenever she needs merchandise.

This loan will be used to buy trousers, t-shirts, blouses, and childrens clothing. Nury is a founding member of the Communal Bank and enjoys the help the loans have provided so that she can keep her business moving. Her dreams are to finish the construction of her house and to build a small store where she can sell her products.

loan.use: to buy trousers, t-shirts, blouses, and childrens clothing.

loan.name: Anonymous
loan.use: to complete renovations to his business facility

loan.name: Doris Nilsa

texts.es:
El Banco Comunal Picoaza se rene cada quince das en la parroquia Picoaza de la ciudad de Portoviejo. Lugar conocido por ser una zona muy comercial, por sus fiestas tradicionales de San Pedro y San Pablo y por la rica cultura histrica que encierran sus montaas.
La seora Doris es socia fundadora del Banco comunal y le gusta porque los intereses son ms bajos que en otras instituciones de crdito. Tiene 51 aos de edad, est casada y de esta relacin tiene 3 hijos los cuales ya son mayores de edad, el menor de ellos aun viven con ella. Su esposo es chofer.
Nuestra amiga para ganarse algo por su cuenta y con esto ayudar con los gastos del hogar se dedica a la venta de ropa de todo tipo, sabanas y cortinas, su forma de venta es puerta a puerta y tambin vende en su casa hasta donde llegan sus clientes ms conocidos. Trabaja tres das a la semana y esto lo hace a cualquier hora ya que no tiene horarios fijos, ella a deja a crdito a sus clientes y cobra cada ocho das. Su mercadera la compra en Picoaza en un lugar que le dejan a buen precio. Tiene ms de 20 aos que se dedica a esta actividad y le va muy bien.
Este crdito lo va emplear en comprar ropa, sabanas y cortinas.
Su sueo es tener un gran almacn.
texts.en:
The Picoaza Community Bank meets every other week in the Picoaza district in the city of Portoviejo. This place is known for its commerce, its traditional celebrations for Saint Peter and Saint Paul, and for the rich cultural history enclosed in its mountains.

Mrs. Doris is a founding member of the community bank and she likes it because it has lower interest rates than other lending institutions. She is 51 years old, married, and has three grown children. The youngest child still lives with her. Her husband is a driver. In order to earn her own money and help with the family's expenses, she works selling all types of clothing, sheets, and curtains. She sells door to door and also from her home to the customers who know her well. She works three days a week without a fixed schedule. She sells to her customers on credit and collects from them once a week. She buys her merchandise in Picoaza at a place that has good prices. She has been working in this business for more than 20 years and it is going very well for her.

She will use the loan to buy clothing, sheets, and curtains. Her dream is to have a big department store.

loan.use: buy clothing, sheets, and curtains

loan.name: Belen Aracely

texts.es:
El Banco Comunal Picoaza se rene cada quince das en la parroquia Picoaza de la ciudad de Portoviejo. Lugar conocido por ser una zona muy comercial, por sus fiestas tradicionales de San Pedro y San Pablo y por la rica cultura histrica que encierran sus montaas.
En este lugar conocimos a la seora Beln, tiene 33 aos de edad, mantiene una relacin de unin libre pero de otra relacin que tuvo hace aos tiene 3 hijos de 15, 11 y 10 aos los mismos que estudian el mayor en colegio y los menores en escuela. Su marido tiene un asadero de pollos.
Nuestra amiga para ganarse su sustento diario desde hace 5 aos atrs puso un negocio en el centro de Picoaza en el cual vende ropa de todo tipo, sabanas y cortinas, ella trabaja todos los das desde las 8h00 hasta las 16h00 y por las noches le ayuda a su marido en el negocio de venta de pollos asados en el centro de la ciudad. Nos cuenta que empez ese negocio cuando se separ de su primer marido ya que sus hijos estaban pequeos y necesitaban muchas cosas y que gracias a su negocio pudo sacar adelante a su familia.
Este crdito lo va emplear en comprar ms mercadera como: pantalones, blusas, camisetas, ropa de nios, ropa interior, sabanas y cortinas. Lleva cinco aos en el banco comunal y le gusta ya que gracias al primer crdito empez su negocio.
Su sueo es que a sus hijos nunca les falte nada.
texts.en:
The Picoaza Community Bank meets every other week in the Picoaza district in the city of Portoviejo. This place is known for its commerce, its traditional celebrations for Saint Peter and Saint Paul, and for the rich cultural history enclosed in its mountains.

Here we find Mrs. Beln. She is 33 years old and in a common-law marriage. She has three children from a different man from many years ago. Her children are 15, 11, and 10. The oldest studies in high school and the younger two study at a different school. Her husband has a rotisserie grill for chickens.

To make her daily living, she started a business 5 years ago in downtown Picoaza selling all types of clothing, sheets, and curtains. She works every day from 8:00 am until 4:00 pm and at night she helps her husband with his business selling roasted chicken downtown in the city. She shared that she began this business when she separated from her first husband since her children were small and needed a lot of things, and that thanks to her business, she was able to help her family get ahead.

She will use the loan to buy more merchandise like pants, blouses, t-shirts, children's clothing, underwear, sheets, and curtains. She has been in the community bank for five years and she likes it because it was thanks to her first loan that she began her business. Her dream is that her children never want for anything.

loan.use: Buy pants, blouses, t-shirts, children's clothing, underwear, sheets, and curtains.

loan.name: Daysi Maribel

texts.es:
El Banco Comunal Picoaza se rene cada quince das en la parroquia Picoaza de la ciudad de Portoviejo. Lugar conocido por ser una zona muy comercial, por sus fiestas tradicionales de San Pedro y San Pablo y por la rica cultura histrica que encierran sus montaas.
En este lugar vive la seora Daysi, tiene 42 aos de edad y mantiene una relacin de unin libre de la cual tiene dos hijas de 14 y 12 aos de edad las mismas que estudian en colegio. El marido es comerciante. Ella es licenciada en Ciencias de la Educacin y trabaja por contrato en una escuela en Santa Ana.
Ella es una mujer muy trabajadora que adems de impartir sus conocimientos en la escuela en la cual trabaja tambin se dedica al comercio, ella vende ropa y productos de Yanbal (productos de belleza, cosmticos, perfumera y accesorios para damas). Trabaja todos los das, y los fines de semana vende por su localidad y tambin les vende a sus compaeras y conocidas en su trabajo, ella deja a crdito y cobra cada semana o cada quince das. Tiene dos aos que se dedica a esta actividad y le va muy bien. > Este crdito es para comprar perfumes, cremas, cosmticos y ropa de todo tipo. Lleva dos aos en el Banco Comunal, es la tesorera del banco y le gusta porque los pagos son fciles de hacer.
Su sueo es tener una boutique.
texts.en:
The communal bank Picoaza meets every 15 days in the Picoaza parish in the city of Portoviejo, an area known for its commercial activities, for the traditional celebrations of San Pedro and San Pablo, and for the rich cultural history found in its mountains.
In this place lives Daysi who is 42 years old, in a common law marriage, and has two daughters aged 14 and 12 who both go to school. Her spouse is a merchant. She is licensed in Educational Sciences and is a contractual worker in the Santa Ana school.
She is a very hardworking woman who, besides sharing her knowledge in the school where she works, also works in the commercial sector. She sells clothing and Yanbal products (beauty products, cosmetics, perfumes, and womens accessories). She works every day, and on the weekends she sells in her local area and she also sells to her friends and co-workers. She gives credit and collects every week or every 15 days. Shes been engaged in this business for two years, and its going very well.
This loan is to buy perfumes, creams, cosmetics, and all types of clothing. She has been in the communal bank for two years. She is the treasurer of the bank, and she enjoys it because the payments are easy to make.
Her dream is to have a boutique.

loan.use: to buy perfumes, creams, cosmetics, and clothing.

loan.name: Mercedes Giannine

texts.es:
El Banco Comunal Picoaza se rene cada quince das en la parroquia Picoaza de la ciudad de Portoviejo. Lugar conocido por ser una zona muy comercial, por sus fiestas tradicionales de San Pedro y San Pablo y por la rica cultura histrica que encierran sus montaas.
En este lugar vive la seora Mercedes, tiene 31 aos de edad y mantiene una relacin de unin libre de la cual tiene tres hijos de 10, 9 y 8 aos que estudian en escuela. El marido es militar.
Ella para ganarse algo por su cuenta y para entretenerse se dedica al comercio, tiene un local en su casa en el cual vende granos como: arroz, azcar, man, lenteja, entre otras cosas, trabaja todos los das desde las 8h00 hasta las 18h00 y nos cuenta que tiene muchos clientes, all tambin vende tarjetas y realiza recargas telefnicas lo cual le deja ingresos extra, dice que esta es una forma de ganarse algo sin salir de su casa y estar al tanto de las necesidades de sus pequeos hijos. Tiene dos aos con su negocio y le ha ido muy bien.
Este crdito es para comprar arroz, azcar, man, lenteja entre otras cosas. Es fundadora del Banco Comunal, es la secretaria del banco y le gusta porque con los crditos ha logrado aumentar ms su negocio.
Su sueo es tener un local en el centro de la ciudad.
texts.en:
The communal bank Picoaza meets every 15 days in the Picoaza parish in the city of Portoviejo, an area known for its commercial activities, for the traditional celebrations of San Pedro and San Pablo, and for the rich cultural history found in its mountains.
Here lives Mercedes. She is 31 years old, in a common law marriage, and has three children aged 10, 9, and 8 who study in school. Her husband is in the military.
In order to earn something of her own and to entertain herself, she works in commerce. She has a shop in her home in which she sells grains such as rice, sugar, peanuts, lentils, and other things. She works every day from 8:00am until 6:00pm. She says she has many clients. She also sells phone cards and recharges phones, giving her extra income. She says that its a way to earn something without leaving her house and to tend to her young childrens needs. She has had this business for two years, and its gone very well.
This loan is to buy rice, sugar, peanuts, lentils, and other things. She is the founder of the communal bank, and she is the secretary of the bank. She enjoys it because the loans have allowed her to further expand her business.
Her dream is to have a store in the center of the city.

loan.use: to buy rice, sugar, peanuts, lentils, etc

loan.name: Mujeres Luchadoras Group

texts.es: El comit Mujeres Luchadoras se form con la unin de vA. vecinas de la ciudad de Mariano Roque Alonso. Las integrantes formaron un grupo muy unido y capaz de realizar conjuntamente actividades que fortalecen su compaerismo. Ella se definen como mujeres muy trabajadoras y luchadoras que da a da luchan por el sustento de su familia. La Seora Bonifacia es una de las integrantes del comit, ella tiene una despensa bien surtida con todo tipo de artculos. Todos sus clientes quedan muy admirados con su trabajo. Ella tiene una familia muy unida con 3 hijos y su marido quien trabaja como Contratista. Se encuentra muy satisfecha con su actividad y las capacitaciones que recibe el grupo. La seora Bonifacia solicita el crdito para la compra de productos para su despensa, como ser comestibles, bebidas, lcteos y otros. Agradece a la Fundacin por la oportunidad que esta le da.
texts.en:
The 'Mujeres Luchadoras' committee was created when a number of neighbors from the town of Mariano Roque Alonso joined together. The members created a very united group and are capable of jointly carrying out activities that strengthen their team spirit. They describe themselves as very hard-working and tenacious women who work hard every day to support their families.
Bonifacia is one of the committee's members. She has a well-stocked store where she sells all kinds of goods. All of her customers are very impressed with her work. She has a very united family. She has three children and her husband works as a contractor. She is very happy with her business and the training sessions that her group receives.
Bonifacia is requesting this loan to buy products for her store such as food, drinks, dairy products, etc. She is grateful to Fundacin Paraguaya for the opportunity that they are giving her.

loan.use: to buy food, drinks, dairy products, etc.

loan.name: Veronica

texts.en:
Veronica is 53 years old and has two children. She works hard to proviD. for her family. She runs a sari-sari (variety) store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 24,000 loan through NWTF to purchase more stock to sell in her sari-sari store.
Veronica has borrowed and repaid 16 loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the sari-sari store for 10 years and also earns an income from buying and selling charcoal and farming rice.
Veronica aspires to save money to expand her business.

loan.use: To purchase more stock to sell in her sari-sari (variety) store.

loan.name: Renacer Group

texts.es: Renacer se denomina el excelente grupo de mujeres conformado en la ciudad de Ita, gracias a que la Seora Laura, contact con la asesora en una reunin semanal que la misma tena en la zona, para informarse de la forma de trabajo que tiene el Comit de Mujeres Emprendedoras, una vez asesorada acerca del Programa logr juntar a 16 mujeres quienes se encuentran trabajando muy a gusto ya en el noveno ciclo, en forma conjunta y solidaria. La seora Laura tiene una despensa, comenta que diariamente se levanta muy temprano para abrir su negocio, pues desde esa hora ya tiene clientes aguardndola. Comenta que la despensa es el medio por medio del cual ella mantiene a su familia y todos aquellos quienes dependen de ella. Dice que tiene mucha clientela, lo cual la anima a seguir con su negocio. Ella solicita el crdito para la compra de comestibles, bebidas, lcteos, panificados y otros para abastecer su negocio y de esa forma cumplir con sus clientes.
texts.en:
Renacer is the name of the excellent group of women formed in the city of Ita thanks to Laura, who contacted the advisor of a weekly meeting held in the area to inform herself about the type of work done by the Comit de Mujeres Emprendedoras. Once advised about the program, she managed to bring together 16 women who now find themselves working together very comfortably and in solidarity in their ninth cycle.
Laura has a grocery store. She comments that she gets up very early to open her business, since from that time on she already has customers waiting for her. The grocery store is how she supports her family and everyone who depends on her. She says she has lots of customers, which encourages her to continue with her business.
She is requesting the loan to buy food, drinks, dairy products, baked goods, and other items to stock her business and so fulfill her obligations to her customers.

loan.use: to buy dairy products, baked goods, drinks, and other food.

loan.name: San Sebastian Group

texts.es: San Sebastian se denomina el excelente grupo de mujeres conformado en la ciudad de Ita, desde el ao 2010, gracias a que la actual Directora Finanzas la Seora Julia contact con la asesora para pedirle una reunion para el nuevo grupo que estaban conformando en el barrio, logr juntar a 17 mujeres quienes se encuentran trabajando muy a gusto ya en el tercer ciclo, en forma conjunta y solidaria dentro del programa. La seora Julia, es quien se encarga de la parte financiera del grupo, ella se dedica a la venta de prendas de todo tipo, como ser pantalones, camisas, remeras, y otros. Mediante esto ella logra tener los ingresos necesarios para mantener a todo su familia. Comenta que lleva un tiempo en esto por lo que ya tiene una clientela bien definida. Ella solicita el crdito para la compra de pantalones, camisas, remeras, y otros, para la posterior venta. Agradece a la Fundacin por la oportunidad que esta le da a su microempresa.
texts.en:
San Sebastian is the name of this excellent group of women. The group was founded in the city of Ita in 2010, thanks to the current Finance Director, Seora Julia. She contacted the counselor to ask to set up a new group which was put together in the neighborhood. She managed to bring together 17 women who find themselves enjoying their work. They are in their third lending cycle, and are united and committed to each other through the program.
Seora Julia is in charge of the financial affairs of the group. She works selling all types of clothing, such as trousers, shirts, T-shirts and other things. Through this she has been able earn the income necessary to support her whole family. She comments that it has taken a while, but she has a well defined customer base.
She is requesting the loan for the purchase of trousers, shirts, T-Shirts and other things for later sale. She is grateful to the Foundation for the opportunity that it is giving to her micro-business.

loan.use: to buy trousers, shirts, T-shirts, and other things for later sale.

loan.name: San Francisco Group

texts.es: Este Comit se formo a travs D. dos D. las miembros, quienes se haba acercado hasta la Oficina D. la Fundacin Paraguaya para interiorizarse ms del Programa Comit D. Mujeres Emprendedoras, las mismas invitaron a sus amigas y compaeras del Barrio y decidieron sumarse al trabajo grupal para salir adelante y as mejorar su estilo D. vida, son 18 mujeres trabajadoras y humildes que deben ganarse el sustento todos los das. Una D. las miembros es la seora Rogelia, ella se dedica a la venta D. comestibles D. todo tipo, nos comenta que su jornada D. trabajo empieza a muy tempranas horas, pues se levanta a preparar todos los alimentos que va a vender, ya que desea vender a sus clientes siempre productos frescos. Adems D. eso dice que tiene muchos clientes, lo cual le genera buenos ingresos. Ella solicita el crdito para la compra D. carne, pollo, condimentos, panificados, huevos y otros insumos necesarios para la elaboracin D. los alimentos que ella venD..
texts.en:
This committee was created by two of its members who approached Fundacin Paraguaya's Office to find out more about the 'Comit D. Mujeres Emprendedoras' (Committee of Entrepreneurial Women) Program. They invited their friends and acquaintances from their neighborhood to work together as a group in order to get ahead and improve their lifestyles. The committee has 18 members. They are all hard-working, modest women who must earn a living every day.
One of the members of this committee is Rogelia, whose business is selling all kinds of food. She tells us that her workday starts very early in the morning. She must get up early in order to prepare all the food that she will sell that day as she likes to make sure that she always sells fresh food to her customers. She tells us that she has a lot of customers and this makes her good income.
Rogelia is requesting this loan to buy meat, chicken, seasonings, baked goods, eggs and other supplies she needs to make the food that she sells.

loan.use: to buy meat, chicken, seasonings, baked goods, eggs and other supplies for making food

loan.name: Analyn

texts.en:
Analyn is 31 years old and married with two children. With both children in school, Analyn works very hard to provide for them.
Analyn runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 29,500 loan through NWTF to buy more items to her general store. She has been in this business for 3 years.
In the future Analyn would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loan.use: To buy more items for her general store.

loan.name: Salamatu

texts.en:
This is 36-year-old Salamatu. She is married and has three children, aged 6, 11 and 14 years.
In 2010, Salamatu established her rice, sugar and salt business. She began her business because she learned it from her foster parent who brought her up. Salamatu's business is so special as it has faster turnover and generates more income. Working seven days a week and 11 hours a day, she earns about 1,000,000 Sierra Leone leone (Le) every month from this business.
She would like a loan in the amount of Le 4,000,000. Salamatu requires a loan in order to purchase flour (20 bags @ Le 200,000). She hopes that this loan will enable her to increase her monthly profits by approximately Le 250,000. In the future, Salamatu plans to construct a dwelling house, educate her children and establish a savings account. She travels to Freetown to buy stock twice per month by public vehicle.
She thanks you for your support.

loan.use: To purchase flour (20 bags @ Le200,000).

loan.name: Claudia Simona

texts.es:
Claudia tiene 32 aos de edad, es casada, tiene cuatro hijos, es una persona luchadora y junto a su familia reside en la comunidad de Poncaya en el municipio de Catacamas.
Claudia se dedica a la compra-venta de ganado. Ella empezo a dedicarse a esta actividad cuando su esposo por dificultades economicas tuvo que salir del pais y se fue a buscar el sueo americano. Como mujer se le hace un tanto dificil el manejo del ganado pero aun asi no se deja vencer por las adversidades. Claudia se levanta todos los dias muy temprano por las maanas para iniciar las actividades del cuidado del ganado y una vez que las vacas alcanzan un peso adecuado, las vende a comerciantes.
Claudia necesita el prestamo para comprar vacas lecheras, ya que es temporada de lluvia y quiere aprovechar para vender leche y luego vender las vacas para destazo.
Su meta es sacar adelante su negocio para seguir dandole el estudio a sus dos hijas mayores y ahorrar un poco para cuando sus otros dos hijos crezcan y vayan a la escuela. Claudia tiene tres ciclos en FAMA y ha cancelado sus cuotas puntualmente y espera hacerlo tambien con este prestamo.
texts.en:
Claudia is 32 years old, married, and has four children. She is a very hardworking woman, and she lives with her family in the town of Poncaya, in the municipality of Catacamas.
Claudias work is buying and selling cattle. She began this work when her spouse, due to financial hardship, had to leave the country and left to find the American dream. As a woman she finds livestock management a little difficult, but she is not one to give in to adversity. Claudia gets up early in the morning each day to begin her chores to care for the cattle, and as soon as they reach a healthy weight, she sells them to retailers.
Claudia needs the loan to buy dairy cows because its the rainy season and she wants to use the milk and then sell the cows to be butchered.
Her goal is to be successful in her business in order to continue sending her two older daughters to school and to save a little for when her other children grow up and go to school. Claudia has had three loan cycles with FAMA. She has been prompt in her repayments on time and hopes to do the same with this loan.
